Stay alert.
Watch yourselves.

Sounds rough.
Can anyone see what's happening?
Anyone nearby?
Keep on the lookout.

Keep your eyes open.

Shit, we should get out of this place.

Things are getting tense. Stay sharp out there.
Better keep your head down until it clears up.
Can anyone confirm what's going on? It's chaos out here.
Looks like trouble. Best steer clear for now.
If youre nearby, dont stick around. Its heating up fast.
Keep your distance. You dont want to be caught up in this mess.
Somethings brewing over there. Feels like its about to boil over.
If you value your life, dont get involved.
Looks bad, real bad. Lets not make it worse by sticking around.
Keep moving, stalker. This place is turning ugly.
Anyone hear that? Feels like somethings about to go down.
Somethings not right... stay frosty, everyone.
If youre nearby, get out fast. Its not worth the risk.
Anyone crazy enough to check it out? Count me out.
This place gives me the creeps. Lets not hang around.
Feels like the calm before the storm. Stay ready.
If you see smoke on the horizon, dont be curious. Just go the other way.
Anyone else feel like were walking into an ambush?
The airs too still. Somethings about to happen, I can feel it.
Eyes open, ears sharp. This place doesnt feel right.
Heard some weird noises from over there. Might be trouble.
Anyone still alive over there? Doesnt sound like it...
If youre smart, youll stay away from this mess.
Looks like a war zone ahead. Keep your head down.
Not sure whats worse the silence or whats hiding in it.
Dont get too comfortable. Places like this can turn deadly fast.
Whatevers happening over there, I dont want to be a part of it.
This road smells like trouble. Lets tread lightly.
Whoevers brave enough to check that out, good luck. Youll need it.
The Zones playing its tricks again. Keep your guard up.
Id bet money something nastys waiting around the corner.
Feels too quiet. Its the kind of quiet that gets you killed.
Dont trust the calm. Thats when it gets you.
Is it just me, or does this place feel like its watching us?
Every instinct Ive got says to turn back, but here we are.
Anybody else hear that? Could be nothing but I doubt it.
Lets hope thats just the wind, and not something worse.
Anyone still feeling brave? Because Im starting to second-guess this.
The further we go, the more it feels like were not alone.
If we make it out of here, drinks are on me.
Ive seen some bad places, but this one takes the cake.
Even the shadows look dangerous here. Lets keep moving.
Whoever said this was a good idea owes us a drink.
Cant shake the feeling were being followed.
If we hear footsteps that arent ours, start running.
Is it just me, or does the air feel heavier here?
Mark my words: somethings waiting for us out there.
Ive seen enough horror movies to know we should probably leave.
Call me paranoid, but I dont trust those noises in the distance.
This is the kind of place where people vanish without a trace.
If you hear a scream, dont go toward it. Thats survival rule number one.
The stories Ive heard about this place Lets just hope theyre exaggerations.
Got a bad feeling about this one, folks.
Look alive, people. This areas got ambush written all over it.
Keep an eye on the treetops. Thats where they like to hide.
If something jumps out at us, Im blaming whoever picked this route.
This silence is worse than any battle Ive been in.
Lets not become one of those campfire stories, alright?
Stay sharp. This feels like one of those bad decision moments.
If we get out of here alive, remind me never to come back.

Bastards! They killed him! I'm gonna find them, and I'm gonna tear them a new one!
Fuckers killed a friend of mine!
That poor guy... Things didn't work out for him.
I knew the guy. I'm sorry for him.
You'll be remembered...
Rest in peace. I will get the fucker who did this to you.
He was a good man, and good men are hard to come by...
He was a good fella...
He was a friend of mine, bastards!
I'm gonna find whoever did this!
I'm gonna put that fucking asshole in a coffin!
I'm gonna tear those fuckers a new one after what they did to my friend!
I will find those scumbags and turn them inside out.
Let's have a drink later in his memory!
Man, we had a drink yesterday. Poor guy.
Poor bastard...
Poor guy...
Rest in peace, my friend.
Rest in peace. He was a good man...
Such a pity...
They killed him!
They killed that guy!
What an unlucky dude...
What the fuck...
What the hell, they killed such a nice guy...
You'll be remembered, my friend.
I haven't got to know the guy, but still, what a shame...
Look what those fuckers have done!
We were telling stories by the campfire, and now this happens...
Get the fucker who killed him!
What in hell?!
We were laughing like good fellas last night, I can't believe it...
Here we go again...
He didnt deserve to go out like this...
Lets make sure his death wasnt for nothing.
Someones going to answer for this. Mark my words.
How many more of us will the Zone take?
Its always the good ones who go first...
Well light a fire tonight in his memory.
Ill never forget his laugh... Damn it all.
The Zone doesnt play fair, does it?
Lets hunt down the bastard who did this.
We shared bread, stories, and now hes gone...
No use mourning too long. We have to survive.
The Zone takes more than it gives. Every damn time.
They wont get away with this. Not while Im still breathing.
One more gone. Feels like the Zone is thinning us out on purpose.
Whos next? Sometimes I wonder if were all just waiting for our turn.
Damn it, we were supposed to get through this together...
He faced the Zone with courage. Thats more than most can say.
Weve lost too many already. This has to stop.
Whoever did this better pray they never cross my path.
The Zone doesnt care about fairness. It just takes.
He wouldnt want us to sit around grieving. Lets honor him by moving forward.
His stories will live on. So will his memory.
The Zone is relentless... but so are we. Lets not forget that.
He was a fighter. Lets not let his sacrifice be in vain.
The fires quieter without him around... too quiet.
If only we had gotten here sooner...
The Zone doesnt take prisoners, and it doesnt leave survivors untouched.
One more name to carve into the memory of the Zone...
I swear, this place has a way of testing how much we can lose.
Lets remember the good times. Its the least we can do for him.
The Zone got him... but it wont take me without a fight.
Every time we lose someone, its like the Zone wins a little more.
Well carry his memory, but not his mistakes. Thats how we survive.
Those fuckers dont know whats coming for them. Ill tear them apart.
Hes fucking gone, and someones gonna pay for it.
What the fuck is wrong with this place? It takes everything we have!
Fuck this shit, Ive had enough of watching my friends die out here.
If I find the bastard who did this, Ill put a fucking bullet between their eyes.
Shit... he was the toughest guy I knew. How the fuck did this happen?
Fuck the Zone, fuck the mutants, and fuck anyone who thinks this is just life out here.
Goddammit, we were supposed to make it out together. Fucking hell!
His bloods still fucking warm... this isnt over, not by a long shot.
Those motherfuckers just signed their death warrant.
Fucking bullshit! The Zone doesnt take, it devours.
Fuck this place. First it takes our hope, then our lives.
Ill fucking burn this whole area to the ground if it means avenging him.
This shit is getting too real. First him, whos fucking next?
Fucking mutants! They killed him! I'm gonna find them, and I'm gonna tear them a new one!
Mutants killed a friend of mine!
That poor guy... Things didn't work out for him.
I knew the guy. I feel sorry for him.
You'll be remembered...
Rest in peace. I will get the freak who did this to you.
He was a good man, and good men are hard to come by...
He was a good fella...
He was a friend of mine, bastards!
I'm gonna find whatever did this!
I'm gonna put that fucking freak in a coffin!
I'm gonna tear those freaks a new one after what they did to my friend!
I will find those mutants and turn them inside out.
Let's have a drink later in his memory!
Man, we had a drink yesterday. Poor guy.
Poor bastard...
Poor guy...
Rest in peace, dude.
Rest in peace. He was a good man...
Such a pity...
They killed him!
They killed that guy!
What an unlucky dude...
What the fuck...
What the hell, mutants got him!
You'll be remembered my friend.
I haven't got to know the guy, but still, what a shame..
Look what those freaks have done!
We were telling stories by the campfire, and now this happens...
Get the freak who killed him!
What in hell?!
We were laughing like good fellas last night, I can't believe it..
Those bastards don't deserve to live after what they've done!
Damn mutants, always taking good people away...
We shared a bottle last night. Feels unreal he's gone.
I swear, I'll avenge him.
Another friend lost to this cursed Zone.
They won't get away with this. Not on my watch!
Just yesterday, he was planning his next trip...
This place doesn't spare anyone, does it?
He was one of the few good ones. The Zone doesn't care.
How many more friends are we going to lose out here?
I hope his family doesn't find out like this...
Every day, the Zone takes someone new...
We were supposed to leave this place together.
He had plans for tomorrow. Now he's gone.
The Zone never lets you have peace for long...
I can't believe he's really gone.
We were supposed to watch each other's backs. Damn it...
The Zone takes another soul.
He deserved better than this.
The freaks are gonna pay for what they did to him.
One less Stalker in this hellhole. Rest easy, friend.
He had a rough life. The Zone just finished the job.
Let's raise a glass to his memory tonight.
He didn't deserve to go out like that.
The Zone gives nothing and takes everything...
We'll remember him by the fire tonight.
The Zone claims another poor bastard...
Mutants again. When will it ever end?
What the hell?
I knew the guy. I'm sorry for him.
Might've committed suicide...
Haven't seen this kind of shit in a while.
I knew he was gonna get into this...
You'll be remembered.
Another one...
Yeeeah...
Egh, wouldn't have been a day in the Zone without someone kicking the bucket...
What's one more?...
Everybody's heading there sooner or later.
You'll be remembered...
Rest in peace.
Damn.
That's the end of him.
It's over for him.
And he said it was charmed! Hah...
And there he goes.
Another one lost to the Zone...
Barkeep, what do we do now?... Alright, I'll go check the corpse in case there's any info on that flash drive. If anything happens, message me.
Bastards! Motherfuckers! They're not afraid of anything...
Bastards! They killed him! I'm gonna find them, and I'm gonna tear them a new one!
Best pick up his loot while no-one's nearby.
Better to die of a bullet to the head than from the teeth of a mutant, trust me.
Wow, he had that freaking shooter and couldn't even defend himself with it... I'm gonna go check it. And remember, I'm first!
Come on man, stay down for another five seconds and I'll take your stuff. Won't be needing it in the next world.
Damn, the crows flew off. There are probably corpses nearby. Be careful.
Damn, what a pity, what else to say...
Dead man, got anything for me?
Dude's dead!
Every day...
Fuck! And I thought I had everything settled...
Fuckers killed a friend of mine! Guys, have you seen who did this? If you see them, shoot me a message!
Good thing he wasn't devoured by a mutant.
Guess things didn't work out for that guy.
Heh... let's see how much money he's got.
He lived like a dog and died like a dog.
He lived without fear and died without fear!
Hell yeah, that sucker's stuff is mine!
He screwed up...
He was a good man, and good men are hard to come by...
He was a good man...
He was a sucker, and around here ain't no suckers...
He was healthy and strong while he wasn't catching bullets...
Hey, folks! I'm not far, I can help!
His eyes won't be opening any time soon.
Hot damn, he owes me money!
Huh... Well, Sidorovich, you still owe me even if I didn't kill him!
I'm gonna find whoever did this!
I'm gonna put that fucking asshole in a coffin!
I'm gonna tear those fuckers a new one after what they did to my friend!
I'm not far, I can help!
I bet my ass this ain't gonna be no good...
I don't understand shit.
I had a bad feeling about that guy. Good thing I wasn't nearby.
I knew that man. His passing was necessary.
I saw a pack of wild boars getting fat on radioactive wastes.
Is it true the Scorcher's up and running again? Man, no way to get to the Skadovsk...
I will find those scumbags and turn them inside out.
Fewer people, more air.
Let's have a drink in his memory!
Let's see how rich you were.
Let's take a look at his goodies.
Man, the kind of pigs that run around here! Who wants some hooves?
Man, we met him just yesterday. Poor guy.
Mutants, bandits, zombies, fanatics, soldiers... Man, everyone wants to get you.
Oh, sweet! Just had a contract on that guy, and he's already kicked the bucket. Less trouble for me!
One more, one less, hah!
Phew! Thank God I didn't go with him today. Didn't have a good feeling about it.
Poor guy...
Put him in a coffin, his body was resting peacefully, but not his dick...
Rest in peace, dude.
Rest in peace. He was a good stalker... I'll go get his PDA and leave the loot alone.
Right, let's check out the dead!
Sad to see this happening...
Serves him right!
Shit, looks like there's shooting nearby.
So, has anyone had time to get his stuff or not?
So, mister Bit-The-Dust, what stuff you got for us?
So, what's the fella got in his pockets?
Stop clogging the channel! A man just died.
Such a pity...
That's how it is.
That's one less.
That's one less old-timer.
That's the end of you, scum.
That's what happens to show-offs.
That boy got trashed so bad...
The boy got wasted...

They killed him!
They killed that guy!
Those idiots had it coming.
Those jackals have gone insane, it's about time we waste 'em!
Time to collect some loot!
Uh, what happened here?
Well, he's left this world to go to another. Amen!

Well, he died, so what? And by the way, if you need work, go to Sakharov in Yantar. He pays great money for mutant parts! His assistant Semenov could also use some help, he always needs help with studying monsters.
Well, he died. Happens to everyone.
Well, lads, should we drink to the soul of the fallen?
Well, well! What do we have here?
Well, well...
Well? Who's gonna help me get those rats?
We were telling stories by the campfire, and now this happens...

What an unlucky dude...
What can I say? Sucker as always.

What do we do with the loot?
What the fuck...
What the hell, they killed such a nice guy?
When the hell is it gonna end?!...
Why do people shoot at each other? It's already hard enough staying alive around here!
Better go grab his shit before someone else does.
Shit, I heard that one from here!
Another day, another corpse...
A guy died, shit happens. We'll be following him sooner or later anyway.
Ah, the amount of lives the Zone has taken...
Another one gone as mutant food...
Another one waltzing into the Zone, are they ever going to learn? Everybody knows better than going there alone!
Are they infants? Can't even kill a mutant...
Can't take one step without stumbling upon those mutants!
Careful, stalkers! Looks like the mutants are getting all aggressive now that they've got a new den. Best stay away than go charging in like the fucking Superman!
Damn, lots of crows around. Must be corpses stinking somewhere. Take care.
Damn... That's what you get for looting. What a fate.
Fuck, another sod gone.
Fuck, guys, I knew him. We were drinking together just yesterday, and now this happens...
Mutant food?!
Guys! People are dropping like flies, and Duty still says they've cleaned up the territory! Ain't that a bitch?
He was a good man, took a lot of risks and lifted our spirits during hard times... Rest in peace, my stalker brother!
He was a good man...
I'd rip those monsters' balls out so they won't be breeding again!
I'm curious, what kind of creature did that?
I'm freaking out... He said it was safe here... I was lucky refusing to go with him at the last moment, otherwise I'd probably be lying there too...
I found a body! Nobody deserves a death like this.
It's never fun when a stalker gets taken by a mutant... even if he's an enemy.
I told everybody the place was off limits with those things about! Hasn't anybody shared that on the net?
I told him the place was crawling with those bastards! He wouldn't listen, and now this happens to him...
I was lucky to avoid that place!
Just killed a hell of a hog! Got ten kilos of just the hooves!
Killing those bastards left and right, and they only get stronger...
Loser...
Men, I'm fucking pissed at these things...
Men, take note: only a bullet in the head can stop a bloodsucker.
PM me! Let's raid some mutants.
Poor guy got ripped in half! I'd rather shoot myself in the head...
Seen a horde of hogs getting fat on radioactive treats...
Serves him right!
So horrible...
So sad...
That goof couldn't even fight off a hog!
That reminds me of a funny story...
The monster just mutilated him.
This really sucks, people. I hope the poor guy didn't suffer too much...
Those mutants are everywhere now!
Those mutants got downright nasty. I'll go ping Duty about the mess they made.
We cleared the place just yesterday, should have made a trail... Fuck...
Well, fuck that guy!
Well, let's drink to the soul of that man!
Well, that's another one gone. Let our guys know to watch out for mutants.
Well, where did he get mutilated? Gotta note the coordinates...
What's here to say... He was a sucker.
What's there to say? The Zone sure ain't the place for taking a stroll.
What a horrible death! Hope the guy didn't suffer a lot...
What the hell is going on...?
Woah, that man was out of luck!
Woo, check out these hogs! Anybody need a hoof?
You're saying a beast got him?
Did they actually die? ...Or just join the zombies?
Everybody's heading there sooner or later.
You'll be remembered...
Rest in peace.
Lost to the Zone...
Let's have a drink in their memory!
Poor guys...
Should've been more careful. Too late now.
You get used to this after every emission.
People keep getting caught in those storms, many just don't make it.
They didn't make it in time, poor guys...
That's why you should be fast and aware people.
They got fried...
They should've found shelter. The Zone takes no prisoners...
The Zone doesn't forgive mistakes. They paid the price.
One minute you're here, the next you're ash in the wind.
They underestimated the storm. A fatal mistake.
Never outrun the Zone's wrath... a lesson learned too late.
The Zone doesn't warn twice. Rest in peace, wanderer.
Trapped outside during a surge? That's a death sentence.
It happens to the best of us... the Zone always wins.
The Zone demands sacrifice, and today it claimed another.
One more gone. The Zone doesn't play fair.
They misjudged the surge. Now they're part of the Zone.
No one survives the Zone's fury for long.
Their last mistake was ignoring the warning signs.
The surge got them before they could get to safety. Tragic.
A cruel end, but that's life in the Zone.
They gambled with the Zone and lost.
Another victim of the Zone's unpredictable wrath...
You'd think people would learn to respect the Zone by now...
The surge doesnt care who you are. It takes everything in its path.
Every surge leaves fewer survivors. This time was their turn.
The Zone's storms are unforgiving. They'll be missed.
A sad fate, but in the Zone, its just another day...
Rest easy, brave soul. The Zone claimed you too soon.
The surge hit harder than they expected. They didn't stand a chance.
Too slow, too careless... the Zone always collects its due.
Their story ends here, but the Zone goes on.
They got caught in the crossfire of the Zone's power.
Fried stalkers, everybody!
My lucky day! I just found a $what.
Anyone know the going rate for a $what?
A $what! Maybe I can finally retire!
Sakharov will want his hands on this $what!
You won't believe it, I just stumbled upon a $what!
A $what? Now that's what I call a jackpot!
Looks like my lucks finally turning around found a $what.
Time to hit the bar! This $what is gonna make me rich!
Found a $what... who wants to trade?
This $what is going straight to the highest bidder.
I cant believe my eyes its a $what!
Guess who's making bank? Found a $what!
Finally, something worthwhile a genuine $what!
Found a $what just lying there. Someone's loss is my gain!
It's not every day you find a $what in this cursed Zone.
They said the Zone was empty here... then I found a $what!
I wonder what this $what can do. Any experts around?
The Zone provides... this $what proves it!
Stalkers dream come true a $what in my hands!
Well, that was unexpected a $what out here in the wild!
A $what? I must be the luckiest stalker alive today!
Vodka's on me tonight boys.. I found at $what!
Looks like my luck turned around a $what just for me!
This $what? Worth more than my entire gear. What a find!
I bet this $what will fetch a good price at the bar.
How does one even stumble upon a $what? Feels like the Zones blessing me.
Holding a $what feels surreal. Guess today wasnt a total loss.
I could retire on this $what... or at least afford some new boots.
Anyone know the best buyer for a $what? I want top rubles for this one.
Just found a $what. Makes all the mutant fights feel worth it.
I heard $whats were rare, but here I am holding one. Feels good.
Do $whats glow like this? Because mine is lighting up the whole area!
Another day in the Zone, another $what in my pack.
Got a $what today. Feels like the Zone just gave me a pat on the back.
A $what this pristine? Someone upstairs likes me.
Even the anomalies couldn't keep me away from this $what. Worth every risk.
The $what practically called to me. I swear I heard it hum as I got closer.
This $what was buried deep in an anomaly. Took everything I had to pull it out alive.
I dont know what this $what is made of, but its heavier than my entire pack. Worth it though.
This $what has markings on it Ive never seen before. Almost looks... alien.
Found a $what in the middle of a bloodsucker lair. Either Im brave or stupid. Probably both.
They say the Zone hides treasures, but this $what? This is beyond anything I imagined.
This $what was pulsing with energy when I grabbed it. My Geiger counter nearly exploded!
Who needs a map when the Zone itself leads you to a $what like this?
The $what wasnt alone. Found it next to the remains of a stalker who clearly wasnt so lucky.
Ever seen a $what glow like a small sun? This ones brighter than my future.
I dont trust this $what. Feels like its watching me, waiting for something.
The $what came with a price. Lost half my ammo just fighting off the mutants guarding it.
Is it possible for a $what to be cursed? Feels like bad luck followed me since I picked it up.
Snork tracks led me to this $what. Who knew those things could guide treasure hunts?
The $what vibrates when I hold it. Like its alive, or maybe just eager to leave the Zone.
My hands tingled when I touched the $what. Not sure if its radiation or something... stranger.
Traders will fight over this $what. I just have to make it back alive to cash in.
This $what feels... ancient. Like its seen more than I ever will.
Found the $what near an electro anomaly. Its almost like it was born from it.
My detector went crazy before I spotted the $what. Thought it was broken. Turns out, it was jackpot time.
A $what like this could make or break a fortune. Lets hope its the former.
Spotted the $what by sheer chance. Almost walked right past it in the mist.
The $whats edges are smooth, almost unnatural. I cant stop staring at it.
I had to fight off three other stalkers for this $what. Guess whos still standing?
This $what has a faint hum thats oddly soothing. Probably shouldnt trust it though.
When I picked up the $what, the air felt heavier. Maybe Im imagining things, or maybe not.
The $what was sitting in a patch of green anomaly fog. Had to risk it, and now Im rich.
This $whats unlike any artifact Ive seen before. Even the veterans will be impressed.
The $what feels warm to the touch. Doesnt seem natural, does it?
A $what in the middle of nowhere? Either the Zones feeling generous or its baiting me.
Looks like Ive hit the artifact lottery. This $what will fund my next few months at least.
Whoever left this $what out here must have had a death wish. Glad I dont.
This $what just might be my ticket out of the Zone for good. Heres hoping.
The $what was hidden inside a rusted-out tank. Looks like no ones touched it for decades.
Found the $what in the middle of an anomaly cluster. Feels like its been waiting there just for me.
Stalkers say the $what glows brightest under moonlight. Guess I got lucky finding it during the day.
I swear, the $what was calling my name. You dont ignore a sign like that.
The $what has strange inscriptions on it. Looks like a language Ive never seen before.
Found the $what near a crashed helicopter. Looks like it was the pilots last treasure.
This $what seems to vibrate faintly, like its alive. Makes me a little uneasy.
Snatched this $what right out of a bloodsuckers nest. Yeah, Im that bold.
This $what was in a pool of boiling liquid. Still cant believe I got it out intact.
The $what changes color depending on how I hold it. What kind of artifact does that?
My Geiger counter maxed out near this $what. Pretty sure its not safe, but who cares?
The $what was buried under some old bones. Creepy, but profitable.
Traders will go crazy over this $what. Just need to figure out how to price it right.
My flashlight flickered when I picked up the $what. Its definitely not ordinary.
The $what is warm to the touch, like its holding onto some strange energy.
I nearly walked past the $what. Something made me turn back. Glad I did.
The $what glows faintly even in pitch darkness. Its almost hypnotic.
This $what feels heavier than it looks. Like its packed with something dense.
Found the $what right where two anomalies were colliding. Not an easy grab, but worth it.
The $what left scorch marks on the ground where I found it. Now thats power.
When I picked up the $what, I swear the air got colder. What is this thing?
The $what was lodged in a tree trunk. Looks like the tree grew around it.
This $what buzzes faintly in my pocket, like its alive. Im not sure if I like that.
The $what has a strange pattern etched into it. Could be valuable, or just dangerous.
Found the $what in a crater. Mustve been sitting there since the first disaster.
This $what makes my skin tingle when I hold it. Not sure if thats a good thing.
The $what feels like its vibrating. Not sure what that means, but it cant be normal.
Stalkers say the $what has healing properties. Guess Ill test that theory later.
The $what gave off a faint glow even through my backpack. Traders will love this.
This $what nearly blinded me when I found it. Thats gotta mean its valuable, right?
The $what was surrounded by a pack of mutants. Took a lot of bullets to make it mine.

This $what radiates heat. Even in this freezing weather, it keeps me warm.

Lucky guy!

Son of a bitch...

Congrats, my friend.
You serious?!
