Theres a job from %s floating around. Sounds like something only a fool would take. You sure you're up for it?
%s has a new job. Could be risky, but whos to say? If youve survived this long, maybe youre the right person for it.
Word is, %s has a lead on a hidden artifact stash. Could be a wild goose chase, but fortune favors the bold.
Heard %s is organizing a raid into the Red Forest. Only the brave or the foolish would join that expedition.
%s is looking for someone to escort them through the Garbage. Watch out for bandits; theyve been active lately.
Rumor has it %s needs a guide to the Brain Scorcher. Not a journey for the faint-hearted.
%s is seeking a partner to explore the catacombs beneath Pripyat. Dark, dangerous, and potentially rewarding.
They say %s has a map leading to a secret lab in Yantar. Could be a goldmine of artifactsor a death trap.
%s is recruiting stalkers for a mission to disable a Monolith outpost. High risk, high reward.
Heard %s needs someone to retrieve a package from the Dark Valley. Expect heavy resistance.
%s is offering good money for anyone willing to scout the outskirts of Limansk. Mutant activity is off the charts there.
Rumor has it %s wants to broker a truce between Duty and Freedom. Good luck with that.
%s is assembling a team to investigate strange emissions near the CNPP. Sounds like a one-way ticket.
They say %s has a plan to infiltrate a military checkpoint. Stealth and nerves of steel required.
%s is looking for a tech-savvy stalker to hack into a secretive factions comms. Discretion advised.
Heard %s needs a courier to deliver supplies to a stranded group in the Swamps. Anomalies are rampant there.
%s is seeking volunteers to clear out a mutant nest in Agroprom. Hazard pay included.
Rumor has it %s has a lead on a rare artifact in the Wild Territory. Expect competition from other stalkers.
%s is organizing a convoy to transport goods through the Army Warehouses. Bandit ambushes are a given.
They say %s needs someone to sabotage a rival factions equipment in Rostok. Stealth operators preferred.
%s is offering a hefty sum for anyone who can capture a live Bloodsucker. Proceed with extreme caution.
Heard %s wants to map out new anomaly fields in the Red Forest. A perilous endeavor, to say the least.
%s is assembling a rescue team for missing stalkers near the Jupiter Plant. Time is of the essence.
Word is %s wants a sample of mutant tissue from the Red Forest. Just hope you dont end up becoming mutant chow.
%s claims to have found a stash in the Garbage. Now theyre looking for someone to help retrieve it without attracting too much attention.
Heard %s needs someone to track a rogue stalker near the Zaton swamps. Dont expect it to be a friendly chat.
%s is putting together a group to investigate strange noises coming from the Dead City. Sounds like a trap if you ask me.
Rumor has it %s is looking for an escort to Pripyat. Dangerous road, but the pay might be worth it.
%s is after intel on Monolith movements in the Radar area. Spying on those fanatics? Thats a death wish.
They say %s needs help smuggling gear past the military cordons. Stealth is key, unless you like dodging bullets.
%s is asking for volunteers to repair a downed radio tower in Jupiter. Anomalies make it a risky climb, though.
Heard %s is paying handsomely for an artifact from the Burnt Fuzz anomaly. Getting it? Thats the tricky part.
%s has a job for someone willing to infiltrate Freedoms base. Whether you get out alive is another matter.
Rumor has it %s needs to recover documents from a crashed helicopter near the Swamps. Better watch out for snorks.
%s is seeking a bodyguard for a trek through Rostok. Bandits and mutants? Just another day in the Zone.
%s has put out a call for stalkers to scout new anomaly fields in Limansk. Big risks, bigger rewards.
They say %s wants someone to deliver a message to the Monolith zone. Dangerous terrain for a simple delivery.
%s is looking for a hunter to bring back proof of a Controller kill. Not a job for the faint-hearted.
Heard %s is searching for a missing friend near the Army Warehouses. Could be a rescueor recovery mission.
%s wants someone to clear out a bloodsucker lair in Darkscape. Hazard pay included, naturally.
Rumor has it %s is tracking down a rare artifact in Yantar. The kind of job that makes legendsor corpses.
%s is organizing an ambush against Duty patrols in the Cordon. Could spark something bigger, though.
They say %s is looking for a relic from a forgotten lab. The Zone doesnt give up its secrets easily.
%s needs help dealing with a rogue scientist in Jupiter. Secrets, lies, and dangerwhat else is new?
Heard %s wants a live pseudodog for some experiment. Catching it is one thing, surviving it is another.
%s is hiring for a covert op in the Dead City. Nobody knows the target, but its bound to be messy.
%s is searching for a rare mutant egg in the Red Forest. The Zones nastiest predators guard those.
Rumor has it %s has a plan to disrupt military supply lines in the Garbage. Expect retaliation if it succeeds.
%s is willing to pay top rubles for someone to map the anomalies near the Brain Scorcher. Hazardous work, no doubt.
They say %s needs a courier to deliver supplies to a Freedom outpost. Bandits love those supply runs, though.
%s is assembling a team to scout out an abandoned lab beneath Rostok. The kind of job that changes you forever.
%s wants help planting explosives near a Monolith shrine. You might want to bring extra ammo for this one.
Heard %s has a lead on a hidden stash in Pripyat. Hidden for a reason, thoughexpect company.
Rumor has it %s needs a guide through anomaly clusters near the Jupiter Plant. One wrong step and its all over.
%s is offering a reward for someone brave enough to set up sensor equipment in the Cordon. Anomalies wont make it easy.
%s has been talking about a supply cache near the Generators. Getting to it alive? Thats the real challenge.
They say %s is hiring someone to retrieve old documents from X-16. Hope youve got a strong stomach for what youll find.
%s is looking for someone to set up surveillance on a bandit hideout. Dont get caught snooping.
Heard %s needs backup for a raid on a Freedom supply convoy. Sounds like a powder keg waiting to explode.
Rumor is %s wants a guide through the Electro anomaly fields. Dont fry yourself in the process.
%s has been asking about a missing artifact hunter in the Dark Valley. Bring a weaponand maybe a friend.
%s needs someone to track a mutant pack roaming near the Cordon. Sounds easy until they surround you.
Apparently, %s has a bounty on a rogue Duty officer. Carefulthose guys dont mess around.
%s is desperate for someone to secure an artifact near the Heat anomaly. The Zone doesnt forgive recklessness.
Heard %s is trying to salvage gear from a sunken boat in Zaton. Swamps, mutants, and radiationwhats not to love?
They say %s wants help defending a rookie camp near the Cordon. Bandits wont wait for you to be ready.
%s is asking for a daring stalker to repair a damaged generator in Radar. Good luck dodging the Monolith patrols.
%s has a lead on a hidden bunker in Yantar. You might want to double-check your filters before going in.
Rumor has it %s is paying for any documents linked to the Monoliths origins. Expect trouble if theyre guarded.
%s is looking for a courier to deliver a "special package" to Dead City. The kind of delivery that could cost your life.
They say %s needs a scout to map radiation hotspots in the Garbage. Stay sharp, and keep moving.
%s is asking for help to secure a Freedom hideout under siege. Just dont expect a warm welcome from Duty.
%s needs someone to capture a mutated boar alive. Ever wrestled a mutant? Its exactly as bad as it sounds.
Heard %s is planning a raid on a bandit warehouse. Hope you like the odds stacked against you.
Apparently, %s wants help cataloging anomaly zones in Jupiter. Lets just say the data wont collect itself.
%s has been offering a bounty on a particularly nasty chimera near the Swamps. Sounds like a one-way trip to me.
%s is recruiting for an assault on the Agroprom Research Institute. High risk, but even higher rewards.
Rumor is %s found something strange in the Dead City. Strange usually means dangerous in this place.
%s wants someone to infiltrate a Monolith stronghold and bring back intel. Sounds insane, but the pay is tempting.
They say %s needs help recovering a downed drone in Yantar. Avoiding the mutants is easier said than done.
Heard %s is looking for someone to deal with mercenaries in Jupiter. Could be a long, bloody day.
%s is paying for someone to collect rare herbs from the Swamps. Who knew the Zone had botanical enthusiasts?
%s is looking for a stalker to escort a scientist to the Brain Scorcher. Better you than me.
%s has been talking about a stash hidden deep in the Red Forest. Makes you wonder why they havent retrieved it themselves.
%s is gathering intel on mutant migration patterns in Zaton. Sounds like a lot of running involved.
Rumor has it %s is trying to bribe the military for safe passage. Thats a game with high stakes.
They say %s is organizing an expedition to an abandoned underground bunker. Could be treasureor a trap.
%s wants a blood sample from a mutant found near Jupiter. Hope you can extract it without becoming the next meal.
I saw a stalker in a helmetless SEVA around Agroprom the other day. Isn't that the kind of suit Strelok wears?
The folks I met last night mentioned that a legendary stalker has made his way back to the Zone. He's the one who shut down the Brain Scorcher a few years ago.
Can someone fill me in about this Strelok guy? I keep hearing a lot about him recently.

If the rumours are true, Ukraine's chief scientific consultant recently fled back into the Zone. He goes under the pseudonym of "Strelok". There're a lot of stories surrounding this guy, but what's his business this time?
Heard some chatter about a stalker whos been spotted in the Wild Territory. They say he has a notebook full of old artifacts and experiments. Sounds like a treasure hunt waiting to happen.
Theres talk of a new artifact hunter near Jupiter. Word is, hes been pulling strange items out of the anomaly fields, but no one knows how hes doing it.
I overheard a group saying that someone in the Red Forest has been getting really close to the truth behind the Zone's origin. I wonder if its worth checking out.
Some guy in the bar was ranting about how he saw someone from the old military faction. Havent seen one of them in ages. Whats he up to here?
I heard a stalker by the name of Boris is getting closer to the truth about the Monolith. The guys a bit of a nutcase, but maybe hes onto something.
Word is, theres a rogue scientist hiding out by Yantar. They say hes been experimenting with the radiation there and might have found something big. Too bad he wont talk to anyone.
I heard about a group heading into the Dark Valley. Theyre searching for old military intel, but who knows what else theyre after. Theres always a catch with these types.
Theres a stalker whos been seen wandering around Cordon. Hes got a strange, glowing artifact, and I cant shake the feeling its more dangerous than it looks.
Rumor has it that a group of bandits is sitting on something powerful in the Garbage. Its not just another stash, trust me.
Someone told me theres a hermit living near the Agroprom. They say hes been gathering old maps of the Zone. He might know where to find the most hidden anomalies.
Im telling you, theres a guy with a strange accent whos been talking about a second Brain Scorcher. He says its somewhere deep in the Zone, but I wouldnt trust him.
Theres a stalker named Kovalsky whos been looking for help near the Army Warehouse. Hes convinced theres a hidden military base out there. Should we help him find it?
Some say theres a big stash of weapons hidden inside the old factory by Yantar. But every time someone gets close, they disappear without a trace. Sounds like another one of those cursed places.
I overheard someone say that the leader of the Duty faction has gone rogue and is hiding out by the swamp. Could be a trap, but Id still be curious to check it out.
Apparently, a stalkers been spotted near Pripyat, digging around old military bunkers. Could be just another treasure hunter, or something bigger.
I was talking to a trader, and he said theres a stalker whos been mapping out anomalies in the Chernobyl area. Id pay to know what hes discovered.
Seems like theres a new mercenary in the Zone. Hes been hanging around Zaton, but no ones seen him do anything useful. Maybe hes after something.
Apparently, theres a dead zone near the X-18 lab. Its been there for years, but no ones been able to enter it. Some people are starting to say it might be worth risking it.
They say theres an old stalker wandering the outskirts of the Dark Valley. Hes seen some stuff, but doesnt talk much. Could be worth finding out what he knows.
A bunch of scavengers are getting bold, searching around the ruined buildings in Rostok. Theyre after something big, but Im not sure its worth the risk.
Some new stalkers been bragging about a mission to the NPP. He claims theres a treasure hoard hidden there. I dont buy it, but maybe its worth checking out.

Anyone heard about that stalker by the name of Orlov? Hes been walking around with a strange device, talking about crossing into other dimensions. Sounds insane, but I wouldnt want to miss out if hes onto something.
Someone said a rogue scientist has made a break from the Lab, headed towards the Dead City. Who knows what secrets hes hiding. But hes not the type to share them easily.
I heard a stalker got his hands on an old military-grade scanner. They say its capable of detecting the rarest artifacts. Bet that thing would make a nice find.
Theres talk about a group thats been trying to find the Heart of the Zone. No ones come back from that mission, but Ive got a feeling its worth checking out.
A stalker with a very peculiar suit has been seen near the Cordon. Its unlike anything Ive ever seen before. Could be an experiment gone wrong, or maybe something from the old world.
I overheard that a local trader was selling old weapons from the military stash at Zaton. Sounds like the real deal, but who knows if theyre reliable?
Theres a hermit out by the Swamps whos been talking about seeing something strange near the power plant. Could be another one of those damn anomalies, or something far worse.
Word is, a stalker found a hidden passage in the Red Forest. Could be a shortcut, or a death trap. Who's willing to find out?
Heard about a group planning to raid the old hospital in Pripyat. They say it's haunted, but the loot might be worth the scare.
Someone spotted a strange glow near the Brain Scorcher. Anomalies acting up, or something more sinister? Only one way to know.
A loner claims he saw a ghostly figure by the Claw Anomaly. Hallucination, or a new threat in the Zone?
There's talk of a hidden lab beneath the Agroprom. Uncharted territory means untold dangersand rewards.
Rumor has it, a stalker tamed a pseudodog. If true, that's one hell of a companionor a ticking time bomb.
They say the Monolith is recruiting again, offering "enlightenment." Sounds like a fast track to losing your mind.
A trader's offering big bucks for a live snork. Catching one? Easier said than done.
Someone found an old map marking a stash in the Dead City. Could be a goldmine, if the mutants don't get you first.
Heard there's a new faction calling themselves "The Reclaimers." Their goal? To cleanse the Zone of all intruders. Watch your back.
A stalker claims he communicated with a controller without losing his mind. If true, that's a game changeror pure madness.
There's a bounty on a bloodsucker that's been terrorizing the Garbage. High risk, but the pay's tempting.
Someone's been broadcasting strange signals from the old Jupiter plant. Could be a trap, or a call for help.
They say an artifact appeared in the center of the Great Swamp. Problem is, it's surrounded by a new kind of anomaly.
A group of stalkers vanished near the Iron Forest. No traces left, just their echoes on the PDA network.
There's talk of a hidden oasis in the Zone that heals all wounds. Sounds like a fairy tale, but who wouldn't want to find it?
Heard a mercenary's offering safe passage to the center of the Zone. Question is, can you trust him?
Someone spotted a pack of blind dogs acting strangely near the Army Warehouses. Could be nothing, or a sign of something worse.
There's a rumor about a weapon that never jams, hidden in the Dark Valley. Worth a look for any serious stalker.
A stalker claims he found a way to predict emissions. If he's right, that knowledge is priceless.
They say the Zone's expanding, swallowing villages overnight. If true, nowhere's safe anymore.
A wandering stalker says he saw an artifact hovering above the scorched trees near Limansk. Its either a jackpot or your last sight.
Rumors of an underground black market at Yanov Station are spreading. They say you can trade anythingif you can afford the price.
A group of rookies found a stash of old Soviet documents in the Darkscape. Some claim they reveal secrets about the Zone's origin.
Someone mentioned strange noises near the Circus Anomaly, like whispers. Either its the wind, or the Zones playing tricks again.
A stalker swears he saw two controllers fighting near Radar. If true, what could have caused that?
There's a new gang around the Garbage, calling themselves the "Ragged Wolves." Theyre taking no prisoners, so tread carefully.
Some old-timer claims he buried a fortune in artifacts near the Truck Cemetery. But hes keeping the exact spot to himselffor now.
A stalker vanished after taking on a contract to investigate the Witch Circle anomaly. His PDA signal just stopped mid-transmission.
A trader in Skadovsk is offering a strange map for sale. He says it leads to an untouched stash from before the first emission.
There's chatter about a mysterious figure in black seen wandering near the Barrier. No one who approached him has returned.
Rumor has it that the Duty faction is planning a major operation in the Red Forest. No word on their target yet.
A rookie claims he saw a floating sphere of light near the Great Swamps. He said it whispered his name before disappearing.
Someones been sabotaging stalker camps near the Garbage. People are saying its a bandit with a grudgeor something worse.
There's a bounty for anyone who can track down a rogue scientist who fled Yanov with classified research. Hes rumored to be hiding in the Zones depths.
A stalker bragged about an artifact so powerful it could nullify gravity. Hes offering it for sale, but the price is steepand who knows if its real?
Someone spotted blood trails leading into the old mine near the Dark Valley. No ones been brave enough to follow them yet.
They say theres a new kind of anomaly near Jupiter. It swallows everythinglight, sound, even thought. Enter at your own risk.
Reports of mutants acting strangely have been coming in from the Dead City. Some say theyre grouping up, planning something.
A trader at the Bar is offering a rare rifle in exchange for a specific artifact. He wont say what it is, but it must be valuable.
Theres word of a stalker who walked into the Brain Scorcher and came back alive. No ones dared to ask him how.
A scientist in the Zone is paying handsomely for anyone who can bring him samples of the Psi-Mutants brain. Good luck with that.
Someone claims theres a shortcut through the CNPP that leads straight to the Wish Granter. Sounds too good to be true, right?
They say an ancient machine lies buried under Rostok. Some think its a weapon, others a key to the Zone itself.
A pack of mutated boars has taken over the Garbage. Clearing them out could earn you some goodwilland a decent payday.
There's a rumor about a Monolith splinter group trying to defect. If true, theyll need helpand protection.
Some stalkers claim to have found a way into Pripyat without passing through the main routes. If it's real, theyre keeping it quiet.
Heard about a bloodsucker alpha roaming the Agroprom tunnels? Its bigger, faster, and deadlier than the rest.
Rumor has it that Freedom has developed a new drug to resist Psi-emissions. Only problemtheyre not sharing it outside their ranks.
A stalker claims he saw a mutant that looked like a child near the Red Forest. No ones sure what to make of it.
Theres a bounty for anyone who can bring back proof of the Chimera Queen. If shes real, that proof might be your last act.
A Monolith zealot was spotted wandering alone near Zaton, mumbling about the True Zone. If you ask me, thats bad news.
A rookie found an artifact that emits a faint hum. He says its harmless, but others claim its changing him.
A loner swears he saw a poltergeist juggling artifacts near the Old Hospital. Either hes crazy, or its the weirdest treasure guardian Ive heard of.
A trader at the Bar is offering a huge payout for anyone who can retrieve a lost black box from a downed military chopper in the Red Forest. Watch your back out there.
They say a mutant resembling a human but with glowing eyes has been spotted near Pripyat. No one knows what it is, and no ones brave enough to get close.
A Freedom stalker claims he found an entire graveyard of rusted tanks in the Great Swamps. He thinks theres something valuable hidden in their wreckage.
Anyone seen that old stalker named Semyon? He claimed to have a map to a stash buried under the CNPP itself. Now hes missing, and his maps gone too.
Some stalkers have been finding strange, egg-like artifacts near the Witches Jelly anomaly. No one knows what they do, but one exploded when a rookie touched it.
Theres a story about a stalker who shot a snork, only to have it laugh at him before vanishing. Either hes losing it, or the Zones playing games.
Word is, a stash of old Soviet gold bars is hidden somewhere in the tunnels under Agroprom. But whoever goes in looking for it rarely comes back out.
A heavily armored stalker was seen near the Brain Scorcher. Some think hes from an old military unit, others say hes something worse.
Theres a strange plant growing near the Bloodsucker Village. Locals claim its sap can heal wounds, but it attracts mutants like flies to honey.
A stalker found an ancient journal near the Dead City. The last entry talks about a living shadow stalking the Zone. Makes your skin crawl, doesnt it?
They say a military faction is running secret experiments in the Dark Valley. Whatever theyre cooking up, its making the mutants more aggressive.
Have you heard about the ghost lights in the Great Swamps? Some say theyre anomalies, others say theyre lost souls. Either way, dont follow them.
A loner claims to have seen a massive claw mark etched into a boulder near the Army Warehouses. Whatever did it wasnt friendly.
Theres a strange echoing sound coming from the old radar station at Jupiter. Its driving nearby stalkers mad, but no one can find its source.
Rumor has it that Monolith fighters are carrying a new type of weaponsomething that doesnt use bullets. Whatever it is, its deadly.
Someone claims theres a massive, pulsating crystal growing in the center of an anomaly near Limansk. They call it The Heart of the Zone.
A group of rookies stumbled onto a mutant nest in the Garbage. The poor fools didnt even have time to scream.
Theres talk of an old bunker under Rostok filled with pre-Zone artifacts. But they say its guarded by something inhuman.
A trader in Zaton is paying top dollar for bloodsucker fangs. Why? No ones brave enough to ask.
A Freedom scout swears he saw an anomaly eating a tree in the Red Forest. He says it left behind nothing but a crater.
Some stalkers are saying the Zones emissions are getting stronger. If thats true, it could spell trouble for everyone.
A rookie claimed to have found a crystal-clear lake in the Zone. Problem is, anyone who goes looking for it never returns.
Theres a new stalker in the Zone who calls himself The Whisperer. They say he can predict emissions before they happen.
Someones been leaving cryptic messages in the old PDA networks. They mention the first spark. Whatever that means, it sounds ominous.
A stalker claims to have found a cave near Jupiter filled with glowing fungus. He says its like nothing hes ever seen before.
They say the Bandits are working on a deal with the Mercenaries. If thats true, things could get a lot more dangerous around here.
A stalker near Cordon says he saw a dog pack led by something twice their size. Whatever it was, it wasnt a regular mutant.
Have you heard the rumors about a Monolith fighter who turned on his own? They say hes trying to atone for what hes done.
Someone mentioned an old stash in the swamps near the Agroprom. But they say its guarded by something invisible.
A strange light has been seen moving through the hills near Radar at night. No ones been able to get close without vanishing.
A Freedom fighter claims to have seen a massive rift open near the Generators. Hes convinced it leads to another world.
Theres a rumor about a mutant that can mimic the appearance of a stalker. If true, trust no one.
Someone claims theres an artifact that emits a soothing hum but drains your strength the longer you hold it. Would you risk it?
They say an old Soviet scientists notes were found in the Dead City. They mention a Zone Containment Protocol.
Theres a tree in the Red Forest that bleeds. Stalkers say if you listen closely, you can hear it whisper your name.
A stalker came back from the Swamps with no eyes. He kept saying, It saw me first.
Somewhere near Pripyat, theres a door that leads to nowhere. They say those who open it dont come back.
The air near the Radar crackles at night. Some claim its just radiation. Others say its something alive.
A rookie found a photograph in an anomaly. The people in it... started moving.
They say theres a shadow that moves on its own near the Garbage. It doesnt like being followed.
A man in Rostok swears he saw himself standing in the distance. The other him just smiled and walked away.
Theres a tape recorder in the Wild Territory that plays a recording of your voice... before youve even spoken.
In the Dark Valley, some stalkers hear footsteps behind them. When they turn around, theres no one thereuntil the next night.
A bunker near Yantar has a mirror that doesnt reflect. People who look into it feel like somethings staring back.
They say if you whistle near the Brain Scorcher, something will whistle back. Its never a friendly sound.
A stalker said he saw stars moving in the daytime sky. When he pointed them out, they disappeared.
The fog in Zaton sometimes parts to reveal shapes that shouldnt exist. They dont stay long, but they leave marks.
Theres an old PDA message circulating that ends with, Turn around. If you do, youll wish you hadnt.
They say the Swamps are quieter than usual lately. The Zones never quiet unless its planning something.
Sometimes, in the Dead City, the lights come on in abandoned buildings. No ones ever brave enough to go inside and check.
A Monolith squad was seen walking backward into an anomaly, chanting in unison. Their voices didnt stop until hours later.
Some idiot tried trading a can of dog food for a full medkit. I mean, who even carries that stuff?
I saw a stalker arguing with a Bloodsucker about who had worse breath. The Bloodsucker walked away offended.
Someone tried to shoot an anomaly. I guess thats one way to waste ammo.
Heard a rookie ask if snorks could be trained as pets. Lets just say hes no longer asking questions...
Why do boars always charge? Because the Zone doesnt believe in personal space.
A trader told me his sausage is 100% mutant-free. I didnt ask which part of the mutant.
A stalker got drunk and tried to fistfight an anomaly. The anomaly won. Twice.
Someone said Duty and Freedom agreed on something. Turns out, it was just to hate on bandits.
A guy in Rostok started charging mutants toll fees to cross the road. He made 50 rubles and lost a leg.
A rookie asked if artifacts could be eaten for extra health. Now were all calling him Glowy.
My friend came back from his trip yesterday. He told me about some creepy guy who preached his group about a new clan. Called "Sin" or something. Did someone contact him before?
Did you guys meet this man before? He asked me to join his clan. They call themselves the "dark stalkers"... What the fuck is going on?
"We are the harbingers of a new age". These are the words of some sick fuck I met a few hours ago. Who is this guy? What does this even mean?
It seems that someone is recruiting members for an unknown side. They call themselves "Sin". I can't tell if this is some bad joke, but keep an eye for any suspicious stalkers you see.
Heard whispers about a new faction near the Red Forest. They call themselves "The Seekers," obsessed with uncovering the Zone's deepest secrets. Anyone know more?
Ran into a stalker who mentioned a group called "The Silent Watchers." They claim to observe anomalies without interference. Sounds like a dangerous game to me.
There's talk of a cult forming in the Swamps, worshipping the Zone as a living entity. They call themselves "The Living Echo." Anyone else heard of them?
Met a trader who mentioned a group called "The Forsaken." They operate in the Dark Valley, dealing in rare artifacts. Not sure if they're trustworthy.
Some stalkers are talking about a new faction called "The Reborn." They believe the Zone is a test, and only the pure will survive. Sounds like fanaticism to me.
Heard rumors of a group called "The Nomads." They don't stay in one place, moving through the Zone, collecting knowledge and artifacts. Wonder what they're after.
There's a new faction near Yantar calling themselves "The Enlightened." They claim to have found the true purpose of the Zone. Anyone know what that's about?
Met a stalker who mentioned a group called "The Outcasts." They operate in the outskirts of the Zone, helping those in need. Not sure if they're for real.
Heard about a faction called "The Vanguard." They believe in controlling the Zone's anomalies to harness their power. Sounds like a dangerous path to me.
Some stalkers are talking about a group called "The Guardians." They claim to protect the secrets of the Zone from outsiders. Wonder what they're hiding.
There's a new faction near the Agroprom called "The Seekers." They believe the Zone holds the key to humanity's evolution. Anyone know more?
Met a trader who mentioned a group called "The Wanderers." They travel the Zone, collecting artifacts and knowledge. Not sure if they're trustworthy.
Heard rumors of a cult forming in the Swamps, worshipping the Zone as a living entity. They call themselves "The Living Echo." Anyone else heard of them?
Some stalkers are talking about a new faction called "The Reborn." They believe the Zone is a test, and only the pure will survive. Sounds like fanaticism to me.
There's talk of a group called "The Nomads." They don't stay in one place, moving through the Zone, collecting knowledge and artifacts. Wonder what they're after.
Heard about a faction called "The Enlightened." They claim to have found the true purpose of the Zone. Anyone know what that's about?
Met a stalker who mentioned a group called "The Outcasts." They operate in the outskirts of the Zone, helping those in need. Not sure if they're for real.
There's a new faction near Yantar called "The Vanguard." They believe in controlling the Zone's anomalies to harness their power. Sounds like a dangerous path to me.
Some stalkers are talking about a group called "The Guardians." They claim to protect the secrets of the Zone from outsiders. Wonder what they're hiding.
There's a new faction near the Agroprom called "The Seekers." They believe the Zone holds the key to humanity's evolution. Anyone know more?
Met a trader who mentioned a group called "The Wanderers." They travel the Zone, collecting artifacts and knowledge. Not sure if they're trustworthy.
Heard about a faction called "The Nomads." They don't stay in one place, moving through the Zone, collecting knowledge and artifacts. Wonder what they're after.
Some stalkers are talking about a new faction called "The Reborn." They believe the Zone is a test, and only the pure will survive. Sounds like fanaticism to me.
There's talk of a group called "The Enlightened." They claim to have found the true purpose of the Zone. Anyone know what that's about?
Met a stalker who mentioned a group called "The Outcasts." They operate in the outskirts of the Zone, helping those in need. Not sure if they're for real.
Ran into some weird stalkers near Jupiter. They had markings on their suitscouldn't tell if it was paint or burns.
Someones leaving strange messages carved into trees near the Red Forest. Not sure if its a warning or an invitation.
Met a trader who claims to have seen a group carrying glowing artifacts into the Dead City. Sounds like trouble to me.
There's a rumor about an old train car near Zaton. They say it hums at night, and anyone who sleeps inside never wakes up.
Heard of "The Bleeding Path"? Some stalkers claim to have followed it through anomalies, but none of them came back right.
Somethings been circling the outskirts of the Agroprom lately. Stalkers keep saying its not human, but no ones seen it clearly.
Met a guy who claimed he found a "living" artifact that whispers to him. Not sure if hes insane or onto something big.
Ever hear of "The Black Caravan"? They say its a convoy of vehicles that appear out of nowhere, then vanish just as quick.
Ran into some Freedom guys talking about a tunnel that wasnt on any map. They didnt stick around long enough to explore it.
There's word of a Monolith faction that doesnt attack anyone. They just watch. Doesnt make it any less creepy.
Some old-timer swore he saw an anomaly near Rostok that "dripped" light. No ones dared to go check it out.
I heard theres a group in Pripyat trying to harness psi-emissions. Either theyre geniuses or suicidal. Probably both.
Someone mentioned seeing shadows moving differently than the people casting them. Theyre calling it the Reverse Zone.
There's an artifact circulating in the Bar thats supposedly cursed. Every buyer so far has disappeared.
Anyone seen the tower near the swamps? Its not on the maps, and Freedom guys swear it wasnt there a week ago.
Some Duty folks say theyve been hearing voices near their Rostok base. Not Monolith chattersomething older.
Theres a new guy claiming he saw a giant mutant with glowing eyes in the Cordon. Sounds like a tall tale, but who knows?
Someone found a notebook near Yantar. The last entry ends with I can hear it breathing.
There's talk of a zone in the Red Forest where compasses spin out of control. Freedoms sending someone to check it out.
Ever hear of the "White Haze"? Some stalkers say its an anomaly that only shows up during emissions.
A guy in Skadovsk claimed he heard laughter coming from an empty building. He packed up and left before anyone could check it out.
Some guy at the Bar swears he saw a stalker walking through an anomaly like it wasnt even there. Could be a trick or something else.
There's a rumor about an artifact near Zaton that emits a low hum. They say its been driving stalkers mad just by being near it.
Met a stalker talking about a ghost train that passes through the Garbage at midnight. He seemed convinced, but who knows?
Heard some Freedom boys talking about a hidden bunker in the Red Forest. They said it glows faintly at night. Creepy.
A trader near Yanov mentioned a mutant that only comes out during storms. Hes selling info on its whereabouts for a steep price.
Anyone else hear about the stalker who vanished near Yantar? His radio keeps broadcasting static, but no ones seen him since.
There's talk of a stalker group mapping out a safe route through anomalies in Pripyat. No word if theyre still alive to finish it.
Someone claimed to see a Monolith soldier crying in the Dead City. Said it didnt attackjust stood there, weeping. Whats that about?
A drunk at Skadovsk said he saw an artifact that sings when the wind hits it. Could be worth investigatingor not.
Theres a rumor about a Freedom scout who went looking for the Wish Granter. His radio signal is still active deep inside the Zone.
Some Monolith chatter hinted at a shard of the Monolith being lost near the Army Warehouses. Might be worth digging into.
Met a stalker who claimed to see a massive shadow circling over the swamps. No wings, no noise. Just moving.
Anyone else hear about the Zone Whisperer? They say he knows things no one should, but only speaks to the desperate.
A stalker mentioned finding a PDA near Rostok. The last message said, Dont follow the lights. Sounds like bait to me.
Theres word of a Monolith splinter group trading artifacts for information. Wonder what theyre trying to figure out.
Heard about a stash of pre-Zone documents hidden in the Agroprom. Problem is, the place is crawling with mutants.
Some trader claims theres an old army base in Pripyat that hasnt been scavenged. Sounds too good to be true, but whos checking?
Theres a man in the swamps who claims he can predict emissions. Problem is, he wont leave his shack to prove it.
Ran into a stalker near Yantar who said hed found an artifact that cures radiation sickness. He didnt look too healthy himself.
Theres a group of stalkers camping near the Brain Scorcher. Theyre convinced its about to activate again. Braveor stupid.
Ever hear of The Red Lantern? Supposedly, its an anomaly near Jupiter that only appears during emissions.
Someones leaving strange symbols carved into the rocks near the Dead City. No ones figured out what they mean yet.
A guy in the Bar says he saw a mutant that looked human, but its face wasnt right. He left his gear behind to get out alive.
Met a stalker who said he found a perfectly preserved Soviet flag deep in the Zone. Wonder what else is hiding out there.
Theres talk of a ghost convoy spotted near Zaton. Trucks rolling without drivers. Creepy as hell.
Freedom scouts mentioned seeing a glowing tree in the Red Forest. None of them wanted to get closer, though.
Some stalkers are talking about a hidden artifact market near the Cordon. If its real, its well-hidden.
A stalker swears he saw an entire Monolith patrol vanish into thin air near Pripyat. No bodies, no blood. Just gone.
Theres a cave near the swamps thats rumored to sing during the night. No ones stayed long enough to figure out why.
Met a guy who claims he saw a mutant digging graves near the Garbage. Hes not going back to confirm.
Theres a trader who swears he found a map of the Zone marked with hidden tunnels. Hes keeping the price high, though.
Someone spotted a Freedom stalker wearing an old military insignia. He didnt stick around to explain why.
Theres a rumor about a Zone Sage living near the Agroprom. They say he answers any question for a price.
They say theres a cave near Zaton where the air smells like blood, but no one can find a body. Just the echoes of screams.
In the Dead City, theres a well that whispers. Some say its calling out names, but no one dares to listen closely.
Freedom scouts near the Red Forest found a campfire that never burns out. There were no footprints around it, just ashes.
Heard of a stalker who ventured into Pripyat and came back with his eyes pitch black. He doesnt speak anymore.
Theres talk of a mutant in the Swamps that mimics the voices of lost loved ones. If you hear it, its already too late.
Near Yantar, theres a field where the wind never blows, but you can hear it whispering in your ears. People avoid it for a reason.
Some stalkers say theyve seen a shadow walking against the wind near the Brain Scorcher. They stopped following it when it turned and waved.
Theres a bunker in Rostok that locks from the inside. At night, you can hear scratching on the walls, but no ones ever come out.
A trader found a notebook near the Garbage. Every page was filled with the same words: Dont look back.
Somewhere in the Swamps, they found an old church bell that rings on its own. No one knows what its calling for.
Theres a stalker who claims he saw his reflection smile at him in a pool of anomaly water. He hasnt looked in a mirror since.
Heard about a Monolith patrol that disappeared near Pripyat. Their radios keep broadcasting, but only static mixed with faint whispers.
In the Army Warehouses, theres a tree that bleeds when you cut it. The sap smells like rust and death.
Freedom scouts say they saw a mutant in the Red Forest with no eyes but a mouth that never stopped moving. It didnt make a sound.
A stalker claims he found an artifact that moves on its own. When he touched it, he said he felt his heartbeat stop for a second.
Theres a spot in the Garbage where your shadow disappears. Stalkers say if you stay too long, you disappear too.
Some say theres a hidden tunnel in Yantar where the walls pulse like theyre alive. No one who enters ever comes back.
Some poor rookie in Rostok tried bartering an artifact for a bottle of vodka. Turns out, the artifact was just a rock. The bartender still took it!
Ever hear about the stalker who tried to tame a boar? Lets just say, the boar got the better end of that deal.
A trader in the Cordon swears by his anti-radiation socks. Dont ask what theyre made of. You dont want to know.
Someone in the Bar bet me 200 rubles they could chug a whole bottle of mutant vodka. Lets just say, theyre still sleeping it off in the corner.
Rumor has it, a stalker tried to use a snork head as a helmet. Worked until it started biting him. Idiot.
Heard a rookie asked Duty for a free sample of their guns. Last I saw, he was running faster than a blind dog.
Freedoms latest recruit claims he can outdrink anyone in the Zone. Too bad he passed out after half a bottle of vodka.
A stalker near Zaton tried cooking a flesh steak with an anomaly. He ended up cooking his PDA instead. Tasted terrible, apparently.
Theres a guy in Yantar whos convinced his backpack is haunted. Turns out, its just a rat he forgot to evict.
Someone thought itd be funny to replace a rookies medkit with a box of band-aids. He wasnt laughing when he actually needed it.
Theres a rumor about a secret passage in the Red Forest that leads to an untouched artifact stash. No ones come back to confirm it, though.
Some stalker claimed to see a mutant fight another mutant near Yantar. He couldnt decide which was scarier, so he just ran.
A guy at the Bar swears he found a PDA with coordinates to a stash near the Chernobyl NPP. The catch? It's buried under a pile of anomalies.
Heard about a trader offering an artifact detector thats just a Geiger counter with duct tape. Guess it works, sort of.
Theres a stalker wandering the Zone with a notebook full of sketches of anomalies. Hes either an artist or crazyor both.
Freedom scouts mentioned finding a weird glowing sphere in the Swamps. They were too freaked out to take it, though.
Anyone else hear about the stalker who found a mutant with a human-like face? Hes been quiet ever since.
Theres a guy in Rostok claiming he can predict emissions by smelling the air. Honestly, he might be onto something.
Some stalker near Agroprom swears he saw a chimera wearing what looked like a bandolier. Someone better check their stash.
A rumors going around about a trader with a lucky bulletproof vest. Too bad the last owner didnt survive to enjoy it.
Theres a stalker in the Garbage whos been offering radiation-proof goggles. Theyre just sunglasses, but hey, hes selling them.
Ever hear about the stash in Pripyat guarded by a pack of pseudo-dogs? They say its worth the risk if you can make it out alive.
Someone found an old Soviet medal in the Zone and swears its an artifact. Whatever helps you sleep at night, I guess.
Met a stalker who says hes been living off nothing but bread and vodka for months. Hes still alive, somehow.
Theres a Freedom guy offering anti-mutant spray for a hefty price. Its just cologne, but hey, it smells nice.
A stalker near Yantar says he found a talking artifact. Turned out it was just a broken PDA buried nearby.
Someone near Zaton swears they saw a chimera fighting with a controller. Too bad he didnt stick around to see who won.
A rumor says theres a hermit in the Dead City who can deactivate anomalies with his mind. Sounds like a load of crap to me.
A rookie claims he saw a snork playing with a ball near the Swamps. Yeah, sure, kid. Whatever you say.
Theres a stalker selling artifact insurance in Rostok. Not sure what that even means, but hes making a killing.
Heard about a trader offering an artifact detector that only works half the time. He says the other half, its just thinking.
Theres a rumor about a stash near Jupiter filled with old Soviet tech. No ones found it yet, though.
Met a stalker whos convinced his backpack is an artifact. Says it never gets wet. Sounds like a waterproof bag to me.
Anyone hear about the mutant near Agroprom wearing an old gas mask? Creepy as hell if you ask me.
Theres a guy in the Bar selling Zone souvenirs. Theyre just rocks, but hey, hes making money.
Some stalker in the Swamps is trying to train blind dogs. Lets just say its not going well.
Ever hear about the stash near the Red Forest thats only visible during emissions? Sounds like a bad idea waiting to happen.
Theres a Freedom guy who swears by his lucky shotgun. Too bad it jammed the last time he used it.
Met a rookie who tried to trade a pack of cigarettes for a medkit. He didnt understand why no one took the deal.
Theres a trader near Yanov selling Zone-proof boots. Theyre just regular boots dipped in wax, but they sell fast.
Heard about a stalker who thought he found an artifact but it was just a glowing rock. He still sold it for a good price.
Some Freedom guy claims hes seen a mutant wearing a Duty patch. Now thats something Id pay to see.
Theres talk about an artifact hidden deep within Reactor 4. They say its unlike anything else, but no ones made it out to prove it.
Met a stalker who claims the closer you get to the old reactors, the more the air seems to whisper. Creepy, if you ask me.
Some scientist said the radiation levels near the plant fluctuate unnaturally, like somethings still alive in there.
A Freedom scout swears they saw strange lights flickering around the reactors last night. Definitely not normal activity.
Theres a rumor about Monolith forces protecting a hidden chamber in the power plant. No one knows whats inside, though.
Ever hear about the ghost workers near Reactor 2? Stalkers say they see shadows moving where no one should be.
A trader near Yantar claims he has a map to a hidden vault beneath Reactor 3. The price? Enough rubles to make you rethink your life choices.
Someone mentioned hearing an old alarm blaring from the power plant. Thing is, the systems have been offline for decades.
We got some work people. Unidentified radio transmissions have been detected recently. I need volunteers to investigate the source. Details will be shared on meeting.
Veterans, we need volunteers to investigate the source of unidentified radio transmissions that have been detected recently. Details will be shared on meeting.
Stalkers, we are looking for volunteers to investigate the source of unidentified radio transmissions that have been detected recently by our scientists. Details will be shared on meeting.
Guys, we were able to detect unidentified radio transmissions. I need brave warriors to investigate the source. Meet me in the Warehouses for more details.
Unidentified radio transmissions have been detected recently. Our client wants to investigate the source in exchange of a good payment. Details will be shared on meeting.
Stalkers, unidentified radio transmissions have been detected recently. I'm looking for someone to investigate the source. Meet me in the Bunker and I will share details.
Now I've seen everything...
We made it guys, we survived the $what!
That was rough... are you okay, guys?!
Is everybody still alive?!
It's over, carry on people.
That was one hell of a $what...
It's over now... finally.
Shit, my teeth are still rattling! Everyone alright?
...oh man... my head...
All right, people. It's safe now.
We made it... but I can't shake off the feeling that something's still out there.
That was too close. Everyone still breathing?
Looks like the Zone has a way of keeping us on our toes. But we're still here. Somehow.
Survived... but I can still feel the air crackling. Anyone else?
That surge left my nerves fried. It's finally over, but I cant help but wonder whats next...
We survived... but did we? Something feels off, like the Zone's just waiting for us to drop our guard.
Holy shit, did anyone else see that? It's quiet, but I don't trust this silence.
Is it just me, or is the ground still shaking a little? Maybe the worst is yet to come...
We made it through the worst of it... or did we? Something tells me this isnt over.
The storm has passed, but Im not sure the Zone will ever let us rest easy again.
It's quiet now... too quiet. Dont let your guard down, stalkers.
Well, that was something. Ill never get used to that feeling... but we live another day.
We survived the surge, but who knows whats waiting out there. Stay sharp, stalkers.
I think the worst is over, but my heads still spinning. Anyone else feeling this aftershock?
The airs thick, like its clinging to my skin. What the hell just happened?
That surge was different more violent, more alive. Somethings changed out there.
Made it through another one, but my Geiger counter's losing its mind. This cant be good.
The surges energy felt... directed, almost purposeful. Ive got a bad feeling about this.
Who else felt the ground move during that? It wasnt just me, right?
Somethings stirring in the Zone after that surge. Feels like we just woke it up.
The anomalies are shifting. What was safe yesterday might kill you today.
Still alive but for how long? Feels like the Zone's testing us, one surge at a time.
Anyone else hearing whispers? That surge mustve scrambled my brain.
The animals are quiet too quiet. Thats never a good sign.
That surge wasnt random. The Zone wanted it. The Zone needed it.
The static in my PDA hasnt stopped since the surge ended. Anyone else having the same issue?
I swear I saw the sky split open for a second during the surge. Tell me someone else saw that?
The Zones pulse feels off. Like its recharging for something worse.
We survived, but at what cost? Somethings changed out there, I can feel it.
That wasnt just a surge. It felt alive. Like it was watching us.
The last surge hit harder than usual. Anyone else notice how it felt targeted?
Feels like the Zone itself took a deep breath during that surge. What happens when it exhales?
The Zones alive, and the surge was its heartbeat. You felt it too, right?
Every time a surge hits, it feels more personal. Like the Zones learning who we are.
The silence after a surge is the loudest sound in the Zone. Stay ready.
The Zone feels different now, like it's watching us more closely than before.
I swear I saw shadows moving during that surge, but there was nothing there right?
The anomalies are hungrier after that one. Stay sharp, stalkers.
The surge left the sky looking bruised, like the Zone itself got hurt.
Something in the air smells different now. Metallic, sharp unsettling.
Was anyone near the swamps during the surge? Something massive moved out there.
Still here, still breathing. But the Zones pulse feels wrong.
The animals know something we dont. Theyve all vanished since the surge.
My compass is spinning out of control. Either its broken, or the Zone is.
Heard a faint wailing during the surge. Anyone else catch that, or am I losing it?
Some stalker swears the surge rewrote the map. Anyone else noticing new paths?
Ever feel like the Zones testing us? That surge felt like a warning.
The last surge knocked out my Geiger counter. Or maybe its just too scared to function.
There's a new glow on the horizon after the surge. I dont think its friendly.
The Zones heartbeat is slower now, but I can feel it waiting to strike again.
Every surge seems to wake up something worse. What did this one unleash?
The Zones whispering louder since the surge. Problem is, I dont like what its saying.
During the surge, I swear I saw a building near Yantar that wasnt there before. Anyone else?
The surge uncovered something strange near the Chernobyl plantgiant scorch marks in the earth. No sign of what caused them.
Someones PDA picked up a signal from deep inside the Red Forest during the surge. The weird part? It sounded like a heartbeat.
The surge left a crater near the Garbage. A glowing green mist is rising from it. Approach at your own risk.
Ever hear of a surge leaving behind footprints? Massive ones? Check the Swamps if you dont believe me.
Freedom scouts reported a Monolith squad heading straight into an anomaly field after the surge. They didnt even try to avoid it.
Some artifacts are glowing brighter after the surge. Traders are paying top dollar, but no ones sure why.
Heard from a stalker who claims the surge turned an entire grove of trees into metal. Might be worth a look.
Whats with the sky near Pripyat? Its shimmering, like heat waves, but theres no heat.
Anyone else notice the Zones anomalies are shifting? The old safe paths arent safe anymore.
During the surge, a group of stalkers vanished into the Brain Scorcher zone. No bodies, just their gear left behind.
A single crow flew straight into an anomaly after the surge, then exploded into light. Never seen anything like it.
The ground near Agroprom started glowing during the surge. Its stopped now, but something feels off.
A trader claims he saw shadows moving inside the Bar during the surge. Nothing was there when he looked again.
The Monolith broadcast a single word during the surge: Awakened. No idea what it means, but its got everyone spooked.
During the surge, an old clock tower in the Dead City started ringing. Problem is, it hasnt had a working mechanism for decades.
Someone found a trail of molten metal leading from the CNPP. It wasnt there before the surge.
The Zones wildlife is acting strange after the surge. A pack of blind dogs was seen walking in perfect formation near Jupiter.
Freedom scouts claim the Brain Scorchers static has changed tone. Its almost... musical now.
Theres a rumor about a new type of anomaly forming near Zaton. Its pulling everything toward it, even light.
Yantar's sensors picked up strange energy bursts during the surge. Sakharov is asking for volunteers to investigate.
A single stalkers PDA broadcasted Dont follow me right after the surge. No one knows where he was.
During the surge, the sky over the Red Forest turned blood red. Its back to normal now, but the trees still look... wrong.
The CNPPs reactor core emitted a low hum during the surge. It stopped as suddenly as it started. Weird, even for the Zone.
Someone claims the Monolith are moving in strange patterns after the surge, like theyre searching for something specific.
New anomalies appeared in the Swamps after the surge. Theyre faint but seem to distort sound around them.
Theres a faint echo near Rostok. Stalkers swear it sounds like whispers repeating the same phrase: Not yet.
A strange light was seen over Pripyat during the surge. No one knows what caused it, but it wasnt lightning.
Artifacts seem more active after this surge. One even floated a few inches above the ground before falling silent.
The Monolith sent out coordinates after the surge. They lead to an empty patch of land near the Radar. No one knows why.
During the surge, all the lights in the Bar flickered out for a minute. When they came back, nothing seemed differentbut people were spooked.
Some Freedom members swear they saw shadows moving against the flow of the surges winds. No explanation yet.
The swamps were unusually silent after the surge. Even the mutants seemed to be avoiding the area.
Monolith patrols have doubled near the Army Warehouses. Theyre not attacking, just... watching. Something feels off.
The zones boundaries shimmered during the surge. Some stalkers are saying the Zones grown larger overnight.
During the surge, a storm rolled through the Zone, but the rain only fell on the northern regions. Somethings not right.
A stalker claims to have seen a glowing figure in the distance during the surge. No one believes him, but hes sticking to his story.
The anomalies near Yantar are shifting more aggressively after the surge. Even experienced stalkers are steering clear.
A trader at Skadovsk reported all his electronic devices went haywire during the surge. Hes selling them for cheap now, but theyre still glitching.
Some stalkers found a series of footprints leading into the Red Forest after the surge. Theyre massive and end abruptly.
The Brain Scorcher emitted a strange sequence of sounds during the surge. Sakharov says it might be a coded message.
Someone claims the surge changed the color of anomalies near Pripyat. Theyre glowing brighter than ever.
A Freedom scout swears he saw a lone Monolith soldier walking through the Red Forest after the surge. It didnt seem hostile.
The radiation readings near Agroprom spiked to dangerous levels after the surge. No ones going near there now.
A stalker near Zaton claims he heard a distant voice during the surge, calling his name. He hasnt left his camp since.
The skies over the Dead City seemed to open during the surge. Some say they saw something massive moving in the clouds.
Artifacts near the Garbage are sparking more than usual. Some traders think theyre charging up after the surge.
A stalker near Yantar claims the surge wiped his memory of the past day. His PDA logs are intact, but he doesnt remember making them.
During the surge, a rookie claimed his PDA started typing on its own. It just said, Run. He didnt stop running until he hit the Bar.
A Freedom guy swore he saw a pseudodog floating during the surge. Turns out, it was stuck in an anomaly. Still, gave him a heart attack.
After the surge, someone found a backpack hanging from a tree. No branches around it. No rope either. Just... floating there.
One stalker thought the surge had ended early and walked out of cover. Hes fine, but his stash wasntits now orbiting Jupiter.
They say a group of rookies tried to surf an anomaly after the surge. The Zone gave them a one-way ticket to the Stratosphere Club.
During the surge, someone yelled, I can see my house from here! Turns out, they could. From 200 feet up.
A stalker swore the surge made his beard grow. Now hes calling himself Zone Santa and charging 50 rubles for wishes.
After the surge, a guy found his rifle perfectly disassembled. He swears he didnt touch it. The Zone mustve wanted to teach him some gunsmithing lessons.
Someone's tent flew straight into an anomaly during the surge. The Zone gave it back... with no zippers and upside down.
One Freedom scout claims his Geiger counter started beatboxing during the surge. Hes calling it his rad rap track.
The Zone is full of mysteries, but heres the biggest one: why does everyone keep leaving their damn flashlights on?
A Monolith soldier was seen staring into the sky after the surge, repeating, We are not alone. Then he walked into an anomaly.
A stalker near Zaton claims he saw a pseudodog chasing its own tail... and losing.
During the surge, a faint, childlike laughter was heard near the Swamps. It stopped as suddenly as it started.

The swamp lights are flickering again. A $what is on its way $when. Whatever it is, dont trust it.
The Zones heartbeat is loud tonight. A $what will occur $when. Listen and move wisely.
Foresters reports say the anomalies are shifting. A $what will erupt $when. Find shelter before its too late.
Some stalkers swear the sky turned red near Yantar. A $what will arrive $when. Stay far, far away.
The Zones vibrations are intensifying. A $what will break out $when. Survival depends on your next move.
A $what will emerge $when. Its written all over the Zone, if you know where to look. Stay sharp.
The grounds shaking but its not an earthquake. A $what will erupt $when. Something alive is causing this.
Reports of stalkers disappearing without a trace near the swamps. A $what will strike $when. Stay hidden, stay alive.
Screams echoing from the Red Forest. No one knows whats causing them. A $what is approaching $when. Dont go alone.
The skys bleeding light near Pripyat. A $what will descend $when. The Zones waking up, and its angry.
A scout saw shadows moving *against* the wind. A $what will happen $when. The Zone is bending its own rules.
PDA signals distorted, voices whispering from nowhere. A $what is forming $when. If youre hearing them, it might already be too late.
The Brain Scorcher hums louder than ever. A $what will erupt $when. Its pulling something out of the Zone... or into it.
The anomalies are *moving*. A $what will strike $when. Theyre acting like they have a purpose now.
Theres something massive pacing the outskirts of Rostok. A $what is expected $when. You can feel it through the ground.
The fog in the Garbage hides figures that arent human. A $what will arrive $when. Dont wait to find out what they want.
Veterans say they heard the Monolith chanting louder than ever. A $what is coming $when. Even they dont know what it means.
The crows over Yantar are diving into the anomalies and *not coming out*. A $what will unfold $when. Whats calling them?
Reports of time glitches near the Army Warehouses. A $what will break loose $when. Stalkers are vanishing into *yesterday*.
Something *huge* crawled out of the Great Swamp last night. A $what will happen $when. Its tracks dont lead anywhere.
The anomalies around the NPP are glowing *black*. A $what will erupt $when. Its like the Zones tearing itself apart.
A Monolith broadcast claims, The end begins $when. A $what is on its way. Nobody knows what they mean.
Some stalkers swear the Zone *spoke* to them near Pripyat. A $what will arrive $when. They couldnt stop screaming afterward.
The air near the Dead City tastes like iron. A $what is forming $when. Even the mutants are running.
Theres a noise coming from the swamps. It doesnt stop. A $what will hit $when. Its almost too quiet now.
The Zones shadows are moving faster than the sunlight. A $what will occur $when. Stay out of the light.
Stalkers near Yantar say their reflections arent matching their movements. A $what will strike $when. Mirrors are dangerous now.
The Red Forest sounds like its *breathing*. A $what will descend $when. Whatevers in there is waking up.
The anomalies near the Cordon are spinning like tornados. A $what will break loose $when. Theyre pulling in everythingincluding sound.
The Zones whispers are louder tonight. A $what will erupt $when. Theyre starting to form words.
Stalkers claim to have seen *two moons* over Rostok. A $what is approaching $when. Even the skys not safe anymore.
The Brain Scorchers emissions are reaching beyond Pripyat. A $what will strike $when. Its never stretched this far before.
Time near the Jupiter plant is running slower. A $what will arrive $when. Some stalkers aged decades in hours.
The Zones glow is visible from the Cordon. A $what will happen $when. Even the horizon looks unnatural.
Stalkers say they can hear *heartbeat sounds* near the Radar. A $what will unfold $when. The Zones alive, and its awake.
The wind is carrying whispers from the Army Warehouses. A $what will occur $when. The words sound *human*.
