Ahah, shit, I've seen everything now. A Dutyer playing another's meat flute.
Motherfucker, who ate my sausage? Gonna find that knob and teach him a lesson.
Lads, there are lots of stalkers with artefacts coming from the North.
Brothers in Jupiter, got word that you have a rat from the SSU. I bet my ass it's the one with the good weapon.
A campfire, some kissel, and sweets! Haha.
Fucking fat asswipe. Did you lose the armoury keys again?
Crikey, it was more fun around the trenches than it is in the base.
I think we've got a rat in here. Every raid so far has been a complete fuck-up... Stalkers just start blasting us before we even know.
We just ran into a flying black smoke cloud. What the hell?
What now, you wankers? Come and get me if you dare!
Don't go bothering the boss in the next couple of hours.
We jumped a couple of bitches and are going back to base.
One of my dudes been shot, can anyone come find us and take us to the base? Guys at the perimeter, can you help us?!
feelin pretty shit. Who cares, Ima have myself a beer, HEHE.
Damn, I don't get it. Where's my shooter?
Ehh... I haven't seen my mother in a long while since I joined this business.
Fucking state. You don't get shit from them, you turn the other direction, and they ruin your life for nothing.
Ha, caught another dumbass trying to sneak past us. You ain't getting away that easy, pal.
If that mutant over by the entrance isn't dead yet, I swear I'll gut it myself.
Heard there's a stash of ammo near the Garbage. If anyone else tries to take it, theyll be sorry.
The boss said no one messes with the rookies today. Guess that means I get to relax, eh?
Stalkers always try to play hero in the Zone, but we know how that story ends. Not pretty.
I swear, if I see another damn scientist wandering around, I'll teach 'em why the Zone's dangerous.
Enough talk, it's time to grab the loot and get out before someone else finds it first.
That SSU guy? He's just another soft target. Bet we could take his gun without even trying.
Goddamn, my head's pounding. Don't you just love a good brawl?
We've got a rat in the camp. Someones been leaking our locations to the Duty dogs. Time for a little chat.
Another scout went missing near the Red Forest. Place is crawling with bad luck lately.
If I see another mutant running toward us, it's gonna be a bad day for everyone.
Who the hell put the vodka behind the stash? You know damn well it's supposed to be on top!
I heard the Duty folks are putting up some resistance near the Yantar. Let's hope they don't interfere with my business.
Shit, I think I lost my favorite knife. If anyone finds it, Ill pay top price.
Looks like the pack of dogs in the Zone are getting bolder. Guess were gonna have to show them whos boss.
The rookie thinks he can talk his way out of a firefight. We'll see about that.
Found a stash of ammo in the sewers. Better hold onto thatcould come in handy.
Running low on food here. Guess I'll just raid the Duty camp next time I see one of their trucks.
Every time I walk through the Zone, I feel like it's playing tricks on me. Nothing good can come of this place.
Keep your head down, theres something big moving through the Garbage. Could be a mutant or worse.
If I catch anyone sniffing around my stash again, I'll send them straight to the afterlife.
Don't know who that stalker is, but hes about to learn that the Zone isnt a playground.
Another raid on the rookies? Hah, theyll never see us coming. No mercy.
Dammit, the bosses are getting too soft. Time to remind them who runs things around here.
That Duty bastard over there doesnt look so tough. A couple of bullets and hes done.
Was anyone else on watch last night? Because I swear I heard something moving in the shadows.
Alright, lads, the best loots always where the mutants roam. Lets get in and out before anyone notices.
Fuck, my hands still bleeding from the last firefight. Thats what happens when you mess with the big boys.
Theres a new guy in the camp. Dont trust him. Hes got that look in his eyes. You know the one.
I heard they found a stash of rare artifacts near the Swamps. Too bad, theyll all be mine soon enough.
We lost contact with the scout party near Zaton. Dont know if theyre dead or just hiding.
Heard theres some fresh meat coming from the South. You know what that means, right?
Ugh, my heads spinning from last nights drink. Guess well take care of business when Im feeling better.
Get the vodka ready, boys, looks like we have a few new recruits to welcome.
Another fight with the Duty idiots. They never learn, do they?
Hey, stop squabbling, weve got bigger problems. Theres something wrong in the Zone.
One of the boys said he saw an artifact glowing in the middle of an anomaly. Good luck grabbing it, genius.
Some fool tried trading counterfeit rubles for ammo. We sent him running... with empty pockets.
The boss says theres a convoy coming through the Garbage. You know what to do, boys.
Whys there always some idiot who thinks the Zones gonna make him rich? Easy pickings for us, I guess.
Anyone else notice the weird tracks near the camp? Doesnt look human or mutant... creepy.
Alright, who stole my boots? Im not joking. Youve got till sundown to give em back.
Got a tip about a stash near the Red Forest. Probably a trap, but whos feeling lucky?
Just saw a Monolith patrol. Lets follow themthose fanatics always have something valuable on them.
Some stalker tried to trade me precious jewelry. Turned out to be bottle caps. Gave him a proper lesson.
Word is theres a shipment of high-tech gear headed to Yantar. I say we intercept it before the eggheads get their hands on it.
The last idiot who underestimated us is still feeding the crows outside the camp.
Some smartass claimed he had an artifact that could predict anomalies. Guess where he is now? Hint: not alive.
I saw a stalker wandering near the Dead City without a weapon. Either he's mad, or hes hiding something.
Who left the vodka stash unlocked? Were bandits, not amateurs.
Found a rusted pistol in the swamp. Good for scaring mutants, I guess... or throwing at em.
Got word of a scientist convoy moving through the Cordon. Wonder what kind of goodies theyre carrying.
Anyone else think the Zones getting weirder? I swear I heard laughter coming from an empty field.
The boss is planning something big. Better stay in his good books if you want a cut.
Whoever messed with the trap near the anomaly better fix it. We lost three good catches because of you.
Got my hands on a priceless artifact. Turns out its a rock that glows. Still sold it to some idiot for a fortune.
Some Monolith fool dropped his radio. Their codes are gibberish, but it might be worth something.
Why do Duty idiots always act like they own the Zone? Lets remind them who really runs this place.
Heard someone humming a creepy tune near the Garbage. Checked, but no one was there. Gave me chills.
Picked up a stalkers PDA. Looks like he had a stash nearby. Too bad for him.
Remember, boys: a good ambush is like a good joke. Timing is everything.
Some Freedom guy said the Zone wants to be free. I said, Sure, right after I free your wallet.
The campfires getting cold. Someone grab more wood before I throw you in instead.
Got a lead on a stash near the Junkyard. Might be booby-trapped, but thats half the fun.
A Duty squad came through here acting tough. They left without their guns. Whos tough now?
I heard theres a stalker who talks to anomalies. If hes not lying, we might need to recruit him.
Found a stash full of old vodka bottles. No label, but it burns like hell. Who's thirsty?
Some stalker claimed he outran a Bloodsucker. Sure, buddy. Lets see you try that again.
Weve got a fresh recruit whos too green to even hold a gun properly. Should we laugh or teach him?
Anyone seen the mutant with one glowing eye? Someone swears its smarter than the rest. I say we find out.
Got a line on a trader who sells cheap gear. Its either stolen or a death trap. Worth the gamble?
A Monolith patrol left a crate near the Dead City. Lets see what they forgot to pick up.
We had a poker game last night. Lets just say some people dont know when to fold.
Rumor is, there's a Freedom guy who knows how to disarm anomalies. If thats true, we need to pay him a visit.
A stalker dropped his backpack while running from mutants. His loss, our gain.
Got a story about an artifact that glows like a lantern. Problem is, its sitting in the middle of a death trap.
Some scientist left a crate outside their bunker. Bet its filled with goodies we could use.
Weve got a bet going: who can last the longest in a blowout without cover? Volunteers?
Freedom boys were boasting about their artifacts again. I say we take em off their hands.
A mutant crawled into camp last night. Took three bullets to the head and kept moving. Tough bastard.
Someone left a radio playing near the Swamps. Creepiest part? No one remembers leaving it there.
The boss says were heading to Pripyat. Hope you all like radiation, boys.
Found a stash of old comics in a bunker. Turns out even bandits enjoy a good laugh.
Someones been sneaking out of camp at night. If youre planning to betray us, dont come back.
The Zones been too quiet lately. I dont like it. Something bigs about to go down.
A stalker sold me a lucky charm artifact. Thing broke in half the moment I touched it.
Weve been seeing fewer mutants around camp. Either were scaring them off, or something scarier is nearby.
The boss says no ones leaving camp until we figure out whos been skimming from the loot pile.
A trader offered me a genuine artifact. Turned out to be a piece of broken glass. Nice try.
Anyone else hear that howling last night? Didnt sound like any mutant Ive ever heard.
Some Freedom guy was bragging about finding the ultimate stash. Too bad he didnt live to enjoy it.
Someone left their gear out in the rain. Hope you like rusty guns, genius.
Got my hands on an artifact that glows faintly. Not sure if its valuable or just radioactive.
Theres talk of a stash hidden in an old train car near the Garbage. Lets see whos brave enough to check.
The boss found a map leading to some old Soviet bunker. Hope its not just another trap.
We lost contact with our scout near Zaton. Either hes dead, or he found something he doesnt want to share.
Someone spotted a mutant dragging a backpack through the swamps. Bet theres something valuable in there.
Heard a stalker screaming near the anomalies. Might be some good loot on whats left of him.
The boss is mad again. Last time this happened, someone didnt come back from their mission.
Someone claimed they found an artifact that can stop bullets. Sounds like a bedtime story to me.
Freedoms throwing another party. Maybe we should crash it and take their vodka.
Saw a mutant digging near the train yard. Could be hiding something, or just burying its lunch.
The new recruit asked what a blowout was. Poor bastards gonna find out the hard way.
The Zones playing tricks again. Found a backpack full of rocks where I swore there was loot.
A stalker swears he found an artifact that sings. Might be worth finding if you can stand the noise.
Lost another guy to an anomaly. Thats what happens when you dont watch where you step.
Anyone know how to fix a shotgun? Mines jammed, and the traders asking too much to repair it.
A Freedom guy got too close to camp. Lets just say he wont be bragging about artifacts anymore.
Someone swiped my last pack of smokes. If I catch them, theyll wish they hadnt.
Got my hands on a mutant claw. Trader says its worthless, but it looks cool on my belt.
The boss found an old PDA with coordinates on it. Might be a trap, but well check it out anyway.
We found a stash with an old guitar in it. Turns out even bandits can appreciate music.
A stalker left a trail of breadcrumbs leading to his camp. Too bad for him, we found it first.
Heard about a Monolith soldier who defected. If hes smart, hell stay far away from us.
The swamps are getting crowded with mutants. Might be time to thin the herd.
A trader tried to sell me a bulletproof vest. Looked more like it was made of duct tape and lies.
Saw something moving in the fog last night. Hope it was just a mutant and not something worse.
The new guys been bragging about his aim. Lets see how good he is against a Bloodsucker.
Found a stash with some canned food. Expired? Probably. Still edible? Hopefully.
A trader offered me a map of secret zones. Looked like he drew it in crayon.
The boss says were raiding an artifact convoy. Hope youre ready for a fight.
Someone saw a mutant dragging a human leg. Lets hope it was from a Duty idiot and not one of ours.
We found an old ammo crate. Most of its rusted, but a few rounds still look good.
A Monolith patrols been seen near the swamps. Lets see if they have anything worth taking.
Some trader was carrying an artifact in his jacket. Guess whos not carrying it anymore?
A Bloodsucker wandered too close to camp last night. It wont be wandering anywhere again.
Heard about a stash in an old bus near the Garbage. Lets see who gets to it first.
The Zones been quiet lately. Makes me think something bigs about to happen.
Found an artifact in a mutants stomach. Guess I should thank it for not digesting it first.
The boss told me to keep my head down. Funny, I thought thats what helmets were for.
Tried to scare a rookie with a mutant story. Turns out, hes braver than me. Awkward.
Saw a stalker trying to bribe a mutant with sausage. Guess who got to eat the sausage? The mutant.
Note to self: Vodka doesnt make you bulletproof. Learned that the hard way.
Someone bet me I couldnt outrun a pseudodog. Lets just say, Im a few rounds of ammo poorer now.
The trader said this gun was like new. Yeah, maybe new in the 80s.
Heard someone say the Zone provides. Yeah, provides hunger and a whole lot of misery.
The rookie asked if mutants eat vegetables. Yeah, sureif theyre marinated in stalker blood.
Watched a stalker try to take a selfie with an anomaly. Lets just say he wont be posting that anywhere.
Found a stash labeled Premium Loot. It had one can of tuna and a single bullet. Premium, indeed.
A Monolith guy started preaching to me. I told him I was allergic to sermons. He didnt laugh.
The boss said were running low on ammo. Maybe he should stop missing every shot.
Tried to play poker with a Freedom guy. Turns out, they cheat worse than us.
Tripped over a rock and scared a mutant. Guess were both cowards now.
Saw a stalker trying to fish in an anomaly pool. I didnt stick around to see what hed catch.
Someone told me vodka clears radiation. What they didnt say is it also clears your wallet.
Duty says they're all about protecting the Zone, but all I see is them protecting their egos.
Saw a Freedom guy trying to connect with the Zone. Guess the Zone connected with him... via a pseudodog.
Monolith thinks theyre invincible. Funny how invincible doesnt stop a grenade.
Heard a scientist say anomalies are predictable. Yeah, tell that to the guy who turned into Zone spaghetti.
Duty complains about Freedom all the time. Guess theyre jealous someone else knows how to relax.
Saw a Monolith soldier try to intimidate a mutant. Spoiler: the mutant wasnt impressed.
Freedoms so free they cant even afford decent guns. Ill stick to looting theirs after a fight.
Scientists said theyd pay for mutant samples. Guess they didnt specify who has to survive collecting them.
Duty's all about discipline, but they couldnt even line up straight at the checkpoint.
Monolith keeps yelling about the truth. Truth is, theyre terrible at aim.
Freedom claims theyre chill, but Ive seen them argue for hours over who has the best stash spot.
Scientists always talk about controlled conditions. The Zone clearly disagrees.
Duty acts like they run the Zone. Yet they needed backup when a boar got too close.
Saw a Freedom stalker trip over his own shoelaces. Truly the Zones most elite.
Monolith talks about cleansing the Zone, but Ive seen cleaner campfires.
Duty guys said theyre guardians of the Zone. Looked more like they were guarding their lunch.
Freedom once tried to outdrink us. Lets just say, theyre better off sticking to artifacts.
Swore I saw a bloodsucker wearing a bandit jacket. Eh, maybe Ive been in the swamps too long.
Ran into a stalker at the Garbage who claimed he had the best artifact. Turns out it was a rusty bolt in a sock.
Got chased by a pseudodog all the way to the Dark Valley. Hard to look tough when youre screaming like a rookie.
Watched a Monolith soldier try to cleanse the Zone by shooting at the sky. Mustve been target practice for the clouds.
A Duty grunt tried to lecture me on honor. I asked him how honorable it was to miss all his shots.
Freedom tried to invite me to a peace talk. Their stash got liberated while they were busy chatting.
Was told Clear Skys making a comeback. More like a murky drizzle if you ask me.
Went artifact hunting in Agroprom. Came back with a hangover and an empty backpack. Priorities, eh?
A fellow bandit thought he saw a golden chimera. Turned out it was a flash of lightning and his fevered imagination.
Some egghead scientists in Yantar offered me a detector. I offered them my bullet detector: if you stop hearing shots, its safe.
Saw a bunch of Duty guys freaking out over a snork. Guess discipline doesnt stop you from screaming like a baby.
Freedoms idea of a party is passing around expired rations. We bandits at least throw in some cheap vodka.
Heard a rookie bragging about surviving an emission. Turns out he was hiding in a latrine the whole time.
Once saw a Monolith zealot try to baptize a snork. The snork gave him a baptism of claws instead.
Picked up a brand-new pistol from a trader in Rostok. Fired once and nearly turned my hand into swiss cheese.
A Freedom stalker claimed he was one with the Zone. The Zone promptly introduced him to a gravitational anomaly.
Spent all night playing dice with a Duty squad. They swore theyd never gamble again after I took their spare mags.
Ran across a zombified stalker who still had better aim than some of these so-called elite soldiers.
Monolith worships some invisible force. I worship real thingslike a loaded shotgun and a full bottle.
Stumbled into the Brain Scorcher zone once. My head still hurts, but at least I didnt start chanting nonsense like Monolith.
Saw a Freedom party around a campfire. They offered me a smoke. I offered them a distraction while my buddies looted their backpacks.
Duty set up a checkpoint and asked for bandit identification. I just showed them my shotgun. End of conversation.
Some rookie wanted to find the Wish Granter. Told him I wished hed buy my old rifle first. He was gullible enough.
Heard a bloodsucker growl near the Red Forest. Decided to growl right back. Dont think it appreciated the competition.
Sat in on a Monolith sermon. All I got was a headache and a sudden urge to laugh at their holy bullet talk.
Dont trust those fancy exoskeletons. If it cant out-run a pack of dogs, its useless to me.
A Freedom fella told me the Zone is alive. I asked if it could give him a new pair of boots. He shut up quick.
Saw a Duty officer polishing his medals in the Bar. Too bad he cant polish his aim to match.
Got lost near Pripyat. Ended up finding a hidden stash under a burnt-out bus. Best mistake I ever made.
A snork jumped out at me once. I jumped out of my skin. We both had a good laughafter I put it down.
Duty keeps shouting For the good of the Zone! Meanwhile, I just hope I make good money off the Zone.
Monolith wanted me to see the light. I was more interested in seeing the inside of their pockets.
Just remember, in the Zone: you cant outrun a bullet, but you can always outrun the poor sap next to you.
All Clear Sky personnel, remember to use the private channel. Update the security codes regularly. Otherwise, don't complain if bandits ambush you again.
All important information must go to the private channel.
People! Novikov needs urgent help, he needs spare parts for upgrades and repairs. Go find everything he asks for. If we don't help now, we'll be shooting from our fingers before long!
Requesting Fruit Punch samples, please report back to Professor Kalancha once you acquire enough.
A lot of stalkers make the same mistake. The water in the Swamp is highly radioactive, so keep your distance. Keep plenty of anti-rad pills on hand, you never know when you'll need them.
Church garrison, we've lost contact with a research team in your area. Move to their last known position and report.
We've received a new shipment of Veles detectors. The amount is limited, so sign your name up.
Librarian here. Take it easy on the rations, supply is limited and the next shipment won't arrive any time soon.
Hey Nimble, why don't you come back? Remember the good ol' days?
New Vortex anomalies have been spotted near the entrance, watch your step on your way back.
Clear Sky is recruiting new members, preferably stalkers with great knowledge in anomalous fields. Contact Cold for more info.
There are signs of bandits camping in the northern farms. Don't let them get comfortable.
Attention, all squads: The Echo anomaly cluster has expanded. Be cautious and stay in formation when entering the affected zones.
Remember, comrades, the Monolith is not just a cult. It's a threat. Keep your eyes open, their operatives are known to blend in.
The air near the Red Forest is thick with radiation. Stay low and use your gear; don't let it overwhelm you.
Someone has been messing with our power grids. Check the perimeter and make sure no ones trying to hack our systems.
We're hearing whispers of a new faction forming in the underground. Keep an ear to the ground, we can't afford another enemy on the rise.
Be aware of the new rift anomalies near the Dark Valley. They're unpredictable and growing. Send in teams to investigate immediately.
Professor Kalancha is gathering data on mutant behavior. If you come across any unusual findings, report immediately.
The base's food supplies are running low. We need more scavengers out there to gather what we can before the next storm hits.
New reports are coming in about military equipment in the Garbage. We need an operation to retrieve anything useful before the bandits claim it.
Watch the perimeter carefully. Lately, some stalkers have been seen sneaking through unnoticed. We don't trust anyone out there anymore.
The Dark Valley is full of dangers beyond the usual. Watch your step, there's no telling what mutated creature lurks just around the corner.
Someone's been tampering with our water filtration system. We need someone to check it before we end up poisoned.
Attention! We've identified a new breed of mutant near the Army Warehouses. Theyve got thicker skin, be prepared for a fight.
We've intercepted a transmission. Theres something moving towards us in the wild, and its big. Be ready for anything.
The commanders orders: Stay out of the northern region for now. Unconfirmed reports suggest military activity in the area.
All units, hold your ground! A wave of mutants has been detected near our outpost. Expect heavy casualties.
The anomalies in the Agroprom are more dangerous than ever. Stay away from the central sector until further notice.
We need to stay vigilant. There's a group of stalkers planning something in the Red Forest. If they make a move, we move first.
Important! Some of our equipment has gone missing. Check your gear, if you notice anything out of place, report it immediately.
Clear Sky's research division is developing new anti-rad tech. Anyone with an advanced degree in science, come forward for testing.
The military has set up a checkpoint near the Cordon. Stay clear unless you want to end up as target practice.
Weve got some fresh intel on the Monoliths movements. Theyre gathering in the southern outskirts. If youre near there, stay alert.
Whoever was messing with the generators, you better come forward. The power went out during a critical moment and we're not taking any chances.
Attention all teams, a large group of mutants has been spotted near the Truck Graveyard. Dont underestimate them, theyre packing a punch.
Clear Sky scientists are investigating strange occurrences near the Red Forest. If youre in the area, report any unusual activity immediately.
There's been a breach at the Pripyat facilities. A group of bandits managed to get through. We need backup before it escalates.
Be advised: the road to Yantar is heavily radiated. Only the brave or foolish would try it. Avoid the area if possible.
Anyone whos been to the Cordon lately, watch out for anomalies near the entrance. Weve seen a rise in the number of controlled explosions.
Were getting reports of a rogue faction moving through the outskirts. They're armed and dangerous, stay out of sight if you can.
Warning: theres a new breed of mutant appearing near the Swamps. If you come across one, don't try to take it on alone.
Remember to check your geiger counters before heading into the Zones depths. Radiation spikes are increasing again.
All personnel, maintain high alert levels. The militarys movements near the Cordon are getting more frequent. Expect an engagement soon.
Clear Sky forces have been deployed to the Garbage to clear out bandit camps. If youre nearby, avoid unnecessary confrontation.
Something stranges going on near the Agroprom. A few of our men are reporting unusual readings in the area. Proceed with caution.
The Monoliths influence is spreading. Weve intercepted another transmission from them. They're not stopping, and neither should we.
The signals been cut off at the Agroprom research facility. Send a team to investigate. If anyones still alive, well need them back.
Weve detected strange atmospheric shifts near the Radar. Clear Sky scientists suspect a major emission might follow.
Unusual seismic activity recorded in the Dead City. Clear Sky advises avoiding the area until further notice.
A stalker reported seeing glowing footprints leading into the Red Forest. The Clear Sky team is investigating.
Clear Sky has received reports of a Monolith unit moving south from Pripyat. Stay alert for ambushes.
Warning: Agroproms subterranean levels are experiencing unexplained energy surges. Clear Sky is monitoring the situation closely.
A rogue stalker claims to have found an artifact emitting constant psionic waves. Clear Sky is working to confirm the sighting.
The Swamps are unusually quiet. Clear Sky scouts report no mutant activity in the last 24 hours. This could mean trouble.
Clear Sky scientists have recorded new anomaly patterns near Yantar. Exercise caution when navigating the area.
Clear Sky patrols have reported strange shadows moving in the fog around the Garbage. Avoid the area until further updates.
Reports of a massive mutant sighted near the Jupiter plant. Clear Sky teams are tracking its movements.
Theres been a sudden spike in electromagnetic anomalies near the Cordon. Clear Sky recommends staying clear of the Zones outskirts for now.
A mysterious signal has been intercepted in the Red Forest. Clear Sky specialists are analyzing its origin.
Clear Sky scouts report a significant artifact concentration near the Dead City. Approach with extreme caution.
Monolith forces have been spotted setting up strange devices near Pripyat. Clear Sky operatives are investigating.
The Zones flora near the Swamps appears to be mutating faster than normal. Clear Sky scientists are collecting samples for study.
Unidentified energy signatures are disrupting Clear Skys scanners near the Jupiter plant. Stay alert for anomalies.
A sudden emission has revealed new artifact fields near the Agroprom. Clear Sky recommends extreme caution for any stalkers approaching the area.
Clear Sky teams have found evidence of a hidden Monolith outpost near the Radar. Further investigation is underway.
A strange, pulsating light has been seen near the edge of the Red Forest. Clear Sky patrols are proceeding carefully.
Theres been an increase in mutant attacks around Yantar. Clear Sky advises stalkers to travel in groups.
Clear Sky reports that an experimental anomaly-detecting device has gone missing in the Swamps. Be on the lookout for suspicious activity.
A faint but continuous signal has been detected coming from the old military base near the Dead City. Clear Sky scientists are perplexed by its origin.
A Clear Sky scout claims to have found a massive artifact field hidden under layers of fog in the Swamps. He hasnt returned to confirm.
A stalker claims to have seen an entire group vanish near a glowing anomaly in the Agroprom tunnels. Clear Sky is investigating.
Unusual heat signatures have been detected near Pripyat. Clear Sky advises extreme caution when traveling in the area.
Reports of a mutant capable of mimicking voices have surfaced near the Garbage. Clear Sky operatives are preparing to track it down.
A stalker swears he saw glowing symbols etched into the rocks near the Red Forest. Clear Sky is sending a team to verify.
Theres a rumor that the Brain Scorcher might reactivate soon. Clear Sky scientists are racing to decipher the latest Monolith transmissions.
A Clear Sky patrol discovered an ancient, rusted device near the Cordon. Early analysis suggests it predates the Zone itself.
Clear Sky operatives have been hearing whispers near a newly formed anomaly cluster. Theyre currently determining its source.
A strange pulse has been felt across the Zone, originating near Yantar. Clear Sky scientists are scrambling to collect data.
A stalker mentioned an unmarked bunker in the Dead City that glows faintly during emissions. Clear Sky is skeptical but intrigued.
Clear Skys latest drone was lost over the Red Forest. The final footage shows what looks like a moving anomaly.
Scouts near the Jupiter plant reported a low-frequency hum that seemed to disorient mutants. Clear Sky is investigating its potential use.
Reports are surfacing about a Monolith deserter hiding near Pripyat. Clear Sky hopes to find him before anyone else does.
Clear Sky has found traces of an unknown liquid seeping from the ground in the Swamps. Preliminary tests show its highly volatile.
A trader near Yanov claims he heard strange, metallic echoes coming from the old rail yard. Clear Sky is sending a team to confirm.
Clear Sky is analyzing a set of encrypted documents recovered from Monolith operatives. The initial translation hints at a new weapon.
Strange vegetation has started growing near the Agroprom research facility. Clear Sky scientists believe its been altered by anomalies.
A stalker reported seeing a mutant unlike any documented species near the Cordon. Clear Sky is preparing an expedition.
Clear Sky operatives in the Swamps report finding old military equipment that still seems functional. Its origin is unclear.
A faint series of beeps was picked up near the Jupiter plant. Clear Sky believes it may be an automated distress signal from pre-Zone times.
A stalker near the Swamps said he found a path that leads nowhere and everywhere. Clear Sky is looking into it.
Clear Sky operatives report seeing an anomaly behaving differently than any recorded before. It seemed... aware.
Theres chatter about strange ruins appearing overnight near the Red Forest. Clear Sky is investigating their origin.
A trader claims to have an artifact that generates heat without any radiation. Clear Sky scientists are skeptical but intrigued.
Scouts near Yantar reported hearing laughter in the dead of night. Theyre certain they were alone. Clear Sky is sending a team.
A previously dormant anomaly in the Agroprom has started emitting a soft glow. Clear Sky scientists are setting up monitoring equipment.
Unmarked crates have been found near the Cordon. Theyre sealed tight, and Clear Sky is debating whether to open them.
A stalker swears he saw a mutant vanish into thin air near Pripyat. Clear Sky is investigating for evidence of cloaking abilities.
Clear Skys drones detected unusual electromagnetic readings near the Garbage. A team is being dispatched to investigate.
A Freedom scout reported seeing an endless field anomaly. Clear Sky scientists are trying to confirm its existence.
Theres talk of a stalker finding a device that can detect invisible anomalies. Clear Sky has offered him protection in exchange for a demonstration.
Clear Sky scouts found a blood trail leading into the Dead City.
A strange clicking noise has been reported near the Swamps. Clear Sky believes it might be a previously unknown mutant.
Scouts spotted a Monolith patrol carrying what looked like experimental equipment. Clear Sky is planning an ambush to retrieve it.
A stalker claims to have seen a floating light deep in the Red Forest. Clear Sky is debating whether its worth investigating.
Clear Sky reports an artifact field in the Swamps has started shifting locations. Scientists are scrambling to study the phenomenon.
An old Monolith outpost near Yantar has shown signs of recent activity. Clear Sky scouts are moving in to investigate.
A strange reflection was spotted in the air near Pripyat.
A trader near the Cordon has a map claiming to show safe zones during emissions. Clear Sky doubts its accuracy.
Clear Sky operatives found a trail of melted footprints near the Agroprom. Theyre bracing for a mutant encounter.
Some stalkers are whispering about an anomaly storm forming near the Jupiter plant. Clear Sky is preparing for the worst.
A Freedom patrol was spotted retreating from the Red Forest, claiming they saw shapes in the mist. Clear Sky is investigating.
Scouts reported a strange echo in the Swamps that seemed to follow them. Clear Sky is sending equipment to record it.
A trader claimed he saw a Monolith soldier throw down his weapon and flee. Clear Sky wants to question him about what he saw.
A Freedom stalker swears he found a Monolith PDA with a map to their supply cache. I'm working to verify this claim.
Theres chatter about a stalker near Pripyat whos been untouched by anomalies. Clear Sky scientists are interested in finding him.
A glowing artifact field has appeared in the Red Forest. Clear Sky scientists are preparing an expedition.
A strange hum has been reported near the Agroprom. Clear Sky believes it might be a signal from a forgotten bunker.
Clear Sky operatives in the Dead City found a stash of ancient books. Early translations mention something about keys to the Zone.
Unconfirmed reports suggest an artifact in the Cordon is causing mild hallucinations. Clear Sky is sending a team to confirm.
Clear Sky scientists are debating whether mutants are attracted to radiation or our terrible cooking. The votes tied.
Some Freedom guy said the Zone is just misunderstood. Yeah, tell that to the Bloodsucker chasing me last night.
Clear Skys latest research breakthrough: if youre being chased by a mutant, run faster. Revolutionary stuff.
Turns out, the indestructible artifact we found was just an old tin can. Still, a hell of a paperweight.
Someone in the Swamps started calling a pseudodog Fluffy. Now it wont stop hanging around our camp.
Our scientists tried to test an anomaly by throwing a rock into it. The rock came back... with teeth marks.
Freedom stalkers say theyre all about peace. Funny how their idea of peace involves a lot of grenades.
One of our guys tried to make tea with anomaly water. He claims it tasted extra-dimensional. Hes still glowing.
Clear Sky scouts found an artifact that whispers. Now theyre arguing about what its saying. I hear it just wants lunch.
Clear Sky operatives in the Swamps reported an anomaly shifting colors every few seconds. Some suspect its reacting to nearby emotions.
A lone stalker arrived at our base claiming he survived the Brain Scorcher. I don't think he's in the right mental state.
We found what appears to be an artifact cluster fused into an old tree trunk. Clear Sky scientists believe the tree is still alive.
Some scouts spotted a floating figure near the Red Forest at dawn. I'm debating if its a new mutant or just an optical illusion.
Theres a rumor about a Monolith defector wandering around the Garbage. I'd like to debrief him before Duty catches wind.
We sent a drone into a safe anomaly. Moments later, it came back with half its casing missing. So much for safe.
Clear Sky scouts found a stack of old Soviet documents in the Dead City. Early translations mention Project Hestia and Zone expansions.
Our swamp guides reported a sudden tide of radioactive water flooding a known pass. Were scrambling to find an alternate route.
A rumor claims Dutys developing an emission-proof bunker in Rostok. Clear Sky wants a peek at their blueprints.
Monolith patrols have been sighted carrying strange cylinders. Our researchers suspect they might be prototype anomaly devices.
A Freedoms squad swore they saw a mirage anomaly that projected false landscapes. We are sending a team to verify the claim.
We installed a new anomaly detector near Yantar. It detected something massive under the ground, then died. Great.
One of our technicians claims he can modify detectors to pick up latent psychic fields. If hes right, it might explain those weird whispers at night.
A Duty captain asked for our help studying a rare artifact. Were suspicious but knowledge is power, right?
Clear Sky scouts returned from the Red Forest with tales of ghostly silhouettes. Scientists believe its an anomaly-induced echo, but were not so sure.
A broken PDA near the Jupiter Plant contained cryptic notes about a Shimmer Field. Clear Sky is gathering resources to investigate.
Our scouts saw a mutant pack fleeing from something in the Great Swamps. Whatever it is, it must be worse than snorks.
We tried analyzing a newly found artifacts energy signature. It started playing an old radio broadcast from 1986. Creepy timing.
Rumor has it theres a hidden tunnel under the Bar that leads to pre-Zone archives. Clear Sky is curious, but not enough to risk Dutys wrath yet.
A Freedoms squad retreated from the Dead City claiming to hear chanting. Clear Sky wants to confirm its not Monolith messing around.
We discovered a half-submerged lab in the Swamps that still has power. Our scientists are both excited and terrified.
A new wave of anomalies formed behind our base last night. We woke up to find our perimeter fence tangled like a pretzel.
Someone reported a singing anomaly near the Cordon. Clear Sky is preparing microphones to capture its melodyif it doesnt melt them.
Weve been testing an experimental anomaly diffuser device. So far, all its done is make a weird humming noise and cost us a small fortune.
Ever see a snork with two heads? Our scouts claim they did near the Red Forest. We hope thats just exhaustion talking.
A new stalker insists he can sense emissions before they happen. Clear Sky is keeping him closejust in case hes the real deal.
A battered old record player surfaced near Yantar. Oddly enough, it only plays static when an emission is about to hit.
Clear Sky medics tried to study a pseudodogs brain. Lets just say the pseudodog disagreed with that approach.
We discovered a hidden passage under a fallen tower in the Swamps. Our scouts say it leads to a labyrinth of half-flooded tunnels.
A Freedoms member claims to have found a stash of pre-Zone vodka. Our scientists worry about radiation in each bottle. The Freedoms guys dont.
Anomalies in the Great Swamps seem to be resonating in sync. Clear Sky suspects there might be a larger, more dangerous pattern emerging.
We tried to send a probe drone into the Dead City at night. It returned at dawn, flying upside-down and nearly out of battery. No footage, either.
Our researchers are debating if artifacts can 'die' after losing their charge. At least they dont ask for salaries when they're gone.
A strange, pulsing glow was seen floating across the Swamps at dusk. Clear Sky suspects it might be an artifact moving under its own power.
Scouts spotted fresh footprints near an old laboratory entrance in the Dead City. Clear Sky is preparing a team to investigate.
One of our technicians swears he intercepted a broadcast in the Red Forest repeating a single word: Awaken. Creepy.
Clear Sky field agents discovered a peculiar plant that seems to thrive on radiation. Were debating whether its worth cultivating or destroying.
We sent a scout to recon Monolith territory. He came back whispering about the voice behind the walls. Our medics are baffled.
A Freedoms stalker claims to have walked through an anomaly unscathed. Clear Sky scientists want to study his gearand maybe his DNA.
Clear Sky drones picked up bizarre static patterns near Jupiter. Could be interference, or something more ominous.
A Duty soldier reported seeing a massive, shimmering figure near the Cordon. Clear Sky wonders if its a mutant or a trick of the Zone.
We recovered a half-burned notebook from a campsite in the Swamps. It mentions shadows that move when you blink. Great.
Some Freedoms guys challenged us to a friendly campfire cook-off. Clear Sky scientists are analyzing the winning recipe for toxins. Just in case.
Clear Sky scouts found a mutated boar that seems docile. Were tempted to adopt it, but weve seen this horror movie before.
Anomalous lightning strikes have been reported near Agroprom. Our weather station data is going haywire trying to predict them.
A bandit tried to ransom a rare artifact to our scientists. Turned out to be a polished rock. Were keeping it anyway for the laugh.
We sent a survey team into the Great Swamps. They claim to have heard singing that echoed across the reeds. No one can agree on the melody.
A Freedoms patrol saw flickering silhouettes in the Dead City. Clear Sky suspects it might be an advanced form of psychic projectionor tired eyes.
Some egghead claims he found proof of a second Brain Scorcher facility. Clear Sky is triple-checking every rumor before committing resources.
Weve detected a low-frequency hum near the Garbage. Could be industrial resonance, or the Zones latest party trick.
One of our guys had a dream about a giant anomaly swallowing the Swamps. Were hoping its just stress and not a premonition.
Monolith forces have been unusually quiet lately. Clear Sky thinks they might be gathering for something bigprobably not a picnic.
A newly arrived stalker claims he can sense artifact energy. Clear Sky scientists want to see if he can sense sarcasm too.
Someone swore they heard a lullaby echoing in the old Pripyat school building. Clear Sky wants to confirm its not just the wind.
We spotted a weird ripple in the air near our perimeter. It vanished when approached. Our anomalies expert is stumpedagain.
Some Freedoms folks claim theres a hidden path leading straight to the CNPP. Clear Sky suspects its a trapor just a tall tale.
A strange fungus is spreading in the Swamps. Clear Sky medics advise not to inhale its sporesor brew tea with it.
We found an old radio tower that still broadcasts a womans voice repeating coordinates. Clear Sky is preparing an expedition to check them out.
A snork pack seemed to circle our base all night but never attacked. Clear Sky wonders if its just a twisted game of intimidation.
We tried using a new anomaly probe in the Dead City. It picked up a faint signal that almost sounded like a heartbeat.
A Freedoms stalker came to us claiming the Zone spoke to him. Clear Sky medics and psychologists are taking turns hearing him out.
We caught a glint of metal in the distance, beyond the Swamps. Could be a treasure stash or just another battered pipe. Who wants to find out?
The Zones emissions have been erratic lately. Our readings show spikes at odd intervals, like a heartbeat out of sync.
A passing bandit claimed he saw a living poltergeist near Yantar. Clear Sky is skeptical but taking precautions anyway.
We found a twisted metal sculpture in the Great Swamps that looks almost intentional. Clear Sky wonders whoor whatcreated it.
Some Freedoms guys were laughing about an artifact that meows when shaken. Clear Sky scientists are too curious not to investigate.
Attention, all squads: upon your arrival at the base, immediately report to the command post for instructions on the use of our new equipment models.
Attention to all squads that are in or near square e15! Confirm the presence of highly dangerous mutants in this region immediately! This information has been received from an unverified source.
Attention to all squads that are in or near square h23! Confirm the presence of highly dangerous mutants in this region immediately! This information has been received from an unverified source.
Calling all free squads! Bandit activity has once again risen in the Garbage. Clean up the sector.
Any stalkers assisting us in clearing out the path to the Bar will be rewarded.

Sergeant Saykin speaking, Fifth Squad. I'm addressing the people who committed vandalism yesterday at Rostok, on Duty grounds. If one more bottle flies through the window in Petrenko's office, any perpetrators will be shot.

Duty needs experienced and brave fighters to replenish their ranks and destroy mutants. To all those who joined our ranks, the Bar will conduct a special pricing policy. Former hoodlums are an exception!

Duty is announcing an enlistment. Any volunteer should show up at the base of operations in Rostok with a weapon, gear, and enough provisions for three days. IDs are not required. Good physical conditioning is encouraged.

We will warn you once again, anarchists. If you do not cease to send abrasive insults to the PDA of General Voronin, we will be paying your base a visit. You don't think we aren't aware of who's been doing this?
Enter the private channel and download the security update. If some lazy ass doesn't patch and info ends up leaking, he's a dead man.
Patch through all raid and mutant-related intel to the private channel. We really wouldn't want a leak.
Some brand-new SVDs have arrived in the warehouse. Anyone interested get a move on.
This is the recon team. We just saw some kind of black flying smoke in the Wild Territory. Waiting for instructions. Over.
We need experienced stalkers for a mutant raid. Payment is appropriate.
We need experienced stalkers to raid mutant hideouts. Adequate payment.
We need experienced stalkers for a snork culling operation. Payment will be generous.
Petrenko speaking. Zhivoderov, Arnie's asked you not to come to him if you capture anyone, as he doesn't have free cells at the moment. Keep them at your place for a day, and Arnie will pay you.
Petrenko, show the fuck up! What's wrong with the private channel? Down again?!
Petrenko, come in! Checking connection. My radio's broke, and I'm texting in the general channel. Sent a trooper with repair tools to the place where we'd been nailing boars yesterday.
Petrenko, this is Captain Sorokin from the Garbage speaking. Where's our ammunition?
Stalkers, join Duty! We shall cure our Earth from the deadly disease called the Zone!
Stalkers, join Duty. Protect the planet from the Zone's affliction!
Stalkers, remember: anarchy represents chaos, destruction, and death. Join Duty! Maintain order and purity in the Zone!
Stalkers, join us in our collective duty to protect and rid the world of the mutant invasion and anomalous infestation!
Okay, guys, I've received information about a group of mercenaries lingering on the outskirts of Rostok. Eyes peeled.
We have been experiencing technical difficulties with the equipment for the last two days. The connection to the database and the squads is acting up.

Captain Simonov speaking. Reporting about a strange type of mutant. An hour ago in b15, my squad and I observed a bizarre bloodsucker. It attacked a controller and decimated it with several blows before our very eyes. The beast didn't spot us. Awaiting orders.
Petrenko speaking. Kolya, confirm the info about the 10th Squad not returning from yesterday's raid. I think I've found what's left of them...
Don't gunk up the channel. Nobody cares about your lucky kills.
Attention, squads. Theres a growing mutant presence near the Rostok perimeter. We need to prepare for a potential assault. Stay vigilant.
Important message: a group of anarchists is rumored to be scouting the outskirts of our base. Don't trust anyone on the outside. Stand your ground.
Weve just intercepted a transmission from an unknown faction. Theyre planning something big, and it involves taking Rostok. Prepare for a possible attack.
Command has given the green light for an operation in the Wild Territory. The mutants are becoming more aggressive. We need to wipe them out before they can retaliate.
Petrenko here. If anyone encounters a mutant with armor-like plating in the Red Forest, report immediately. Its not something weve seen before.
Word has it, a Mercenary squad has been spotted near the Cordon. Be prepared, theyre not here for friendly exchanges.
Dutys looking for new recruits to bolster the ranks. If youve got the stomach for it, report to the Bar for a recruitment briefing. We need strong, experienced hands.
Urgent update: weve lost contact with the squad sent to clear the Swamps. Its been too long. If anyone is near that area, investigate at your own peril.
Standby for incoming shipment of high-powered weaponry. Anyone interested in taking part in upcoming raids, see Captain Simonov for briefing.
Weve got reports of a large group of Stalkers converging on the Cordon. They're not here for goodwill, so brace yourselves for a skirmish.
Clearance is given for a sweep of the Chernobyl power plant. Weve seen strange readings there. If anyones brave enough to join the mission, we need all hands on deck.
Petrenko here, again. The recent raids in the Garbage are costing us too many men. We need a plan for eliminating the Bandit threat, or were losing the foothold in this area.
Attention all squads: theres been an unusual spike in emissions around the Cordon. Move out immediately to secure the perimeter.
Weve encountered a new mutant species in the Swamps. Its fast, elusive, and deadly. Be on the lookout for anything that seems out of place.
Heads up: a large group of mercenaries has started to make their way through the Zone. Dont engage unless absolutely necessary. Theyre a dangerous bunch.
All Duty forces are to be on high alert. Weve intercepted plans from a rival faction plotting against us. Their target is Rostok, and theyve got the manpower to make it happen.
Duty Command is putting a bounty on any rogue Stalkers causing trouble in the Zone. If youre willing to hunt them down, report to Petrenko for instructions.
Weve had reports of rare artifacts near the Red Forest. If youre in the area, take the risktheres high reward, but dont expect to be the only one hunting them.
Petrenko speaking. Weve got intel that the Bandits have set up a camp near the Rostok entrance. If you're in the area, clear them out.
Attention all squads: theres been a significant shift in mutant behavior near the Wild Territory. We need immediate reinforcements in that sector.
The connections been established with our forward base in the Cordon. Theyve reported an influx of mutants. Theyre requesting immediate support.
Attention all squads in the Dark Valley! There's a major gas leak in the nearby bunker complex. Evacuate the area immediately until the engineers can fix it.
Squad leaders, report in! We've got intel that a new breed of mutants has been spotted near the Tunnel. Consider the area high risk until further notice.
Urgent: All squads should be on high alert. We've detected an unusual seismic activity in the Zone. Stay prepared for any sudden changes or anomalies.
Petrenko here, all squads in Rostok! A large group of mercenaries are setting up shop in the area. They may be planning an attack. Be ready for anything.
Duty calls for reinforcements! We have confirmed a massive mutant horde approaching the Cordon. All available forces must engage and hold the line.
All squads, report on the status of the radar stations. There's been a strange pattern detected, possibly related to the recent anomalies. We need full updates.
Attention, Duty members: Bandit activity is increasing near the Garbage. Report any suspicious movements immediately. Well need to deal with them before they escalate.
All squads in the Red Forest, proceed with caution. We have intel suggesting that an artifact collector group has entered the area. We cannot afford another incident.
Captain Sorokin reporting: We've encountered a strange anomaly near the Dead City. The area is unstable and should be avoided until further investigation.
All Duty members, a new mutant pack has been spotted near the Old Rail Tunnel. Approach with caution, and keep your weapons ready.
Attention, all squads! Theres an emergency situation at the Bar. A group of hostile stalkers has infiltrated the area. Reinforcements are required immediately!
Urgent: A major anomaly explosion has been detected near the Southern Marsh. All squads should avoid the area until the situation stabilizes.
Squad leaders, be on the lookout for a new type of mutant near the Cordon. Reports suggest it can blend into its surroundings, making it a serious threat.
Petrenko speaking, we have secured a new supply drop near the Old Train Station. Head over there now and stock up before anyone else gets their hands on it.
Attention all units: We're receiving reports of a new faction gathering near the Wild Territory. Be cautious; they could be planning something big.
Captain Zhivoderov here. A group of heavily armed mercenaries has been spotted in the Dark Valley. Be prepared to engage them on sight if they make a move.
All squads, make sure your radios are working. Weve been having interference near the Garbage area. We can't afford any communication failures.
Urgent: A high-ranking scientist has been found near the Cordon. He's offering valuable intel, but we must get him to safety before anyone else catches wind.
Duty forces, prepare for a raid in the Yantar region. Intelligence suggests that a new mutant species has been spotted there. Engage and eliminate with extreme prejudice.
Were receiving strange reports about an experimental weapon being tested in the Army Warehouses. Duty squads, investigate and report back immediately.
Attention all Duty units in the Dead City! There are increasing reports of anomalies being activated at random. Stay in tight formation and proceed with caution.
Urgent: A new breed of controller has been reported in the Dark Valley. Its more powerful than any weve encountered before. Proceed with extreme caution.
Captain Simonov reporting: Weve just seen a massive emission spike in the Wild Territory. All squads should take cover immediately. Expect violent anomalies.
Attention all squads: We have confirmed the presence of a large stash of valuable artifacts in the swamps. Expect heavy oppositionbe ready for a fierce fight.
All Duty members! We're currently investigating reports of strange biological activity near the Army Warehouses. If you are in the area, stay alert and report any abnormalities.
Petrenko here. There's a major power outage affecting parts of Rostok. Keep your eyes peeled, as we've had reports of suspicious individuals lurking in the dark.
Attention all squads: There's a new faction operating near the Wild Territory. Weve had confirmed sightings of their armed patrols. Approach with caution.
Urgent: A massive breach has occurred in the Bar's defenses. Duty members, respond immediately to prevent the facility from falling into enemy hands.
Squads in the Dead City: Reports indicate a strong bandit presence. Theyve begun raiding nearby safehouses. Deal with them before they escalate further.
All squads in the Cordon area: We've received intel on a supply drop that's going to be made near the Agroprom. Secure it before anyone else does!
Petrenko here: Anomalous readings near the Dark Valley have spiked. All units proceed with maximum caution; this could mean something unprecedented.
Duty command: Reports of rogue Monolith scouts in the Wild Territory. They seem disorganized, but do not underestimate them.
Attention squads: There's word of a powerful artifact near the Red Forest. Recon teams, find it before anyone else does, but beware of mutants in the area.
Petrenko: We've identified a mutant migration route cutting through the Agroprom. Squads in the vicinity, take defensive positions immediately.
All squads: Weve detected Monolith radio chatter near Rostok. Possible raid imminent. Hold your ground and prepare for reinforcement.
Urgent: An unidentified anomaly is forming in the Garbage. All personnel avoid the area until further notice. Recon teams will investigate.
Duty command: Rumors of a rogue Freedom group operating near Yantar. Stay alert for possible ambushes or sabotage attempts.
Petrenko reporting: A stalker claims to have seen a massive mutant near the Army Warehouses. Verification pending. Keep your weapons ready.
Attention squads: Recon indicates bandit activity intensifying near the Garbage. Tactical response teams, prepare to intercept.
All units: Strange psionic disturbances reported in the Dead City. Psi-protection is mandatory for anyone entering the area.
Petrenko here: Artifact activity spiking near the Brain Scorcher. This could draw Monolith forces. Prepare for conflict.
Duty forces: Scouts have discovered an abandoned stash near the Red Forest. Expect mutants or rival factions guarding it.
Attention: A massive surge of radiation has been detected near the Pripyat outskirts. Immediate evacuation advised.
Duty command: Recon team reports strange lights emanating from an old bunker in the Swamps. Investigate but proceed cautiously.
Petrenko reporting: Freedom forces are rallying near the Cordon. Be prepared for possible aggression.
Attention squads: Rumors of an experimental weapon circulating in the Black Market. Intelligence teams to investigate ASAP.
Petrenko: Scouts near the Agroprom have gone silent. Investigate their last known location immediately.
All Duty squads: Reports of a possible emission event near Rostok. Seek cover and remain on high alert.
Duty command: A high-value Monolith officer has been sighted near Pripyat. Capture or eliminate them at all costs.
Attention: A stalker discovered a hidden anomaly field in the Wild Territory. Recon teams are being dispatched to secure the area.
Petrenko: Strange mechanical noises reported near the Army Warehouses. Could be Monolith tech. Investigate carefully.
Petrenko here: Unusual seismic activity near the Red Forest. All units remain vigilant for possible new anomalies.
All squads: A Monolith supply convoy was seen heading towards the Pripyat outskirts. Intercept and retrieve any valuable intel or equipment.
Attention: Scouts reported a mutant pack unusually close to the Rostok checkpoint. Reinforce defenses immediately.
Duty command: Freedom forces have been spotted planting traps near the Yantar perimeter. Approach with extreme caution.
Petrenko reporting: Monolith patrols sighted near the Brain Scorcher. Heavy resistance expected. Stay on high alert.
All squads: A sudden spike in radiation levels near the Agroprom tunnels. Evacuation protocols are in effect for the area.
Attention: Recon found an abandoned Freedom outpost in the Swamps. No signs of life, but the area feels... wrong. Proceed with caution.
Duty forces: Scouts claim to have found an artifact field near the Wild Territory. Expect competition from rival factions.
Petrenko: Unconfirmed reports of a rogue stalker with high-value intel hiding near the Garbage. Capture alive if possible.
All units: A Monolith sniper was seen operating near the Dead City. Extreme caution is advised when navigating the area.
Duty command: The Red Forests anomalies are shifting unpredictably. Avoid the area until further updates are provided.
Attention squads: A stalker spotted an unknown anomaly type near Zaton. Recon teams are being deployed to investigate.
Petrenko here: Freedom scouts have been probing our defenses near the Cordon. Prepare for a possible skirmish.
All Duty units: Scouts near the Agroprom claim to have heard strange mechanical noises underground. Exercise caution during any investigation.
Petrenko: Theres word of a highly unstable artifact circulating in the Black Market. Intelligence is working to track its location.
Duty command: New Monolith recruits seen heading towards the Pripyat outskirts. Reinforce checkpoints and prepare for conflict.
Attention all units: Recent Freedom activity suggests plans for a large-scale raid near the Army Warehouses. Reinforce defenses immediately.
Freedoms idea of strategy: sit around a campfire and hope the mutants get bored. Brilliant as ever.
Monolith soldiers chanting again? Sounds like theyre trying to out-sing the Bloodsuckers. Guess whos going to win that one.
Freedom says they fight for liberty. Funny, I thought liberty meant not stealing our supplies. Weird.
The bandits tried to ambush us again. Shame they forgot we know how to aim.
Clear Sky keeps talking about balance in the Zone. Guess they missed the part where balance means staying alive.
Monolith calls us traitors. At least we can remember our names, unlike those brainwashed puppets.
Freedoms scouts ran into a pseudogiant. Wonder if they tried negotiating with it. Spoiler: they lost.
Someone tell the bandits that camouflage doesnt mean wearing mud and calling it a uniform.
Freedoms idea of reconnaissance: sending the guy with the least vodka in his system. Good luck with that.
Clear Sky claims to study anomalies, but theyre the ones who keep walking into them. Thats dedication.
Monoliths soldiers never retreat. Guess its easy when youve got no brain left to understand fear.
A stalker said Duty lacks humor. Jokes on himwere too busy surviving to write a comedy show.
Freedom says theyre the kings of the Zone. Shame they keep losing to boars. Majestic, really.
Bandits think theyre sneaky until you hear their boots squeaking five minutes before they show up.
Clear Sky just sent another urgent message. Translation: they poked an anomaly, and it poked back.
Attention Duty squads: new mutant sightings near the Dark Valley. Recon indicates increased snork activity. Stay alert.
Petrenko: Heard Freedom tried to tame a pseudodog. Ill let you guess how that turned out.
All units: weve intercepted a Monolith transmission babbling about divine artifacts. Double-check your gear, they might come looking.
Be advised: Bandits are moving loot through the Garbage again. Lets show them why its called Duty, not Casual Friday.
Freedom claims were too serious. Maybe theyd be serious too, if they didnt have to restock ammo every time a rodent scurries by.
Report indicates Clear Sky found a mutant nest in the Swamps. Theyre requesting cooperation. Lets hope they havent stirred the hornets nest.
Petrenko again: If you see Monolith fanatics chanting, assume theyre calling in reinforcements. Shut them down quickly.
Incoming intel: Freedoms bragging about a secret passage. Let them wander. Well find them when they inevitably need help.
Bandits keep talking about a score of a lifetime. Too bad they cant shoot straight. Keep an eye on their movements.
Duty HQ: Weve encountered an anomaly cluster near Agroprom. Exercise caution and mark the area for rookies to avoid.
Monolith preached about cleansing the Zone. Pity their bullet-spray never cleans up their own mess.
Freedoms going on about some big celebration. Well celebrate when the Zones free of their recklessness.
Petrenko: Weve got rumors of a chimera lurking near Rostok. This is no jokestay in pairs if you value your head.
Clear Sky tried to warn us about a new psychic threat. Well see if its real or just their nerves talking.
Monolith doesnt need water or food, apparentlyjust that twisted faith. Well supply them with a reality check.
Freedoms boasted they finally took down a Bloodsucker. One? Great. We handle a pack before breakfast.
Bandits scuffled with mutants near the Garbage. Mutants looked better fed afterwards. Enough said.
Duty squads near the Cordon found an abandoned Monolith outpost. Keep your guard upthose zealots dont abandon posts lightly.
A rookie asked if we give Zone tours. Sure, kid, sign up for Duty. The only tour you get is the daily patrol route.
Freedom claims artifacts are the future of humanity. We claim a loaded rifle is the future of survival.
Bandits tried to bribe us to look the other way. The only thing were turning away is their worthless rubles.
Clear Skys new research device beeped nonstop at our checkpoint. Probably just sensing our strong resolveor the metal in our boots.
Monolith chatter mentioned the path to the center. Lets remind them the only path leads to a dead end with Dutys bullets.
Heard Freedom wants to set up a safe camp. Lets see how safe they feel when a pseudodog sniffs out their cooking.
Petrenko: Recon found a blowout crater near the Dark Valley. If you value your skin, steer clear till we analyze it.
A stray bandit tried to slip past our checkpoint, claiming to be just a harmless trader. We recognized the stench of cheap ammo a mile away.
Freedom scorned our discipline as boring. Right, because random anarchy does so well against an emission.
Monolith keeps chanting about the Monoliths will. Our will is to keep them far away from innocent stalkers.
Clear Sky requested protection for a new anomaly study. Well watch their backsjust dont say we never do anything nice.
Local rumor: a pair of Freedom scouts lost in the Red Forest. Lets see how their chill vibes help them navigate that maze.
Bandits bragged about having an unstoppable assault team. Our snipers disagreedand proved it.
Clear Sky discovered a new mutant strain. Just when we thought wed seen it all. Sharpen your blades, Duty.
Petrenko signing off: Remember, Duty stands for discipline and order. The Zones chaos doesnt take breaks, and neither do we.
Petrenko: We caught wind of Freedom stockpiling artifacts near the Army Warehouses. Looks like they're planning something. Stay vigilant.
All Duty units: Monolith patrols spotted in the Red Forest. Theyre carrying strange deviceslikely not for making friends.
A bandit at the Bar tried to sell me premium ammo. Turned out to be hollow casings. They never learn.
Freedom insists they feel the Zones energy. Our reading says its just radiation. But hey, whatever helps them sleep at night.
Duty recon teams have detected mutated boars roaming deeper into Agroprom. Guess theyre tired of eating Freedoms scraps.
Clear Sky asked for volunteers to escort their researchers. Well protect them, but no complaining when we say hold position!
Monolith chanting got louder near Jupiter. Either theyre recruiting or practicing their battle hymns. Either way, keep your rifle loaded.
Freedoms laughed at our patrol formationuntil a pack of dogs took them by surprise. Discipline pays off, folks.
Petrenko: Keep an eye on the Garbage. Bandits are rumored to have a new boss who thinks hes unstoppable. Well prove otherwise.
Heard a rookie claim Duty is too rigid. Were not here to make jokes, were here to make the Zone saferperiod.
Freedom prides themselves on liberation. Meanwhile, Duty prides itself on not getting eaten by snorks. Priorities, people.
A strange anomaly cluster popped up near the Dark Valley. If its anything like last time, well have more than enough trouble soon.
Monolith is quietly expanding in Pripyat. Quiet doesnt mean harmlessdouble up patrols at all key points.
Bandits tried to infiltrate our ranks by wearing Duty patches. We spotted them faster than they could say hands up.
Clear Sky wants to exchange intel on mutant migrations. Well take all the info we can get. The Zones shifting faster than we can adapt.
Freedom scouts brag about getting in tune with the Zone. Lets see them stay tuned when a Bloodsucker corners them.
Petrenko: Increased snork sightings near Rostok. Consider every shadow a potential threatsnorks dont knock before they jump you.
Monolith broadcasts mention something called the Ascension. Lets keep them groundedin a grave, if necessary.
Some rookie insisted on seeing the Wish Granter. We told him to wish for a better aim first. Priority, soldier.
Freedoms partying again by the Army Warehouses. Let them have their funour squads are patrolling where it actually matters.
Bandits tried to set up a toll booth in the Garbage. We reminded them that duty is not to be trifled with. Tolls closed for business.
Clear Sky claims a new mutant species is emerging. Fantasticjust what we needed. More nightmares to hunt.
Monolith squads keep scouring the Zone for relics. Lets hope they keep failing. Their success is everyone elses downfall.
Petrenko: Keep an eye on rookies who say they admire Freedom. We dont need starry-eyed wanderers in the middle of a firefight.
Heard rumors about a bandit kingpin in the Dark Valley. Another clown looking to rule a graveyard. Well show him the exit.
Freedom posters say were fun police. Good. The Zone isnt a carnival, its a battlefield.
Clear Skys new anomaly research data might help. Or might blow up in their faces. Either way, well keep watch.
Monolith started preaching near the Cordon. They shut up real quick when Duty arrived. Must not have liked our amen.
Freedom believes the Zone provides guidance. Meanwhile, we provide bulletproof vests. Practicality wins wars.
A bandit at the Garbage boasted about capturing a Bloodsucker. We found him an hour later running for his life. Typical.
Petrenko: Keep your eyes open for unusual anomalies. The Zone evolves dailyand so should we.
Freedom scouts tried to sabotage one of our outposts. They forgot Duty doesnt sleepcaught them with their pants down.
All squads: Remember why we fight. The Zone is dangerous enough without chaos. Duty stands between order and oblivionnever forget that.
Monolith fanatics are spreading nonsense about a Great Convergence. Well converge their heads with our bullets.
Freedoms latest stunt involved a peace rally near the Bar. Peace? In the Zone? Theyre delusional.
Bandits tried to ambush our supply convoy. They learned the hard way that Duty never travels unprepared.
Clear Sky reports increased anomaly activity near the Red Forest. Well investigateand exterminate any threats.
Monolith preachers are talking about The Awakening. Well awaken them to the reality of a bullet.
Freedoms liberation of the Army Warehouses ended in a firefight. Liberation? More like a waste of ammo.
Bandits in the Dark Valley thought they could outsmart us. Theyre now decorating the trees.
Petrenko: Remind all squads to check their gear regularly. The Zone doesnt forgive sloppiness.
Freedoms propaganda machine is in overdrive. Theyre calling us oppressors. We call them targets.
Clear Skys new detector prototypes are promising. If they work, well be the first to test them in the field.
Monolith squads are getting bolder. We intercepted one near the Cordon. They wont be bothering anyone again.
Freedoms attempt to liberate the Garbage ended in a rout. Liberation? More like a lesson in humility.
Bandits tried to set up a trap near the Rostok. We turned the tables and left them a nice surprise.
Petrenko: Keep an eye on the rookies. Some of them are getting too comfortable. Complacency kills.
Freedoms freedom fighters tried to infiltrate our base. They found out the hard way that Duty never sleeps.
Clear Skys latest anomaly research is intriguing. If it pans out, well be the first to use it against our enemies.
Monolith preachers are talking about The Revelation. Well reveal them to the business end of our rifles.
Freedoms liberation of the Dark Valley ended in a disaster. Liberation? More like a waste of resources.
Bandits in the Cordon thought they could ambush us. Theyre now feeding the crows.
Petrenko: Remind all squads to stay vigilant. The Zone is unpredictable, and so are our enemies.
Freedoms propaganda is getting ridiculous. Theyre calling us tyrants. We call them amateurs.
Clear Skys new detector prototypes are showing promise. If they work, well be the first to use them in combat.
Monolith squads are getting more aggressive. We intercepted one near the Bar. They wont be a problem anymore.
Freedoms attempt to liberate the Army Warehouses ended in failure. Liberation? More like a waste of time.
Bandits tried to set up a trap near the Garbage. We turned the tables and left them a nice surprise.
Petrenko: Keep an eye on the rookies. Some of them are getting too confident. Overconfidence is deadly.
Freedoms freedom fighters tried to sabotage our outpost. They found out the hard way that Duty never rests.
Clear Skys latest anomaly research is fascinating. If it works, well be the first to use it against our foes.
Monolith preachers are talking about The Enlightenment. Well enlighten them with a few well-placed shots.
Freedoms liberation of the Rostok ended in a fiasco. Liberation? More like a lesson in futility.

Our engineers have been working overtime to fortify the Rostok perimeter. No ones getting through without a fight.
Weve set up new supply routes through the Cordon. Expect faster resupply times for our frontline squads.
Rumors of a new mutant species near the Red Forest have our scientists on edge. Stay alert out there.
The Bar is buzzing with talk of a hidden stash of artifacts. Were sending a team to investigate.
Our medics have developed a new antidote for the latest strain of Zone sickness. Make sure to stock up.
Weve intercepted a shipment of black market weapons headed for the Bandits. Looks like theyll be fighting with sticks now.
Petrenko: Remind all squads to rotate patrol routes. Predictability is a death sentence in the Zone.
Our tech team has upgraded the bases communication systems. Expect clearer comms and fewer dead zones.
Reports of strange lights in the sky near the Dark Valley. Keep your eyes peeled and report any sightings.
Weve established a new safe house in the Garbage. Its not much, but its a lifesaver in a pinch.
Our intel suggests Freedom is planning something big. All squads, be on high alert.
The Rostok market is booming with new traders. Keep an eye out for any suspicious activity.
Our scouts have mapped out new safe paths through the Cordon. Make sure to update your maps.
Weve captured a high-ranking Bandit leader. Interrogation is ongoing, but we expect valuable intel.
Petrenko: Remind all squads to maintain radio silence during patrols. Loose lips sink ships.
Our engineers have developed a new type of armor-piercing ammo. Expect to see it in the next supply drop.
Reports of increased mutant activity near the Army Warehouses. Proceed with caution.
Weve set up a new observation post in the Dark Valley. Expect better intel on enemy movements.
Our medics have been working on a new stimulant to keep our troops sharp. Field tests are looking good.
Rumors of a new artifact with incredible healing properties. Were sending a team to investigate.
Weve intercepted a Monolith broadcast mentioning a Great Convergence. Keep your eyes peeled for any unusual activity.
Our scouts have discovered a hidden cache of supplies in the Garbage. Expect a resupply soon.
