Reports of increased mutant activity near the Garbage. Proceed with caution.
Our engineers have installed new surveillance systems around Rostok. Nothing will go unnoticed.
Weve established a new supply route through the Wild Territory. Expect faster resupply times for our frontline squads.
Rumors of a new artifact with incredible properties near the Pripyat Stadium. Were sending a team to investigate.
The Bar is buzzing with talk of a hidden stash of advanced weaponry. Were sending a team to secure it.
Our medics have developed a new antidote for the latest strain of Zone sickness. Make sure to stock up.
Attention! An unknown gas leak in square b41 has just been detected. Take appropriate measures.

If you feel your body grow heavy as the world begins to lose its colours and a jaundiced veil appears before your eyes, try to leave that area as soon as possible. You are most likely falling under the direct influence of the alternating field of psy-emissions!
Requesting helicopter to the central mobile lab in square y6_4.
There has been a burst of variable psy-emissions in sector y2_4. Be extremely careful.
Militarised research groups remind military stalkers that a SEVA-class suit will not provide you with adequate protection against many anomalous effects. Use an SSP-class suit.

Militarised research groups remind all unregistered individuals in the territory of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone that you can approach one of our mobile bunkers and surrender. You will not be shot, you will be provided with all necessary medical assistance, and you will be consigned to the SSU at the earliest opportunity.
Any recruits among the military forces at Yantar should contact me, Professor Sakharov, immediately.
Professor Ozersky, please contact us immediately. This concerns your latest research.
Northern mobile lab, how long are we supposed to wait for those important anomalous samples from you? Enough with this absurdity!

Dear soldiers and undocumented individuals! Militarised research groups and the Scientific Research Institute of the Chernobyl Anomalous Zone would like to remind you that vodka does not contribute to the elimination of radionuclides. Use anti-radiation drugs instead.

Professor Hermann speaking. For the last two days, we have been waiting for the results of our psy-emission research from Professor Sakharov, however, he has been refusing to contact us. What is the meaning of this?
Attention: The gas leak in Square B41 has intensified. Immediate evacuation is advised for all personnel in the area.
Warning: The electromagnetic anomalies in the Red Forest have increased. Conduct all operations with extreme caution.
Emergency notice: A strong psy-emission has been detected near the Yantar Research Facility. All personnel should seek shelter immediately.
Field reports suggest unusual weather patterns near the Jupiter plant. Stay alert and report any abnormalities.
Reminder: The SEVA-class suits are not designed for long exposure to psi-fields. Please switch to SSP-class suits when working near such anomalies.
Professor Hermann reports delays in receiving key anomalous data. Further updates will be provided shortly.
Important: New creature sightings in the area north of the Agroprom. It is suspected these may be linked to anomalous activity.
Urgent: We are experiencing a rapid increase in radioactive emissions near the Cordon. All field researchers are advised to evacuate immediately.
Alert: The mobile lab in Square Y6_4 reports significant losses in equipment due to recent psionic disturbances. Backup teams are en route.
Emergency message from Professor Sakharov: The current anomaly level in the Dark Valley is reaching critical levels. All research is suspended until further notice.
Reminder: The use of anti-radiation drugs is mandatory for any personnel entering the contaminated zones. Stay safe and stay healthy.
Attention: Unidentified object sighted near the Pripyat Ruins. An expedition team is being sent to investigate. Do not approach without authorization.
Professor Ozersky's latest findings on mutant behavior show increased aggression in the vicinity of strong anomalous fields. Further research is ongoing.
Critical: The radiation leak near the Yantar facility has reached dangerous levels. Immediate evacuation of all personnel is mandatory.
Field teams are instructed to report any abnormalities in artifact radiation within the next 48 hours. Early warning is crucial.
Professor Hermann demands an immediate status report on the psy-emission research. Delays in reporting are unacceptable.
Important: New data suggests that the anomalous fields near the Duga radar are growing stronger. Proceed with caution in this area.
Attention: Military forces report increased mutant activity near the Chernobyl Reactor. Civilians and non-military personnel are advised to stay clear.
Reminder: The mobile research team at the Agroprom reports that many of their samples are showing signs of radiation contamination. Samples must be properly stored.
Urgent: Several field researchers have gone missing near the Jupiter plant. A search operation is underway, but the area remains highly unstable.
Alert: Mutant activity near the Cordon is reaching unprecedented levels. Research expeditions in the area are suspended until further notice.
Important: The SEVA-class suits shielding capabilities are insufficient against the increased psionic emissions in the Dark Valley. Ensure proper equipment upgrades.
Warning: Anomalous radiation signatures have been detected around the Pripyat nuclear plant. Researchers should avoid this area for the foreseeable future.
Reminder: New safety protocols for handling anomalous materials are now in effect. All researchers must complete the updated training module immediately.
Urgent: A containment breach has occurred at the Yantar research station. All non-essential personnel are advised to evacuate immediately.
Attention: A massive artifact explosion has occurred near the Red Forest. Researchers are to stay clear of the affected zone.
Emergency: A severe storm is predicted to hit the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone within the next 24 hours. All personnel should secure shelter immediately.
Alert: A psy-emission burst is currently being tracked in the area near the Agroprom. Researchers are urged to evacuate until the threat subsides.
Field teams, please be aware of unusual fluctuations in gravitational anomalies around the Cordon. These may impact your equipment and safety.
Attention: All research in proximity to the Duga radar is suspended indefinitely due to intense radiation levels and instability.
Reminder: Researchers should refrain from using fire-based weapons near anomalous zones due to risk of triggering larger explosions.
Urgent: A sudden surge in psi-emission levels was recorded near the Yantar facility. All personnel are to report for immediate decontamination.
Important: Teams in the Cordon are instructed to report any mutant sightings immediately. The increase in anomalous activity may be linked to these creatures.
Field teams, please be aware that high-risk mutants are showing signs of increased aggression near the Agroprom. Exercise caution.
Notice: Recent artifact readings near the Army Warehouses suggest a rare energy spike. Approach the area with extreme caution.
Field teams, be advised: A new gravitational anomaly has been reported in the Red Forest. Its highly unstable.
Reminder: If you encounter an unclassified artifact, do not attempt to handle it without proper containment tools. Report it immediately.
Alert: Radiation levels near the Pripyat outskirts are spiking abnormally. Avoid the area unless fully equipped.
Urgent: Researchers near Yantar have reported a series of unexplainable disappearances. All operations in the area are halted.
Attention: A high-energy surge in the Brain Scorcher's vicinity has disrupted several communication lines. Do not approach without clearance.
Reminder: All personnel are to complete anomaly safety drills before heading into high-risk zones. Too many avoidable injuries reported recently.
Field teams, take note: Recent environmental changes suggest a potential new anomaly forming near the Cordon. Preliminary reports are inconclusive.
Important: Artifact activity near the Jupiter plant suggests a link to seismic tremors. Ongoing research is required.
Alert: Mutant attacks near the Agroprom have increased in frequency. Avoid solo expeditions in the region.
Notice: A rare electromagnetic surge was detected near the Dead City. Instruments are malfunctioning; proceed with caution.
Attention: The Swamps are seeing rapid anomaly shifts. Field teams are urged to avoid the area until further notice.
Emergency: Reports of a new mutant species near Rostok have emerged. Details are scarce; field teams are on alert.
Field update: Artifact clusters near the Red Forest are emitting uncharacteristic radiation signatures. Teams must exercise extreme caution.
Important: Yantar facilities are now on high alert after discovering anomalies interfering with psi-shielding devices.
Reminder: Ensure your geiger counters are operational. Radiation anomalies have been reported shifting unpredictably across known safe zones.
Urgent: A rift anomaly is reportedly expanding near the Dead City. Researchers are to report findings immediately and avoid prolonged exposure.
Notice: Artifact hunters have reported seeing strange figures in the fog near Pripyat. Stay vigilant.
Attention: An unstable energy field was detected near the Garbage. Teams are advised to maintain distance until containment protocols are confirmed.
Field teams, note: Unusual weather patterns are accelerating anomaly formations in the Zone. Monitor local conditions closely.
Alert: Researchers near the Duga radar have experienced auditory hallucinations. Investigations are ongoing; avoid prolonged exposure.
Field report: The Swamps are experiencing a surge of unstable psi-emissions. All personnel should evacuate immediately.
Warning: A dense fog near the Brain Scorcher is showing anomalous activity. Approach with psi-protection gear.
Important: A team near the Jupiter plant reported strange, glowing footprints leading into the fog. Theyve gone silent since.
Notice: A new anomaly cluster in the Cordon is causing equipment malfunctions. Avoid direct contact.
Alert: Reports of auditory hallucinations have emerged near the Red Forest. Stay in groups and maintain radio contact.
Update: Artifact hunters near Yantar claim theyve found living anomalies. Verification is pending, but be cautious.
Urgent: The Agroprom underground is experiencing heavy seismic activity. Researchers are advised to postpone expeditions.
Attention: Radiation levels near the Duga radar are spiking unpredictably. Ensure protective equipment is operational.
Reminder: All research teams in the Zone must log artifact interactions to HQ immediately. Unreported anomalies are a risk to all.
Notice: Several scanners have malfunctioned in the Dead City. Psi-emission interference suspected. Evacuate if necessary.
Field teams, take note: Recent emissions near the Army Warehouses are causing rapid anomaly formation. Plan routes carefully.
Alert: A high-frequency energy burst was detected near Pripyat. Researchers suspect artifact destabilization. Avoid the area.
Important: A new mutant species exhibiting camouflage has been reported near the Red Forest. Engage only with proper backup.
Notice: A shimmering anomaly near Rostok is distorting visibility. Extreme caution is advised for all field teams.
Update: Artifact readings near Yantar are showing unpredictable fluctuations. Researchers should remain on high alert.
Field report: Strange lights have been spotted near the Garbage at night. Possible anomaly interaction suspected.
Urgent: Reports of an artifact emitting a high-pitched sound near the Swamps. Symptoms of disorientation in affected personnel.
Attention: High-intensity radiation bursts detected in the Dead City. Ensure all personnel have functioning geiger counters.
Notice: Researchers near the Cordon reported flickering shadows in anomaly clusters. Investigate with caution.
Alert: A containment breach in the Agroprom underground has caused psi-emission leaks. Avoid the area at all costs.
Reminder: Anomaly density near the Jupiter outskirts has doubled. Field teams are advised to update navigation maps accordingly.
Field report: A glowing tree in the Red Forest appears to be an artifact hotspot. Research is ongoing.
Important: A rogue energy signature has been detected near the Brain Scorcher. Teams are monitoring its progression closely.
Urgent: Radiation-resistant mutants have been spotted in the Dead City. Engage with extreme caution.
Notice: A faint humming noise was reported near artifact clusters in the Garbage. Possible anomaly interaction suspected.
Alert: Field teams in the Swamps report missing equipment near newly formed anomalies. Investigate with care.
Update: Scanners near the Rostok facility are picking up faint signals of unidentified energy sources. Investigations underway.
Attention: Artifact clusters in Pripyat are showing unusual energy surges. Avoid close contact without proper equipment.
Reminder: All personnel near Yantar should monitor weather changes closely. Anomalous storms have been reported.
Important: The Duga radar facility is experiencing sporadic electromagnetic bursts. Avoid electronic interference zones.
Urgent: Psi-protected zones in the Brain Scorcher's vicinity are shrinking. Update field routes accordingly.
Field report: Shimmering heat waves near the Agroprom suggest anomaly merging. Steer clear of uncharted paths.
Notice: Researchers near Pripyat have discovered an artifact that emits a faint, rhythmic pulse. Testing is ongoing.
Field teams report strange, metallic clanking sounds near the Army Warehouses. Source unknown. Approach with care.
Attention: A previously unknown anomaly in the Red Forest is distorting time perception. Avoid prolonged exposure.
Reminder: All personnel working near the Swamps are required to update psi-emission shielding protocols immediately.
Field report: A faint, ghostly figure has been seen near the Dead City. Its presence coincides with anomaly activity.
Urgent: The Duga radar facility is experiencing electromagnetic surges. Ensure no electronic devices are exposed.
Update: Artifact hotspots near the Cordon have been shifting rapidly. Recalibrate equipment for accurate detection.
Notice: A strange humming sound has been reported near the Garbage. It intensifies when approached.
Attention: Researchers near the Jupiter plant have discovered a new energy signature. Investigations are underway.
Field report: A strange mist has settled over the Red Forest, causing disorientation among personnel. Avoid the area.
Reminder: All personnel near Rostok must carry updated anomaly maps. Uncharted zones have increased significantly.
Alert: A high-intensity radiation pocket has formed near Yantar. Ensure suits are fully sealed before entering.
Important: The Agroprom underground tunnels have shown evidence of seismic activity. Evacuate immediately if tremors intensify.
Update: Psi-protection readings near Pripyat are fluctuating. Monitor devices closely during expeditions.
Field teams report unusual light distortions in the Swamps. Anomalies are suspected to be in flux.
Notice: Equipment malfunctions have been reported near the Brain Scorcher. Magnetic interference is likely.
Alert: A pulsating artifact has been found near the Army Warehouses. Avoid contact until further research is completed.
Reminder: Clear Sky scientists are requesting data on the new anomaly clusters in the Dead City. Share logs if possible.
Attention: A faint energy signature near Yantar may indicate the presence of a rare artifact. Proceed with caution.
Field teams, be advised: Increased mutant activity near Rostok correlates with recent emissions. Stay alert.
Urgent: Researchers in the Cordon report anomalies that are blending together. Effects are unpredictable.
Notice: A shimmering field near Pripyat is interfering with electronic systems. Avoid using advanced gear in the area.
Update: Radiation levels near the Dead City are dropping temporarily. Use the window to gather field data.
Alert: Field teams in the Red Forest report sightings of a large, unknown entity. Engage with extreme caution.
Reminder: Artifact studies near Yantar suggest high instability. Store all findings in shielded containers.
Notice: The Agroprom facility has recorded faint, rhythmic tremors. Researchers suspect underground anomaly activity.
Attention: A new gravitational anomaly cluster has formed in the Swamps. Navigation routes must be updated immediately.
Field report: Glowing spores have been observed near the Rostok plant. Avoid inhalation until tests confirm safety.
Update: An artifact near Pripyat is emitting faint, melodic sounds. Research teams are en route.
Alert: A new mutant species has been reported near the Garbage. Early descriptions suggest extreme aggression.
Reminder: Equipment malfunctions in the Brain Scorcher's vicinity are increasing. Avoid using unshielded electronics.
Important: Psi-emission detectors near the Dead City are showing erratic readings. Field teams must report anomalies immediately.
Research note: Turns out, using a Geiger counter to measure soup radiation is frowned upon. Who knew?
Warning: Dont mix anomaly energy with instant coffee. The results are... unpredictable.
Field note: Whoever thought wearing reflective tape in the Zone was a good idea, thanks for being the decoy.
Update: Lost my left boot to a gravitational anomaly. Still better than losing my right onemy favorite sock is in there.
Reminder: The Zone is not responsible for lost items, broken equipment, or ruined hopes and dreams. Thats on you.
Alert: Researchers have confirmed itduct tape fixes everything except mutant bites. Carry extra anyway.
Notice: If youre using vodka as a radiation cure, rememberits not a replacement for brains or better gear.
Field teams: Whoever left their lucky artifact on the base, its now unlucky and glowing. Collect at your own risk.
Observation: Mutants apparently prefer fresh boots to canned food. Lesson learned the hard way.
Reminder: Calling an artifact shiny boy doesnt make it less dangerous. Naming it also makes parting harder.
Update: Tried making a campfire near a thermal anomaly. Hot meal, hotter regret.
Warning: Trading scientific equipment for mutant steaks is not part of the research budget. Again.
Field note: A stalker tried to impress us by juggling bolts near anomalies. Hes fine, but the bolts arent.
Field report: A new form of lichen in the Red Forest glows under moonlight. We're debating whether to harvest or photograph it.
Update: Our mobile lab had a minor incident with an anomaly sample. The labs fine, but the sample container melted. Oops.
Alert: Psi-readings near Yantar spiked suddenly. If youre going in, wear extra tinfoil... we mean shielding.
Observation: A stray snork was spotted sniffing at our equipment crates. Note to self: use better padlocks.
Research note: The singing artifact we retrieved can produce ultrasonic frequencies. Headaches guaranteed.
Reminder: Please refrain from testing artifact radiation on your lunch. We have a real lab for thatmostly.
Warning: If you see a friendly bloodsucker near the Swamps, its not friendly. Repeat: not friendly.
Field note: A geologist tried collecting samples in the Dark Valley at night. Next time, bring a bigger flashlightand a guard.
Update: Were investigating a rumor of color-changing anomalies in the Garbage. Thats one way to brighten the place up.
Alert: High radiation bursts reported near Jupiter. Double-check your dosimeters, folks. We cant afford glowing coworkers.
Observation: Artifact Dustfall found to emit faint sparks. Our generator cant do that, so now were jealous.
Reminder: Always label your mutant tissue samples correctly. Last thing we need is swapping them with lunch rations.
Notice: We tried testing a gravitational anomaly with a metal plate. The plate is now missing, presumably orbiting somewhere.
Field teams: The Zone Porridge you found is not edible. Turns out its just irradiated sludge with oats mixed in. Yuck.
Research report: Our psycho-resonance scanner picked up laughter near a Bloodsucker lair. Thats not comforting at all.
Warning: A self-proclaimed artifact guru is peddling fake contraptions in the Bar. Dont let curiosity empty your wallet.
Observation: Weve detected faint radio signals underground near Agroprom. Could be old Soviet tech... or something else.
Update: Our newest recruit tried to sample swamp water for taste analysis. Hell be on medical leave for the week.
Reminder: Always double-bag anomaly samples. If you smell smoke or see sparks, you forgot the second bag.
Field note: The rumored invisible chimera is still unconfirmed. If you get mauled out of nowhere, well call that confirmation.
Alert: Sudden temperature drops reported in the Red Forest. Bring thermal gearand maybe a warm story or two.
Research tip: Throwing stones into anomalies is fine, but lets not throw the only working detector. We lost one last week, folks.
Warning: Dont try to high-five an electra anomaly. As comedic as it sounds, we prefer you keep your limbs intact.
Observation: The new strain of mutated rats show no fear of humans. Setting up heavier foot protection might be wise.
Update: We recovered a lost data drive in the Dead City. Half the files are corrupted, half are weird cat photos. Go figure.
Reminder: Anomalies dont respond to polite greetings or bribes. Science must find more direct ways to communicate.
Field note: We spotted a Bandit stumbling into a radiated hotspot. Observing from a distance. Wish him luck, or a Geiger counter.
Alert: Emission patterns indicate a sudden spike is due soon. Secure your gear and your sense of humoritll be a rough ride.
Research log: The roaring sinkhole anomaly in the Garbage seems to draw in metal objects. Keep your sidearms holstered.
Notice: If anyone finds a singing artifact in the Swamps, report it immediately. Musical or not, its still dangerous.
Observation: Latest mutant necropsy shows odd organ growth. Could be evolutionjust not the kind wed prefer.
Field teams: Our improvised net for catching smaller mutants kind of works. Wed prefer a cage and a tranquilizer next time.
Update: Were setting up a new lab near Jupiter to study anomalies at close range. Volunteers will be rewarded with hazard payand plenty of bandages.
Attention! Just recently, our fighters were attacked by DUTY SOLDIERS, disguised as mercenaries. Be careful, guys. Something smells fishy.
All volunteers who join Freedom will be issued the latest Zone survival kit free of charge, along with the finest weaponry from the West! If that ain't enough, you get a head start of 2500 roubles!
To all our guys: get into the private channel and update your security codes at once. Don't clog up the channel with whining about the fact that Duty's found out about your next attack.
Join Freedom! We'll stop anyone from seizing the Zone!
Long live Freedom! With the help of the Zone, we'll make the world a better place!
Any data on the movement of mercenary squads should be left in the private channel at once. This is important.
If you're out doing a job, keep any important info in the private channel. There are people out there reading our stuff, you know!
Download the new firmware so that you don't get as many crashes.
Leshiy, where the hell have you headed off to? The boss is waiting for you in the office.
Loki, it's Lukash. Contact me privately. Got an important matter.
Max, it's Skinflint. The supplies are gonna be here in a week, hold on tight over there.
Lukash, for three days now, we've been getting nothing but dead air from you. What are we gonna do about the Monolith while they haven't crucified us?

Oi, Mishka, there was something I wanted to tell you yesterday... but I keep forgetting. Anyway, I saw a suspicious group of people to the west of our base, near the farmstead. Don't forget to tell Lukash about this, or you're just gonna get baked and let it slip your mind.
Looking for friendly company, sincere conversations, and a helping hand in future campaigns? Join us and fight alongside free men of the Zone!
They've brought in a shipment of new G36s to the warehouses. Better get 'em quick. There's practically a waiting list for them.
We going out for lunch, or what?
We're in need of experienced stalkers for an artefact hunt. We'll owe you one.

Free stalkers, Freedom speaking! If you want to live under respectable conditions in the Zone without any obligations from the military, like Duty, then come to us! We're always happy to see new faces.

Free stalkers, Freedom speaking here! What do you have to gain by consciously limiting yourself to a life under the command under a bunch of bureaucratic pigs, living in their barracks and blindly following their orders? Become a part of us and join our expeditions to the most treasured places in the Zone, tasting the life of a free man!
Greetings, stalker! It's me, your Freedom! Come visit me at my address any time: Army Warehouses, straight down the road and towards the right at the fork. ;)
Rostok today, the Verkhovna Rada tomorrow, and the whole world in two days!
Seems like they took out a massive group of zombies at Yantar today, in the workshops. There might still be a few left.
Skinflint, where'd you put all the fancy shooters? Why am I not seeing them in the armoury?

Stalker, don't you love the Zone? Have you forgotten that it gave you money and a purpose in life? Do you really want to work as an office clerk for a penny after all this is over? Join Freedom! Don't let them take away the last thing you value from you, and don't let them take away your life.
Don't spit in the bloody glasses, damn it. I'll fucking break someone's nose the next time I hear that happens.
Hey-hey-hey, rasta! We've got the best and juiciest joints! Join the real Freedom and take down the system!

This is Skinflint. I've just received a small batch of American erotic magazines...
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]Who the bloody hell needs those, you bellend? Everyone outside of the Zone has been using hard drives for years now, us included.
We duped a couple of bandits yesterday. I'm surprised they even remember to wear their pants each day, 'cos they're so bloody dumb!
There's a literal army of undead in Yantar going up in number everyday... What the hell we can do?...
I'm feeling creative today! Oh, I'll express myself by hanging a few Dutyers on the branches!
Chaps, guess what! The ganja, the one growing near da springboard! It hits like a truck! Hahahaaa!!!
Heads up! Some bastards are trying to raid our stash at the garbage dump. We need reinforcements, ASAP!
Freedoms' got the best medical kits, boys! Don't let the others tell you otherwise. You'll be patched up in no time.
The Duty dogs are getting more aggressive again. Watch out, they'll use any excuse to shoot first and ask questions later.
Weve got a new recruit, fresh from the outside world. Hes got skills, but the Zones gonna test him harder than anything he's faced.
Freedoms banner flies high! But, remember, our strength comes from each other. Watch each others backs out there!
Just spotted some mercs getting too close to our territory. They better keep their distance, or well make them regret it.
Don't trust anyone from Duty. Theyre as dirty as the Zone itself. Weve been dealing with their lies for too long.
Need someone to scout the outskirts of Rostok for any anomalies. Dont be a hero, just get the intel and get back alive.
Looks like someones been smuggling mutant body parts again. Hope its not the Doctor trying to make a quick profit.
Stalker, remember: the Zones not kind to the weak. But here in Freedom, we stand strong together!
Our scouts report that the militarys moving troops closer to the northern perimeter. We might have to make our move soon.
Yantar's been hit by another anomaly storm. Stay clear of the area unless you want to get fried, mate.
Did you hear that? I swear I heard some hissing from the depths of the Garbage. Maybe more mutants showing up?
The old Freedom HQs been compromised. But dont worry, weve got new hideouts lined up. Stay sharp.
New shipment of weapons arriving today. If you want to upgrade your arsenal, nows your chance!
Weve got some new artifacts coming in from the south. If youre quick, you might score a rare one.
Our enemies are getting smarter. Watch your back and dont trust anyone whos not wearing the Freedom patch.
Breaking news: we found a stash of old Soviet supplies at the Pripyat military depot. Word on the street is theres some powerful stuff hidden inside.
Its not a good day when the Duty scum start making the rounds in our turf. If you see em, report immediately.
Attention: a mutant packs been spotted near our base. Get ready, it might be a long night.
Word is, the Monolith freaks are making a push into Freedom territory. Anyone got intel on their movements?
Skinflint got his hands on a couple of new guns. Lucky for us, theyll be hitting the market soon. Grab them before theyre gone.
Were running low on supplies again. If anyone finds extra meds, bring them to the HQ.
Somebodys been stealing from our stockpile. Whoever you are, well find you. And you wont like it.
Got a report of Duty setting up a camp in the Agroprom. Theyve got their eyes on the east. Lets show them theyve picked the wrong side to fight for.
Freedom stands for free thought, free life, and a free future! Dont let anyone silence you!
Somebodys been talking too much. Keep your lips sealed, especially about the big mission. We cant risk a leak.
Hey, did anyone hear about that new mutant sighting? Theyre calling it a Bloodsucker, but I bet its just another rumor.
The Dutys trying to move in on our turf. Ive got a bad feeling about this. Prepare for a fight, people.
Our latest recruits are doing great, but theres always room for more. If youve got the guts, weve got the freedom.
The militarys making a move, but we wont let them take this Zone. Not without a fight!
To all Freedom members: Remember our core valuesunity, independence, and resistance. The Zone belongs to those who fight for it!
If youre looking for glory, the Zone has plenty of it. Join us and carve your own path in the wilderness!
Theres a storm brewing on the horizon. Keep your eyes open. Something bigs coming.
Anyone seen my damn boots? Theyre probably stolen by some thief from Duty! Gotta hunt that bastard down.
Report any suspicious activities to the HQ immediately. Were all in this together, so dont hesitate!
The souths getting real hot. Were not the only ones with eyes on the anomalies down there.
If anyone wants a shot at some rare artifacts, head over to the swamps. But be carefulthe mutants are out in full force.
Heard a rumor: someone found a stash of old Soviet weapons near the truck cemetery. I wouldnt put it past them to make a play for it.
Killed a duty member the other day by just smoking our new herb next to him. Put him right out hahahahahaaa
Freedom scouts found an old stash near Yantar. Looks like Duty didnt check under their noses. Typical.
Remember, people: the Zone belongs to no one, especially not to those Duty clowns in Rostok.
Rumor has it Duty's planning something big. Let them come; well show them how Freedom handles business.
Someone said a Duty squad tried setting up camp near the Red Forest. Bet they're regretting that decision already.
To anyone out there still wearing Duty patches: Youd look better in green. Think about it.
The new stash near the Garbage? All ours now. Duty can keep their rusted AKs and empty promises.
Weve intercepted some old military comms. Looks like even the Zone doesnt respect Dutys orders.
Spotted a group of Duty scouts near the Dead City. Guess theyre expanding their graveyard collection.
Heard a Duty officer tripped into a gravity anomaly. Even the Zone knows theyre not welcome.
Freedom scouts secured an artifact stash in Pripyat. Duty? Too busy polishing their boots, I guess.
Military radio chatter is heating up. Sounds like theyre gearing up for a fight. Too bad theyre always outmatched here.
Someone tell Duty that their propaganda posters dont survive Zone weather. Found one melting into the mud today.
If Dutys patrols were half as good as their excuses, maybe theyd actually find something useful in the Zone.
Found a Freedom flag in the Garbage. Guess Dutys cleanup efforts are falling short.
Weve set up a bonfire near the old train station. Feel free to stop by. Duty not invited.
The Monolith might be brainwashed, but at least theyre not as boring as Dutys speeches.
A Duty scout tried to bribe his way through our territory. Jokes on him; we dont take bribes, only vodka.
Freedom scouts report mutant activity near Rostok. Dutys too scared to check it out, as usual.
The souths heating up. Wonder if Duty will blame the weather for their failures this time.
Freedom members, stay sharp. Word is Dutys trying to recruit in our turf. Wont work, but lets remind them why.
Just heard a rookie say Duty is more organized. Yeah, like a funeral procession.
Scouts report strange lights near Pripyat. Maybe the Zones finally laughing at Dutys patrols.
Freedom patrol spotted a stash of vodka crates near Yantar. Time to celebrateDuty isnt invited.
Found some old maps in the Cordon. Duty left them behindguess cartography isnt their strong suit.
Anyone else notice Dutys been unusually quiet lately? Probably trying to figure out how to use a PDA.
Heard a Duty officer tripped over his own gear near the Garbage. Tactical genius, that one.
Freedom scouts found an artifact in the Red Forest. Guess Duty will want to confiscate it later.
Some Monolith fanatics were seen chanting near the Army Warehouses. Even theyre less annoying than Duty recruiters.
Word is Dutys officers are debating whos more important. Spoiler: none of them are.
Freedom scouts secured a mutant-free route near the Dead City. Lets see if Duty can copy that without losing half their men.
A rookie asked if Duty ever smiles. Told him they do, but only when Freedoms running low on vodka.
Found a Monolith trooper frozen in place near Pripyat. Even the Zones confused by those zealots.
Clear Sky sent some scouts through our territory. At least they asked nicelyDuty could learn from that.
Spotted a Duty squad near Rostok. They looked lost. Guess their maps dont include Freedom zones.
Some stalker tried selling me an artifact blessed by Duty. Told him we dont buy trash.
Freedom scouts found Dutys supply lines near the Agroprom. Lets just say those supplies are looking a bit lighter now.
Spotted a Monolith patrol ignoring anomalies. Must be nice not having common sense.
Freedom campfires are the best. Dont trust me? Just ask the Duty scouts sneaking closer every night.
Word is, Clear Skys researching mutant behavior again. Hope they figure it out before the mutants figure them out.
Found a stash of outdated Duty manuals near the Bar. Gave them to a rookiehe needed a good laugh.
Freedom scouts secured a new anomaly-free path near the Garbage. Watch Duty claim they knew it all along.
The Zones wild, unpredictable... and still more consistent than Dutys patrol schedules.
A Monolith sniper missed three shots near Yantar. Maybe fanaticism doesnt make you a marksman after all.
Freedom scouts intercepted some Duty comms. Turns out, they still cant pronounce artifact correctly.
Heard a Duty squad ran into an anomaly near Rostok. Guess even the Zones tired of their posturing.
Found a stash of ancient Freedom banners near the Dead City. Still more inspiring than Dutys best speeches.
Freedom scouts spotted an unguarded Duty outpost. Lets just say theyll notice its missing soon.
Some rookie asked if Freedom parties were legendary. Told him to survive Duty first, then find out.
Dutys newest recruit claimed he joined for discipline. Guess boredom wasnt a good enough excuse.
Freedom scouts report mutant migrations near Yantar. Dutys response? Hold position. Classic.
The Zone shifts, changes, evolves... unlike Duty, who are still debating their next move from two years ago.
Spotted a Duty officer carrying Freedom vodka. At least he has good taste in something.
Freedom scouts reported hearing whispers in the Red Forest. No one else was there. At least, no one they could see.
Theres a section of the Garbage where the air feels... alive. Even the mutants wont go near it anymore.
A stalker returned from Pripyat with his PDA full of static recordings. He doesnt remember how he got backor who he left behind.
Freedom scouts swear they saw a Monolith soldier dragging something into an anomaly. It wasnt a body, but it screamed like one.
Theres a cave near Yantar that echoes footsteps, even when no ones walking. Some say the Zones keeping count.
A Freedom patrol saw a shadow move against the wind in the Red Forest. They didnt stick around to find out what it was.
Artifacts have been appearing in strange places near Rostok. No ones putting them there, and they dont stay long.
Theres a section of the Cordon where every radio transmission cuts out. The locals call it The Silence.
Freedom scouts spotted a figure standing in the middle of an emission. It didnt move, and it wasnt human.
A stalker near the Swamps swears he heard his own voice calling for help... from inside an anomaly.
Why do Duty guys always look so serious? Maybe if they smiled, the Zone would be a bit less radioactive.
Heard a rookie tried to barter vodka for an artifact. The trader gave him a brick painted silver. Classic.
Freedom tip of the day: Never trust a bandit who offers you a friendly discount. Its always on bullets.
Why do mutants always chase stalkers? Are we their cardio routine or something?
Just heard a Monolith soldier say For the Zone! before tripping over a rock. Guess even fanatics have bad days.
A bandit tried to rob a Duty squad yesterday. Lets just say hes now donating to their bullet collection.
If Freedom had a motto, itd be Sleep in, eat late, and let the Zone do the hard work.
Whats the fastest way to clear out a Monolith camp? Play a Freedom anthem at max volume.
Why do Duty guys hate us so much? Oh right, because were better at dodging bullets *and* responsibility.
Someone bet me I couldnt find a mutant with less brainpower than a bandit. Challenge accepted!
Freedoms finest stash just vanished. Turns out, someone rolled it all into experimental field rations.
Ever seen a Duty guy light up? Neither have I. That explains a lot.
We tried offering mutants some herb to chill them out. Bad idea. Now they just eat faster.
Freedom rule #420: If youre too paranoid to patrol, youre not smoking enough.
Rumor has it Dutys planning to ban the green initiative. Good luck, suckers!
Someone gave a boar a whiff of Freedoms herb stash. Now its following us everywhere. We named it Chong.
A Monolith scout wandered into our camp yesterday. Turns out, he was just following the smell. He stayed for dinner.
Ran into a chimera last night. Survived by throwing it our leftover rations. Now its our biggest fanand were out of snacks.
One of our guys joked that Duty is just a zone-wide nanny service. They didnt find it funnybut we sure did.
Note to self: never hide your stash next to a vortex anomaly. Lost a months supplyand nearly my arm.
We tried playing poker with Clear Sky. They folded after the first roundsomething about scientific integrity. Right.
Heard a rumor that Bandits are teaming up with mutants. If thats true, the mutants are the brains of the operation.
Why do they call it the Brain Scorcher? Because its the only place that can out-cook Freedoms camp kitchen.
Saw a Monolith squad pacing around, chanting. They should chant for a sense of humor while theyre at it.
Anyone else think Dutys uniforms look like they were designed by a depressed fashion student?
A friendly bandit is still a bandit, but at least hes funny. Gotta give him that.
Pro tip: If the artifact you found whispers, "Help me," maybe leave it aloneor offer it a smoke.
Someone said they saw a snork jamming to music in the Red Forest. Lets hope it didnt discover rap metal.
Dropped my detector in a swamp anomaly. Now its beeping in morse code. Probably telling me Im an idiot.
Monolith soldiers keep yelling Embrace the Zone. Sorry, we already have enough hugs from bloodsuckers.
Saw a Duty grunt slip on mutant entrails. He glared at us like it was our fault. Chill, man, were not the ones who left them there.
Freedom motto: If you cant chill, you better run faster than the mutants. Works for us.
I told a rookie that the Wish Granter is just a fancy vending machine. Think he believed me, poor soul.
The best defense? A good stash spotand the knowledge that Dutys too stiff to look in weird corners.
Last emission was so strong it knocked the sense out of a Monolith zealot. Now hes just a regular old crazy guy.
We tried cooking a boar steak with an anomalys heat. Tasted like radiation and regrets.
Ever see Duty dancing around a campfire? Yeah, me neither. Must be against their code of seriousness.
Bandits made the mistake of crashing our party. Lets just say they left in a hurryand short a few bullets.
We tried to set up a hammock in the Red Forest. Turns out it was a mutant nest. Mistakes were made.
A snork ran into a gravitational anomaly. It did a pretty sweet mid-air flip before, well, imploding. Gnarly.
One of our guys tried trading artifacts for a Duty uniform... to burn it. The Duty squad didnt see the humor, but we did.
Monolith soldier tried to cleanse our base. We cleansed him of his gear. Win-win.
Did you hear the Zone might be expanding? Great, more places for Duty to stand around looking important.
A controller tried to mess with my head. Told it I was already messed up enough. It left me alone. Score!
We offered a pseudodog some leftover sausage. Now it thinks its our mascot. Duty would hate it.
A bandit tried sneaking into our stash. We let him inthen locked him inside. Best hide-and-seek ever.
Found a new hangout spot under an old bus near the Garbage. Duty calls it a strategic vantage. We call it a couch with shade.
The only thing scarier than a chimera is a chimera thats just woken up from a nap. Trust me on this one.
Someone asked what Freedom means. Simple: it means not being a grumpy Duty stiff or a crazed Monolith zealot. Win-win.
Final thought for the day: The Zone is a weird place, so why not make it a chill one? Freedom out.
The Syndicate is recruiting new employees. To join us, find an intermediary. Consider this your first assignment.
Information on mutant raids and other operations can be bought from an intermediary. Look for one near the Prometheus Movie Theatre.
We need experienced stalkers for targetting specific groups.
We need experienced stalkers for carrying out raids in Pripyat. Our targets are Monolith groups, contact us for more info.
Requesting an experienced mechanic with knowledge of PNV devices. The payment is decent.
Join the Mercenaries, excellent outfit and decent payment are waiting for you when the job gets done!
Molfar, some mutants managed to get our guys at the plant. It is necessary to do some clean up.
Urgent need for a good sniper, paying 15 percent of the cost of the contract...
Attention, all Syndicate employees: Kiril Yatagan's group is no longer partnered with us. Seems he has his own plans...
Andrew Lunev, nicknamed Old. There's a bounty on his head. Any information about his location will be met with good payment.

Looks like those stalkers just won't give up... Yes, I see you chucklefucks out in the reeds, making your way to the Waste Processing Station. Here's a little hint: bullet in the head, not even kidding.
I managed to make my way into Pripyat, but the activity of the Monolith squads is preventing me from breaking through...
We suggest you stay away from the Jupiter Factory. We lost contact with the last group we sent over there.
Looking for an experienced stalker, preferably a veteran tracker. Contact us for more information.
An experienced mediator is needed, payment depends on performance.
Recruiting new fighters. Former employees of the special SOBR forces will be given special consideration.
Calling all artefact hunters out there: one of our important clients is requesting specific artefacts. If you're good enough for the job, contact us as soon as possible.
I've noticed an increased number of visitors lately. Any suspicious activity near our base will be dealt with, permanently. You've been warned.
Someone's been talking too much. If youre not dead yet, you will be soon. Keep quiet or well silence you ourselves.
Update: The contract on the Monolith commander is still active. High reward, but extreme risk. Only the best need apply.
If you come across a stash marked with a red X, dont touch it. It's ours. Stay out of our business or face the consequences.
Weve been receiving too many false reports from amateurs. Next one to waste our time gets a free ride to the afterlife.
Heads up, stalkers: There's a bounty on a former Syndicate operative. If you have information, it will be rewarded. Discretion is key.
We've been informed of a new stash near the Agroprom. It's heavily guarded, but the payout will be worth it. Only the brave dare take it.
Whos that wandering too close to our base? Dont test us, stalker. Keep your distance if you know what's good for you.
The shipment of high-end gear is coming in tonight. If you need something specific, nows the time to make a request.
Two members of the mercenary faction have gone rogue. If you see them, eliminate them on sight. Reward for verified kills.
Latest update: The Monolith continues to regroup. If you see any of them, consider it an opportunity to improve your body count.
Somebody tried to sneak into our armory last night. Needless to say, they didnt make it out. Lesson learned: Never underestimate a Syndicate guard.
Theres a good reason we dont trust anyone in the Zone. A former associate tried to cross us. Lets just say their loyalty was... short-lived.
Attention: The stalker known as 'Ghost' is considered a liability. If spotted, treat them as a hostile and report their location.
Reminder: Any unauthorized trespassers on our turf are to be eliminated immediately. Were not in the business of second chances.
Incoming job: sabotage mission at the Radar. Heavy resistance expected, but high payout for anyone who can make it out alive.
Someones been snooping around our private communications. If you know anything, get in touch. Theres a serious price on their head.
The Zones been unusually quiet. Too quiet. Keep your eyes open and your weapons ready. Something bigs coming.
Heads up, the first batch of liquidator gear is ready. These are not toys; use them wisely, or youll end up dead.
Were not interested in the standard scraps. We need experienced stalkers for something... bigger. Contact us if you think youre up for it.
The price for selling us out? Death. Consider this a warning for anyone thinking of crossing the Syndicate.
In the coming days, well be launching a series of raids. If youre interested in making some money, get in touch.
If you see a group of heavily armed mercs operating in the area, keep your distance. They're working on something dangerous, and they dont take kindly to interference.
Attention, weve got a major target in Pripyat. High-profile mission, high reward. Only the elite are accepted for this one.
HQ wants intel on the new mutant variant reported near the Garbage. Engage if necessary, but bring back datawe need to understand what were up against.
A Monolith unit has been spotted moving through the Red Forest. Intercept and eliminate. Payment on confirmed kills.
Merc squad Omega needs reinforcements near the Agroprom. If youre nearby, get moving. Extraction isnt an option until they complete the mission.
Someones been leaking job details to outsiders. Find the mole, or well start assuming its everyone.
Last night's recon mission near Pripyat revealed... nothing. It's too clean. And that makes it dangerous.
Reminder: Only authorized personnel can access the artifact vault. Unauthorized attempts will be treated as betrayal.
Looks like the militarys getting bold again near the Cordon. Avoid direct engagement unless its profitable.
Weve intercepted chatter about a stalker with a unique artifact near Yantar. Could be worth hunting down.
Rogue stalkers have been using our frequencies. Make an example of anyone caught stealing Syndicate comms.
The new batch of heavy armor is in. If youre tired of being a bullet magnet, place your order now.
Intel suggests an experimental weapon was left behind in the Wild Territory. Retrieval teams, prepare to move out.
Rumor has it, Freedoms been stockpiling explosives in the Swamps. Might be worth checking outor avoiding entirely.
Dutys planning something big near Rostok. If we play this right, we could turn their operation into a payday.
Weve been contracted to secure an anomaly-rich area near the Chernobyl NPP. High risk, high rewardapply if youve got a death wish.
Monolith patrols have been spotted near Jupiter. Avoid unless youre equipped to handle fanatics with a death wish.
Word on the street is someone found a rare artifact in the Dead City. Problem is, theyre not sharing. Lets fix that.
Whoevers been messing with our supply routes near the Dark Valley, theyve got 48 hours to stopor well make them stop.
A stalker was spotted near Zaton carrying prototype tech. They didnt have backup. Easy target.
The radiation levels near the Wish Granter have spiked. Not sure what it means, but tread carefully if youre heading that way.
Command wants the Agroprom labs swept for intel. Last time we sent a team, they didnt come back.
Weve picked up a distress signal near the Swamps. Could be a trapor a payday.
New assignment: Secure the anomaly clusters near the Garbage. Resistance expected, but nothing we cant handle.
A rival mercenary group has been operating near the Rostok scrapyards. Time to remind them whose turf this is.
HQ has intercepted Monolith transmissions referencing the Voice. Whatever it is, its our next target.
The Zones shifting again. A new anomaly fields opened up near Yantar. Lets claim it before anyone else does.
A strange signals been picked up near the Brain Scorcher. High danger, high payoffif you survive.
Freedoms been spotted partying near the Army Warehouses. Could be the perfect time to hit their stash.
A rare Monolith artifact is rumored to be buried in the Pripyat underground. The first one to find it gets a bonus.
Intel suggests a new mutant type has been spotted in the Swamps. If youre heading there, bring extra ammo.
A shipment of black-market gear has gone missing near the Red Forest. Whoever finds it keeps half.
Our latest recruit just learned the hard way why you dont poke anomalies with a stick. Lets try not to repeat that.
Weve received word of an artifact hidden deep in the Pripyat underground. Not for the faint of heartbring your best gear.
A rogue scientist in Yantar claims hes found a way to control anomalies. Sounds like nonsense, but maybe its worth checking out.
Monolith scouts have been observed near the Brain Scorcher. If youre nearby, gather intel and stay out of sight.
Word is, Freedom has developed a new weapon prototype. If we can get our hands on it, it could shift the balance.
Ever heard of the Living Shadow? Some claim its stalking the outskirts of the Red Forest. Sounds like a legend, but who knows?
A shipment of experimental ammunition was intercepted near the Agroprom. Find the thieves and recover our goods.
The stalker known as Phantom is rumored to be moving through the Dead City. Capturing him alive could bring us serious leverage.
Theres talk of an invisible anomaly near the Garbage. Its claimed three stalkers already. Approach with caution.
A new mutant type has been spotted near Zaton. Its fast, its aggressive, and no ones gotten a clear look at it yet.
A mysterious bunker has been discovered in the Swamps. Its heavily irradiated, but rumor has it, theres a treasure inside.
Our informants report strange signals coming from the Rostok scrapyards. Could be Monolith techlets secure it first.
Someones been smuggling military-grade gear into the Zone. Lets find out who and make them an offer they cant refuse.
Freedom scouts spotted a massive artifact cluster near the Red Forest. If theyre guarding it, it must be valuable.
Command has issued a priority contract: intercept Monolith couriers near the Radar. High payout for recovered intel.
A legendary artifact called the Heart of the Zone is rumored to be hidden near the Chernobyl NPP. If its real, its worth any risk.
Monolith activity near the Dead City is spiking. Looks like theyre up to something big. Lets find out what it is.
A stalker found a strange PDA in the Agroprom. The last entry says, Dont follow the lights. Creepy, but intriguing.
Weve intercepted transmissions about a hidden lab near Yantar. If its Monolith tech, we need to secure it first.
The Zones been unusually active lately. Anomaly clusters are shifting faster than ever. Stay alert and keep mapping them.
A Freedom convoy was spotted carrying high-value cargo near the Army Warehouses. Lets relieve them of it.
Rumor has it, Monolith scientists are experimenting with psionic mutations. Sounds like troubleand a payday.
A bandit gang near the Garbage claims to have found a stash of prototype weapons. Time to pay them a visit.
Intel suggests a massive Monolith operation near the Radar. If we can disrupt it, well be heroesor dead.
A new stalker group called The Watchers has been sighted near Zaton. No one knows their goals yet. Lets find out.
A strange glowing object was seen falling from the sky near the Red Forest. Lets see if its worth anything.
A hidden cache of military documents was uncovered near the Cordon. Whoever holds them will have serious leverage.
The Zones anomalies are behaving erratically near Yantar. Could be a sign of something bigor just another trap.
Freedom has been expanding their territory near the Army Warehouses. Time to remind them who runs the Zone.
A stalker group called The Wanderers claims theyve mapped a safe route through Pripyat. Could be usefulor complete nonsense.
A mutant horde was spotted near the Agroprom. If we time it right, we can lure them toward our enemies.
The last signal from a lost Monolith patrol was traced to a strange anomaly cluster near the Chernobyl NPP. Could be worth investigating.
A stalker claims to have seen a mutant using tools near the Garbage. Either hes crazy, or were in serious trouble.
Theres been a strange signal broadcasting near Pripyat. No words, just a low, rhythmic hum. Its driving anyone nearby insane.
Scouts near the Red Forest report seeing shadowy figures moving in unison. No ones gotten close enough to identify themand returned.
A Monolith patrol was found completely intactno injuries, no signs of struggle. They were just... sitting there, staring at the sky.
Theres a cave near the Dead City that emits a faint, echoing whisper. Those who enter say it feels like the Zone itself is speaking.
A stalker found a diary near Zaton. The last entry reads, I hear my name in the wind. Im going to follow it. He was never seen again.
Somethings wrong near Yantar. Equipment malfunctions, shadows stretch in unnatural ways, and the air feels... heavy.
Freedom scouts report seeing lights in the sky above the Chernobyl NPP. Not stars, not helicoptersjust cold, flickering lights.
Weve caught wind of a heavily guarded stash in the Dead City. If we move fast, we can secure it before the locals catch on.
Monolith forces have gone quiet along the Radar. That silence could be a trapor the perfect chance for a quick strike.
A stalker claims he saw a pocket dimension anomaly in the Red Forest. If hes not crazy, we might make a fortune selling whatevers inside.
Rumor has it that Dutys planning a major push near Rostok. Lets stay out of their wayuntil we can profit from the aftermath.
A group of rogue scientists in Yantar has been paying top dollar for mutant samples. Perfect gig if youre not squeamish.
Freedom patrol got wiped out by something in the Swamps. All we found was a single boot and some empty bullet casings.
Our spotter near the Cordon saw an unmarked helicopter land. Time to investigateand maybe acquire a new client.
Someones been hiring ex-Monolith grunts as bodyguards around Pripyat. Check your sixthese guys never left the fight behind.
A massive emission is predicted soon. Perfect time to hole up somewhere secureand pick off stragglers afterward.
Monolith data suggests a hidden lab under Jupiter. If we get our hands on that tech, we can name our price.
The Watchers group is recruiting near Zaton. Theyre tight-lipped, but their gear is high-end. Worth checking outcarefully.
Weve heard rumors of a new liquid anomaly in the Swamps. If we can harvest it, well corner the black market. Or drown trying.
A bandit boss is offering bounties on certain high-profile stalkers. Could be easy money if we stay one step ahead.
A stolen crate of military-grade armor is supposedly stashed near the Garbage. Lets see who beats us thereso we can beat them.
Mutant migrations are on the rise around the Great Swamps. More creatures to hunt, more clients to pay for the trophies.
Clear Skys new research facility in the Swamps has minimal security. Theyre practically begging for a visit.
Dutys got a bounty on a rogue officer near Rostok. The pays good, and it gets them off our backs for a while.
Monolith zealots have been seen hauling crates marked with strange symbols. Whatevers inside could fetch a high price.
A rumor about a hidden artifact in Pripyat has everyone buzzing. Lets get there first and sell the intel to the highest bidder.
A Freedom scout bragged about a safe route to the center of the Zone. Lets follow himthen collect the toll ourselves.
We intercepted a transmission talking about an artifact meltdown near the Radar. High risk, but the reward could be massive.
Some eggheads near Yantar claim theyre close to a cure for psi-effects. If thats true, we want the patent or the profitpreferably both.
Anomalies have started popping up in previously safe zones. Keep the map updated; ignorance costs livesand money.
Rumours are spreading of a new bandit coalition forming. Could be future rivalsor future clients, if they pay well.
We have a lead on a missing shipment of exoskeleton parts near the Garbage. If theyre still intact, we could fund our next operation.
A chimeras been terrorizing the Red Forest. Local stalkers are offering a hefty bounty for its hide. Sounds like our kind of job.
A contact claims that certain mutants are evolving to evade anomaly fields. If true, thats bad for everyoneexcept our wallet.
A supposed artifact called Suns Tears is rumored to appear during emissions in the Dead City. Whether its real or not, itll draw attention.
Dutys high command is apparently on the hunt for stolen documents. If we find them first, they might pay us to keep quietor to hand them over.
Clear Sky is recruiting mercs to guard a new expedition. Could be easy cash, unless the Zone has other plans.
Word is that a powerful new anomaly formed in the Great Swamps. If were first on the scene, we can name our price for the data.
A series of cryptic numbers appeared on Monolith frequencies. Decoding them might lead us to a treasureor a trap.
Remember: in this line of work, loyalty lasts as long as the contract. Get paid, then move onno questions asked.
Our contact near the Brain Scorcher says the psi-fields are weakening. Could be our chance to move inor a setup.
Weve intercepted chatter about a living anomaly in the Dark Valley. Might be a hoax, but if its real, well profit off it.
A bandit boss near the Garbage wants merc support for an upcoming raid. Keep your eyes on their loot, not their loyalty.
Yantar scientists reported an unidentifiable signal at midnight every night. Could be a glitchor something valuable in the ether.
Freedom patrols have gone missing near Pripyat. If we find what took them, we might find their gear too.
A contact claims theres a stash of pre-Zone military tech hidden in an old bunker. High risk, high rewardjust how we like it.
Monolith radios keep mentioning the Eye of the Zone. Could be a riddle, or a location. Either way, it sounds profitable.
The Watchers are rumored to have a secret camp in the Red Forest. Sneak in, get intel, and get outquietly.
We hear Clear Sky is on the verge of a big discovery in the Swamps. Good. Let them do the science, and well do the collection.
Someone saw an artifact cluster floating above ground in Jupiter. If its stable, it could fetch a fortuneif its not, well pass the risk to someone else.
Dutys got an elite squad patrolling near Rostok. Sniff around for gaps in their routewe dont need a head-on fight if we can avoid it.
A stalker tried to recruit us to hunt a friendly chimera. Well take the job, but we dont believe in friendly anything here.
Unmarked crates washed ashore in Zaton. Could be a goldmine or a deathtrap. Either way, we should check it out first.
Weve got intel that someones selling high-tier exosuits in the Bar. Lets see if we can make them an offer they cant refuse.
Rumor: a new artifact that can neutralize small anomalies. Sounds too good to be true, but if its real, every faction will want it.
Freedoms hosting a big meeting near the Army Warehouses. A perfect time to slip in and gather intelor cause chaos.
A mutant pack is causing havoc in the Garbage. If we help neutralize it, local traders might owe us big-time.
The Wanderers are seeking mercs for a deep-zone expedition. Could be suicidal, but the pay is rumored to be astronomical.
Weve intercepted a coded transmission from Monolith territory. If we crack it, we might discover their next moveand sell that info.
Beware the Dead City at dusk. Reports say shadows move on their own. Perfect place for an ambushor to vanish without a trace.
Bandit radio chatter indicates theyre smuggling something big across the Cordon. We should interceptno sense letting them profit alone.
A Freedoms officer defected to Duty last week. Theyre paying top rubles for his safe returnor guaranteed silence.
Our scout near the Radar reported an anomaly that absorbs sound. Could be useful for covert opsor a trap that masks predators.
Monolith squads were seen hauling weird, pulsating containers. If its a new type of artifact, well want to liberate a sample.
A fugitive scientist is rumored to be hiding near the Red Forest. Hes got data on advanced anomaly detectors. Lets find him first.
Watch for new anomalies forming after the last emission. Sometimes, you stumble on treasure. Other times, you get vaporized.
We spotted a group of ex-Monolith mercenaries near Jupiter. They might be competitionor potential allies if the price is right.
A rumor suggests a psychic mutant was captured near Yantar. If its true, we could sell it to the highest bidder. Science or cruelty?
Some old documents in Pripyat mention Project Lethe. They could shed light on the Zones originsor fetch a fortune from anyone paranoid enough.
A contact says the Clear Sky outpost is sitting on a hidden artifact field. Lets confirm and negotiateor seizewhatevers there.
Freedoms new stash in the Army Warehouses might hold black market gear. Nothing we cant handle quietlyor loudly.
Keep an eye on bandits in the Dark Valley. Theyve been too quiet lately. Quiet bandits are plotting bandits.
Remember the code: in this job, you only trust your squad and your paymaster. Everyone else is a target or a tool.

Base, this is Delta squad. We've located the entrance to the Dark Valley lab. What are our orders?
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]Bloody hell! Switch to the private channel!

Base, this is recon team Nightbird. We're having encryption problems and are leaving a message here. Landed in Limansk and the building site seems impenetrable. Large concentration of enemy forces: eight RPGs, five snipers, and four with additional, unknown weapons. We cannot send our coordinates, and our enemies are surely listening in on the general channel. What are your orders?
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]Copy, Nightbird. Return to the Red Forest immediately and regroup with Vulture. Make further decisions from there on out.
Attention! When trying to cross the perimeter, the soldiers guarding it have the right to open fire on you without warning. Do not take chances and do not break the law.
To all military stalkers operating in the area around the Darkscape and the Cordon: switch to the encrypted channel! That's an order!
All military stalkers should establish comms on the double! Everybody assemble in the channel.
Radio frequencies are cut off in square a4_4. Please report from another location near the anomalous zone.
Citizens! The Zone poses mortal danger! We're here to protect you from the Zone, not the Zone from you. Do not jeopardise your life! Do not try to penetrate into the secured area!
Requesting a helicopter in square a1_6.
Requesting a mortar strike on square e2_12.
Contracted soldiers and military stalkers: if anyone finds the wreckage of a fallen helicopter during one of the raids, please recover and deliver the flight recorder to Major Kuznetsov.
Colonel Kuznetsov, there will be an examination by two observers from the SSU tomorrow. Have a suitable reception ready.
Colonel Kuznetsov, get in touch immediately. Waiting for you in office #3.
Kestrel, it's Peony. Can you respond? There's no radio signal.
Guys, don't screw around in the ravine. Some rabid creatures have settled where we burned a few boxes a couple of days ago.
Attention, sappers: we require additional mines in square e3_16.

The Security Service of Ukraine is calling all right-minded and loyal citizens to collaborate with the authorities. Report all known cases of stalking! Only with your help can we eliminate this hideous phenomenon!
Need the defence at the northern pass strengthened in accordance with order #231. When is the armour coming in?
Warning to all citizens: The Zones anomaly activity is reaching dangerous levels. Avoid open fields and stay near fortified zones for safety.
Attention, soldiers: Weve detected unauthorized movement near the perimeter. Engage only if hostile intent is confirmed. Do not act without orders!
The Zone is crawling with more mutants than usual. Patrols will be expanded and all nearby civilian areas are advised to evacuate immediately.
All squads, prepare for a joint operation at the Jupiter plant. Confirm your positions by 1800 hours. The enemy has been sighted nearby.
Priority mission: The helicopter remains lost in sector C7. We are deploying search teams. Any stalkers nearby, assist immediately and report findings.
Colonel Kuznetsov has requested backup for an assault on the northern trenches. Ensure all soldiers are in position by dawn. Full combat gear required.
Citizens of the Zone, remember: Armed forces are your last line of defense. Help us eliminate the threats in the Zone by staying behind safe zones.
The Monolith faction has intensified operations near the Red Forest. Patrol units are advised to be extra cautious. Reinforcements are en route.
Immediate orders from Major Kuznetsov: Deploy all available snipers around the western perimeter. High-value targets spotted in the vicinity.
Urgent: We have lost contact with our forces at the Army warehouse. Any nearby units, respond immediately. Suspected breach by hostile forces.
Alert: Strange readings coming from the Underground complex. All research teams are to cease operations. Prepare for evacuation until further notice.
Stalker activity near the northern pass is escalating. If you spot anyone trying to breach the military fence, report immediately. They are considered hostile!
All available military vehicles are being stationed at the border. Prepare for a full-scale lockdown of the Zones outer perimeter.
Special mission: Transport convoy heading towards the Dead City. All soldiers are ordered to keep an eye on the horizon. Mutant sightings are frequent.
Attention, all personnel: Stay alert for sabotage attempts. We believe the bandits are working with rogue stalkers inside our ranks. Report anything suspicious.
All units in the area are to be on standby for an incoming supply drop. Coordinate with the logistics team to ensure safe retrieval.
Major Kuznetsov's report: The situation in Pripyat is deteriorating. We will need reinforcements for an upcoming sweep. Any available squads report now.
Attention: Multiple radiation spikes reported near the CNPP. The area is temporarily off-limits. All personnel advised to stay clear until further notice.
We are receiving reports of mutant movement along the Limansk rail. Ready all combat teams for a potential engagement. Report to the command center.
Calling all sappers: New orders for minefield placement near the Zaton outskirts. Ensure the mines are active before retreating to the safe zone.
Report: Hostile stalkers sighted near the Institute of Physics. Deploy recon drones and prepare for an aerial assault if necessary.
Warning: A large group of bandits has entered the Zone's northern sector. If you're in the area, report any suspicious activity immediately.
Important: Check your gear before the next mission. We've received intelligence on an upcoming Monolith push. Arm yourself for heavy combat.
Colonel Kuznetsov requests all soldiers report to the eastern fortifications immediately. A large contingent of mutants is approaching. Prepare for assault.
Operational update: The SSU has launched a covert operation against rogue stalkers. All Army personnel are to assist in securing known hideouts.
Command orders: Engage any unidentified groups near the Agroprom. We suspect they're trying to gain access to sensitive military information. Stay vigilant.
Patrols will be reinforced in the south-east. Stay alert for any signs of insurgent activity. An airstrike is possible if needed.
Critical notice: The Zone's power grid is experiencing failures. All units are to monitor their equipment and report any malfunctions immediately.
We are aware of increasing stalker presence near the underground bunker in the Chernobyl area. If youre in the vicinity, report suspicious activity immediately.
Soldiers, prepare for a full lockdown of the military checkpoints at Zaton. All civilian traffic is to be restricted until further notice. Stand by for further orders.
Attention all forces: There have been reports of unusual radiation spikes near the Yanov station. Immediate investigation underway. Stay clear for now.
New orders from Major Kuznetsov: Deploy heavy artillery at the northern front. Prepare for a high-risk operation. Details will follow upon arrival.
All military vehicles are being re-tasked for security purposes. Expect delays on all supply deliveries. Keep your wits sharp, the situation is volatile.
Command reports: strange lights have been spotted near the old radar installation. Investigate cautiously and report back.
Patrol units in the Garbage region have detected unusual seismic activity. Stay alert for any unexpected anomalies.
New directive: reinforce all checkpoints along the Red Forest perimeter. Monolith activity is on the rise.
Intel suggests that rogue factions are moving supplies through the Swamps. Prepare for immediate intercept missions.
Attention: an unidentified signal has been intercepted near Pripyat. All nearby units, approach with caution and investigate.
Scouts near Yantar have reported seeing shadowy figures moving in tandem. No engagement yet, but stay ready.
Orders from HQ: prepare for an operation targeting hidden Monolith caches. Details to follow upon deployment.
Emergency alert: a large mutant horde has been spotted moving southward near Agroprom. Reinforcements are on the way.
New mission briefing: recover critical intel from a downed reconnaissance drone in the Army Warehouses. Expect resistance.
All units, be advised: weve received reports of high-value artifacts in the Dead City. Approach the area with extreme caution.
Command priority: intercept any attempts to smuggle weapons into the Garbage region. Check all vehicles thoroughly.
Attention all forces: an unregistered emission pattern has been detected. Secure safe zones and prepare for anomalies.
Critical update: an unknown group has breached the eastern checkpoint. Lockdown protocols are now in effect.
Scouts have reported a Monolith sniper nest near Pripyat. Precision strikes are authorized to neutralize the threat.
Patrols near the Swamps report a dense fog moving unnaturally fast. Maintain visual contact and avoid venturing alone.
Command has ordered a sweep of the Yanov outskirts for a missing convoy. High-priority missionleave no stone unturned.
HQ has intercepted chatter about a rogue scientist heading towards the Wild Territory. Apprehend and detain for debrief.
All personnel in Rostok are to report sightings of unidentified drones. We suspect reconnaissance by hostile forces.
New orders: fortify the northern outpost near the Radar installation. High chances of enemy engagement.
Special operations teams are being assembled for a night raid in the Dead City. Only volunteers with stealth expertise are needed.
Intel suggests that an unknown mutant has been sighted near Zaton. Track its movements and report back.
Satellite imagery has picked up heat signatures near the Red Forest bunker. Unclear if its human or mutant. Proceed with caution.
New directive from HQ: capture any stalkers found transporting anomalous artifacts. Confiscate all items for inspection.
Command has flagged an abandoned military cache near the Dead City. Recovery efforts are underwayassist if in the vicinity.
Attention all units: theres been a major Monolith regrouping near the Brain Scorcher. High alert protocols are now active.
Troopers near Yantar report strange pulsating lights in the distance. Investigate, but dont engage without backup.
Unusual radio signals originating from the Agroprom underground. Command has authorized exploration teams to investigate.
Scouts confirm a mutant migration moving through the Swamps. Expect increased encounters in the southern sectors.
All patrols near Pripyat: anomalies have been behaving erratically. Avoid high-energy zones until further notice.
Incoming alert: rogue faction spotted sabotaging the northern power lines. Engage and neutralize on sight.
Troops in Rostok report an unmarked vehicle near the checkpoint. Investigate and detain any occupants for questioning.
Command priority: intercept Monolith couriers rumored to be carrying classified Zone intel. This takes precedence over other tasks.
Unidentified footprints found near the Cordon outpost. Tracker units are being dispatched to follow the trail.
High-energy readings detected in the Red Forest. We suspect experimental artifacts. Field teams, proceed with extreme caution.
Survivors from a recent engagement report sightings of armored mutants. No confirmed kills yetstay alert.
Intelligence reports indicate an artifact smuggling operation near the Dead City. Prepare for a covert interception mission.
Strange tremors detected near the Wild Territory. Geologists are being sent, but we need security personnel for their protection.
Scouts have reported a crashed helicopter in the Agroprom area. Rescue or recovery operations to follow shortly.
Patrols near Zaton found abandoned Monolith equipment. Items are being analyzed for potential intelligence.
Theres been a spike in unidentified drone activity over the Garbage. All units, shoot down and recover any devices you encounter.
Rogue scientist intercepted near Yantar. Command needs additional security for interrogation at HQ.
Special op: locate and secure the Black Box artifact reportedly seen near Pripyat. Volunteers will receive hazard pay.
Reports of increased stalker activity near the Cordon. Reinforcements requested to maintain military presence.
Unusual weather phenomena detected over the Wild Territory. Meteorologists en routetroops to provide cover.
Military scientists near Yantar request escort to examine a glowing anomaly. Volunteers should be equipped for heavy resistance.
Patrol units in the Army Warehouses reported strange growling sounds from underground. Investigation underway.
