Soldiers, do not meddle in areas with variable psi-emissions. You'll get your damn brains fried.
A squad was lost in the area of the cemetery of sunken ships, and we have no connection with them. If anyone has seen those guys, help them out before they get into trouble.

I saw some kind of squad in our colours near Pripyat, behaving in a hostile manner and not allowing anyone to get near. I don't think these are ordinary deserters. They're headed towards the southern part of town.
Attention, soldiers of Wings at the Generators. The installation has been destabilised. Head to the bunker as instructed and begin fixing the problem immediately.
This is the storeman from the Yubileiny service centre. I'm quite worried. Are supplies expected in the near future? We don't even have enough 5.45.
Barrier-1 is in trouble at square aes2_m1. It seems they've spotted some humanoids, hardly zombies, moving at a steady pace.

A signal has arrived from the Sarcophagus. Shall I verify?
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Monolith
%c[default]Not possible. Too much background radiation and tons of creatures there. I've already told you.
Wings, come in. Are you at the objective yet?
There is no Wish Granter, but there is a group of people ahead of their time with power that knows no equal. Don't ruin the dream... With your support, we shall build a new world. A new reality.
All recruits should meet with Mentor immediately.
A horde of zombies is expected on the outskirts of Pripyat. Take action.
We have lost a detachment in Agroprom. Find them, dead or alive.
How many inquisitors are there, you say? Will a couple dozen not suffice? Well, shite. Mentor, best put your recruits to some training.
How's the situation at the Radar? Anything out of the ordinary?
Our commander's been worrying again. There's nothing to eat at the station. Where do we find provisions? My fighters will be passing on to human flesh before long.

Stalker, see what scientific activity has done to this world. It has challenged its foundations, and we need YOU to help make this world a better place. Based on the reality given to you, YOU must understand that with the help of the Brotherhood, everything becomes possible. A paradise on Earth? On the snap of your fingers. Give us your hand in supporting the existence of this miracle. Any future companions should arrive at any of our posts with arms and armour.
Where did Inquisitor's group go? We've got nothing to cover sector p_5 with.

Fellow scientists, give up your ungrateful job. All the fruits of your work shall sooner or later settle in the oligarchic minorities, and you will sink into oblivion. The brotherhood is in need of qualified specialists. Let us not offer you any rewards, but the ability for you to choose your own futures for yourselves and your loved ones.
A sentry has died by his own hand in the control room. Dispose of the corpse.
This is the squad at the station. We're running out of gear. Need help.
Inquisitors speaking. We'll be clearing out the approaches to Pripyat. Eyes sharp and clear. We work using computer.
Commander of the Barrier speaking. We have five unfettered deserters. If you meet them in the vicinity of Pripyat, open fire on them.
This is Rabbit. Shortly, we will be securing some new equipment. The men have promised that they are bringing something from the military in the Agroprom.
The Psi-field has intensified. Soldiers, stay alert! Ensure your equipment is fully charged and prepared for the worst.

To stand against the Monolith is to stand against the Zone itself. No one survives such arrogance.
The faithful walk unscathed through the fire of anomalies. The Monolith protects its own. Will it protect you?
There is no escape from the Zone, only paths to understanding the Monolith. Which will you choose?
The air is heavy with change. The Monolith is stirring. Are you ready for what comes next?
Even in death, the Monolith calls to us. It is eternal, unyielding, and all-knowing. Can you hear it?
Fear is the last refuge of the unfaithful. The Monolith offers clarity, if only you submit to its will.
The Zones anomalies are growing more violent. A sign, perhaps, that the Monoliths time is near.
Do you feel it? The pull of something greater? That is the Monolith, and it is waiting for you.
The Zone whispers its secrets, and only the Monolith truly listens. Will you?
The Zone has no patience for fools. Only those who follow the Monolith will find a place here.
They call us zealots, but we are merely the first to see the truth. Soon, they will follow.
A thousand voices echo in the Monoliths presence. Each one tells a story of salvation. Will yours be next?
The Monolith transforms fear into power. The Zone is our crucible, and we are its chosen.
What you call chaos is the Monoliths design. Every step you take is part of its greater plan.
The artifacts you prize are nothing more than the Monoliths breadcrumbs. Follow them, and you will find enlightenment.
Even the Zones silence is a warning. The Monolith waits for no one.
The faithful need no armor, for the Monolith shields them from harm. Join us, and know its protection.
The Zone speaks in riddles, but the Monolith offers answers. Seek it, and you will understand.
Your path leads nowhere without the Monolith. It is the only constant in this forsaken land.
The Zones storms grow fiercer. Each one is a herald of the Monoliths coming glory.
The Monolith does not forget betrayal. Those who turn away will face its wrath, sooner or later.
The anomalies are restless, as if they sense a shift. The Monoliths will moves the very fabric of the Zone.
The unworthy wander the Zone in ignorance. The Monolith awaits those brave enough to seek the truth.
Even the mutants bow before the Monoliths power. They are its creations, just as you could be.
The Zones anomalies shift like tides, drawn by the Monoliths unseen hand. Stand in its light, and be safe.
The Zones darkest secrets lie within the Monolith. Only the chosen may uncover them.
The Monolith is not a choice; it is an inevitability. Embrace it, or be consumed.
In the Monoliths shadow, there is no death, only transformation. Join us, and transcend the mortal coil.
The Monolith does not demand, it commands. The faithful obey, and the unfaithful perish.
Each heartbeat in the Zone is a testament to the Monoliths mercy. Dont waste it.
The whispers in the anomalies are the Monoliths voice. Listen closely, and you will hear the truth.
Those who fear the Monolith are its greatest proof. Its power reshapes the weak into the strong.
Through the Zones chaos, the Monolith offers order. Let go of your doubts and join the faithful.
The Monolith does not wait for the lost. It guides the willing and abandons the doubters.
The Zones storms are but a prelude to the Monoliths awakening. Be prepared.
The Monoliths truth is not for the faint of heart. Only the strong can bear its light.
The artifacts you hold dear are mere trinkets of the Monoliths design. Seek the source, not the scraps.
The Zones heart beats in time with the Monoliths will. Stand close, and you will feel its rhythm.
Even the most hardened stalkers kneel before the Monoliths glory. Join us, and be reborn.
Every storm, every anomaly, every step forwardall are guided by the Monoliths unseen hand.
Time is running out. The Monolith calls, and the faithful answer. Will you?
The Zones breath grows colder. Something ancient stirs beneath the surface, watching.
They went into the anomaly field... but only the echoes of their screams returned.
The shadows here dont move with the light. They have a mind of their own.
Theres a place in the Red Forest where the trees whisper your name. Dont answer back.
Footsteps in the mud, but no ones there. The Zone doesnt always play fair.
Every now and then, the air in the Zone smells... wrong. Like decay mixed with something alive.
The static on the radio is getting louder. Its almost like its... trying to speak.
A flash in the distance, and then nothing. The Zone swallows all who wander too far.
In the Dead City, the echoes of long-forgotten voices call out. No one has returned to explain them.
Something watches from the edges of the swamps. You can feel its gaze even when you turn away.
The light bends strangely near the old lab. Its as if the Zone itself is trying to keep you out.
A low hum resonates near Pripyat. It vibrates in your chest, as if something massive is just beneath your feet.
The Zones storms dont just bring rain. Sometimes they bring... things. Things that dont belong here.
The deeper you go into the Zone, the louder the silence gets. Its like the world is holding its breath.
Theres a trail of burned footprints leading to the Reactor. No one knows where they end.
Sometimes, you hear footsteps behind you in the swamps. When you turn, theres nothing... but the water ripples.
The Zone doesnt just kill you. It remembers you, and sometimes, it doesnt let go.
A stalker came back from the Radar, but hes not the same. His eyes... theyre not his anymore.
In the Red Forest, theres a place where no birds sing, no wind blows. Just... stillness.
Dont follow the lights in the fog. Theyre not leading you outtheyre leading you deeper in.
Someones been carving symbols into the trees near Yantar. No one knows who... or why.
Theres a bunker near Agroprom where the air feels thick, like its pressing down on you. No one stays there long.
The Zones shadows move when nothing else does. They stretch and crawl like theyre alive.
Near the Reactor, theres a low hum you can feel in your bones. Some say its the Zone breathing. Others say its something else waking up.
They say the closer you get to the Chernobyl Reactor, the harder it is to tell whats real. The Zone starts playing tricks on you... or maybe its not the Zone.
Theres a shadow inside the Reactor that doesnt move with the light. Some stalkers have seen it, but none of them will talk about it.
Deep within the power plant, theres a door that never opens. But every so often, you can hear knocking from the other side.
They found a Monolith soldier at the Reactor, just standing there, staring at the core. He was alive, but his mind was... gone.
Someone saw lights flickering in the Reactor's control room last night. Problem is, that place has been abandoned for decades.
The radiation near the Reactor feels alive, like its watching you. Some say its not radiation at all, but something the Zone is hiding.
Weird... the emergency signal I received was pointing to this location $location.\nI have been searching for ten minutes at least, not a single trace of the missing squad was found...
I was supposed to meet the other squad $location. Two hours have passed and there is no sign of them yet.
$mechanic speaking. Stop bringing your broken crap over here. I'm a mechanic, not a magician. I've got dozens to fix already and there isn't enough replacement parts for everybody around.
Don't gunk up the channel. Nobody cares about your lucky kills.
$trader speaking. We received new shipment of ammo and medical supplies. I don't need to remind all of you again: take it easy on them, the amount is limited.
$trader here. The next shipment of armours and gas masks won't be ready for a week at least. The main supplier faced some difficulties, hopefully it won't be much of an issue.
I don't recall seeing this number of Vortex anomalies last time I came here in $map... They're spreading everywhere. Watch your step when you pass from this location.\n$speaker out
$mechanic here. I'm looking for steel plates and carbon fibre. So if you came by any damaged armours, make sure to bring them to me and I will give you discounts on repairing services.
Another squad sent to investigate the anomaly field near the old factory. No word from them yet. It's been over 24 hours. Something's wrong.
We found the remains of the missing team near the Red Forest. No signs of struggle. Just... empty suits. What happened to them?
Our scouts reported unusual activity in the Yantar region. Unmarked vehicles spotted near the research facility. Stay alert.
Supply convoy en route to the base. Expect delays due to increased mutant activity in the area. Proceed with caution.
We've lost contact with the forward observation post in the Agroprom area. Sending a team to investigate. Updates to follow.
Reports of increased emissions in the southern regions. Advise all units to take shelter immediately. Do not attempt to move during an emission.
Unusual readings from the radar station near the Jupiter plant. Possible interference from unknown sources. Monitoring the situation closely.
Patrols in the Cordon area have reported sightings of heavily armed individuals. Unknown faction. Approach with extreme caution.
We've encountered a new type of mutant near the Dark Valley. Highly aggressive and resilient. Recommend avoiding the area until further notice.
Supply drop scheduled for tomorrow. Coordinates: 45.67, 33.21. Be there to collect your ration packs. First come, first served.
Warning: Increased activity of bloodsuckers reported in the Garbage region. Advise all units to exercise extreme caution when moving through this area.
We've received reports of a new faction operating in the Zone. They call themselves the "Red Dawn." Unknown motives. Stay vigilant.
Our scouts have discovered a hidden stash near the Rostok factory. Coordinates: 47.12, 35.45. Proceed with caution; the area is heavily irradiated.
Unusual electromagnetic interference detected near the Pripyat amusement park. Possible anomaly activity. Avoid the area until further notice.
We've lost contact with the research team in the Yantar region. Sending a rescue mission. Updates to follow.
Reports of increased activity from the Monolith faction near the NPP. Advise all units to avoid the area. High risk of engagement.
Supply convoy ambushed near the Army Warehouses. Multiple casualties. Proceed with extreme caution in this area.
We've encountered a new type of anomaly near the Red Forest. Highly unstable and unpredictable. Recommend avoiding the area until further notice.
Reports of increased activity from the Duty faction near the Cordon. Advise all units to avoid the area. High risk of engagement.
Damn guns constantly jamming on me. These mechanics can't fix shit, just charge us up the ass.
We've received reports of a new type of mutant near the Dark Valley. Highly aggressive and resilient. Recommend avoiding the area until further notice.
Warning: Increased activity of snorks reported in the Garbage region. Advise all units to exercise extreme caution when moving through this area.
We've encountered a new type of anomaly near the Pripyat hospital. Highly unstable and unpredictable. Recommend avoiding the area until further notice.
Attention: The Brain Scorcher's range has reportedly extended. Stalkers near Pripyat should turn back immediately.
Unconfirmed reports of strange chanting near the Agroprom underground. Investigate only if you're prepared for the worst.
Radiation levels near the Red Forest are spiking beyond normal. Something big might be happening.
Monolith squads spotted sweeping through the Garbage. They're heavily armed and show no mercy.
Mutants are behaving strangely near Yantar. Researchers suggest avoiding direct encounters.
Found an artifact in the Swamps that screams when touched. I dont think its worth the rubles.
Scouts report a glow near the abandoned Pripyat school. No known source of light there. Stay alert.
Unknown transmissions intercepted near the Dead City. Sounds like someoneor somethingis trying to communicate.
The Freedom faction is claiming a new artifact discovery in the Red Forest. Tensions with Duty are bound to rise.
Spotted a stalker walking through anomalies unscathed. He vanished before we could ask questions.
Explorers near the NPP reported seeing figures moving in the fog. Too large to be human, but too silent to be mutants.
A strange storm is brewing over the Army Warehouses. Lightning patterns look... unnatural.
Military patrols near the Cordon have doubled. No official explanation yet. Be cautious.
Mutants have overrun an old safehouse in Rostok. Its a warzone out there.
A researcher in Yantar claims hes seen "ghost anomalies" that shift locations unpredictably. Could be worth a lookif you're insane.
Rumors of a mutant pack leader controlling others in the Dead City. Approach with maximum firepower or not at all.
A bandit faction is demanding tolls on paths near the Dark Valley. Fight or payits up to you.
The anomalies in the Garbage are behaving like theyre alive. Multiple stalkers injured trying to collect artifacts.
Yantars perimeter sensors are picking up strange vibrations underground. No known source yet.
Monolith squads spotted near Pripyat chanting something indecipherable. Whatever it is, it's chilling.
Freedom has set up a temporary checkpoint near the Agroprom. Might be a good time to take an alternate route.
A strange humming sound has been reported near the Jupiter plant. Stalkers claim it grows louder the closer you get.
Duty patrols near Rostok have been seen escorting heavily armed scientists. No ones saying what theyre up to.
A stalker claimed he saw a controller wearing a Monolith badge in the Red Forest. Not sure what to make of that.
A massive storm cloud has formed over the Garbage. No rain, just an eerie green glow. Keep your distance.
A convoy of military vehicles entered the Zone through the northern checkpoint. Whatever they're moving, its big.
A strange shadow has been spotted moving against the wind near the Swamps. No ones staying long enough to investigate.
The Monolith seems to be fortifying positions near the NPP. A big move could be on the horizon.
Freedom scouts are avoiding anomalies in the Dark Valley. They claim the anomalies are following them. Anyone else seeing this?
Theres chatter about a mutant that mimics human voices. Last heard near the Agroprom tunnels.
Scientists are requesting samples from the Red Forest. Volunteers are being offered double hazard payif they return alive.
A stalker found a PDA in the Dead City. Last entry reads: "Do not look back." It was empty after that.
Yantars anomaly detectors went offline for five minutes last night. They came back online with no explanation.
A lone snork was seen wandering near the Cordon. It didnt attack. Just stared and walked away.
Monolith operatives have been spotted carrying devices resembling portable psy-emitters. No one knows what they do yet.
Freedom fighters near the Garbage report hearing cries for help from inside anomalies. They didnt stop to investigate.
Mutants in the Swamps are reportedly gathering in larger packs than usual. Somethings agitating them.
The Pripyat hospital is giving off strange heat signatures. No known source. Approach with caution.
A lone stalker claimed to see the Wish Granter active. He disappeared the next day.
Scouts near the Radar report intermittent electromagnetic pulses. Gear malfunctions are escalating. Avoid the area.
Bandits are setting traps near the Swamps. Theyre rigging anomalies to explode. Be on the lookout.
Freedom claims to have tamed a pseudodog. Whether its true or not, theyre using it for patrols.
A trader from the Bar swears he saw an artifact burn out in real time. Said it screamed before disappearing.
Researchers in Yantar claim the anomalies have grown more "erratic." Theyre calling for more studiesbut whos brave enough?
Military checkpoints near Zaton are turning stalkers away. Rumor has it theyre looking for somethingor someone.
Someone rigged a radio to loop eerie transmissions near Pripyat. No ones claiming responsibility. Its just playing.
A stalker reported lights moving in formation above the Jupiter plant. Couldnt tell if it was military or... something else.
The Swamps are unusually quiet today. No mutants, no movement. Even the Zone seems uneasy.
Spotted a bloodsucker dragging something into an anomaly near the Garbage. Couldnt tell whator whoit was.
Military drones are flying low over the Red Forest. No official statement yet. Could mean trouble.
A trader at the Bar claims to have seen an artifact shatter into smaller pieces. Hes calling them shards of chaos.
Freedom scouts say a glowing tree in the Red Forest is screaming now. No ones brave enough to check it out.
A bandit near the Cordon is bragging about surviving a mutant ambush. No one believes him, but hes got the scars.
Theres a faint green mist forming near the Agroprom. Stalkers say it feels like its watching them.
Freedom patrols claim to have spotted a Monolith sniper near the Jupiter plant. He hasnt taken a shot yetwhats he waiting for?
A strange light was seen flickering in the Dead City last night. Some say it looked like a signal. Others say it felt like a warning.
Duty soldiers near Rostok reported hearing chanting coming from an abandoned building. By the time they entered, it was silent.
A scientist near Yantar has gone missing. Last message on his PDA said: The Zone speaks. I must listen.
Theres a rumor going around that a stalker found a map to a hidden lab. Hes been silent ever since.
A mutant stampede was spotted heading toward the Garbage. Something spooked them, but what?
Monolith forces near the NPP are reportedly building something. No one knows what it is, but its big.
A stalker near the Cordon claims he saw shadows moving without a source. Hes refusing to go back out there.
Military comms near Zaton picked up an unknown signal. Its looping a single word: Return.
Scouts near the Red Forest say the trees are humming. Theyre not staying to find out why.
A bloodsucker den was found near Pripyat. Oddly, it was emptyno sign of the creatures or their victims.
Someone found a military PDA near the Agroprom with a single entry: Its alive. Nothing else.
Bandits in the Dark Valley are reportedly guarding an artifact that glows blood red. No ones dared to take it from them yet.
Freedom scouts say a group of Monolith fighters walked into an anomaly and vanished. No bodies, no gearjust gone.
Theres a new anomaly near Yantar that reflects light like a mirror. Stalkers say looking into it feels... wrong.
Military drones are sweeping the Red Forest, but no one knows what theyre looking for. Whatever it is, its important.
A stalker near Rostok found a cache of old Monolith weapons. Odd thing is, theyre in perfect condition.
A strange structure appeared overnight near the Dead City. It wasnt there yesterday, and no one knows whoor whatbuilt it.
Rumor has it theres a hidden passage through Pripyat. No ones returned to confirm it, though.
Scouts near the NPP reported seeing shadows moving across Reactor 4s walls... but there was no light source to cast them.
Something is wrong with the air near the Pripyat ferris wheel. Stalkers say it feels thick, like its trying to pull them in.
A lone figure was seen walking along the sarcophagus at the NPP. Surveillance confirms no one ever arrived or left.
A Freedom patrol near the Red Forest claimed they heard their own voices echoing back at them... asking for help.
A Monolith squad abandoned their post near the Dead City. Their radios played nothing but distorted screams for hours after.
The Zones center emits faint pulses at night now. No one knows what they mean, but the pulses are getting stronger.
Military drones captured footage of an anomaly "eating" a bloodsucker. The creature appeared to disintegrate, but its screams lingered on the recording.
Reports of a blue light seen inside the sarcophagus. Anyone sent to investigate hasnt returned.
A new anomaly has appeared near the Garbage that emits whispers. Stalkers say the whispers call their names.
A Duty patrol was found near Yantar... all standing in perfect formation, dead with no visible wounds.
Stalkers near the Pripyat hospital report seeing figures in windows. The buildings been sealed for years.
In the Agroprom tunnels, a stalkers flashlight revealed claw marks on the ceiling20 feet above ground level.
Scouts near the Jupiter plant discovered footsteps leading into an anomaly. The disturbing part? They lead out on the other side, but no one was seen leaving.

$target are laying low at $location. They warned us about a sudden influx of military patrols around here. Seems like the Zone's getting hotter. Well stick together for now, theyve got good eyes on the ground.
$speaker here, we found $target near $location. Theyve been tracking a big mutant pack that recently entered the area. They could use a hand with the clean-up, so were tagging along.

Just met $target over at $map. They're heading toward $location, hoping to find some valuable artefacts. Theyre short on supplies, so were trading ammo for info on the safest route through the anomalies.

Found $target camping near $location. They're looking for a way to get across the swamp without getting ambushed by mutants. We're going to guide them through it, but they owe us a favor when we make it out.

This is $speaker. We ran into $target while crossing the eastern fields. Theyve set up a small camp there and are in need of some spare parts for their radio. If anyone has some, it might be worth the trade.
Ran into $target $location. Theyre planning an expedition deeper into the Zone, looking for rare artefacts. Weve agreed to team up for the venture. It could get ugly, but were ready.

We found $target holed up near $map. Their camps been ransacked, but theyre still alive. Gave them some supplies to get back on their feet. Now theyre guiding us through some old, forgotten paths to avoid patrols.
Met $target near $location. Theyve been fighting off a mutant swarm and are on edge. Weve teamed up to clear out the area, but if we dont finish soon, well be overrun. Heading towards an old shelter.

We stumbled across $target deep in the Zone, near $map. Theyve got an old stash of tech but are being hunted by some rogue stalkers. Were sticking around until theyre safe. This might get interesting.
$speaker here. We found $target $location. Theyre setting up a defensive perimeter, expecting trouble. Looks like theyve seen a few things recently, and theyre asking for our help to secure the area.
Weird... the emergency signal I received was pointing to this location $location.\nI have been searching for ten minutes at least, not a single trace of the missing group was found...
This is $speaker. We are supposed to meet the other scientists $location. Two hours have passed and there is no sign of them yet.

$mechanic speaking. I've noticed a lot of people bring me broken Bear detectors to fix. Keep in mind that those devices are limited, I don't have the necessary parts for every detector out there. Take care of your detectors guys.
It seems that the last emission has completely ruined the psi-reader I planted $location. Sad... This one was quite expensive.
$trader speaking. We received new supply of gas masks.\nDon't worry, there is enough for everybody around.
$trader here. I need Fruit Punch samples, head to the anomalous fields nearby and bring as much as you can.

I don't recall seeing this number of Gas anomalies last time I came here in $map... The anomalous activity is unusual. We need to take necessary precautions, this could mean something's about to happen. $speaker out.
$mechanic here. I'm looking for samples from gravitational anomalies. It's for an experimental outfit upgrade I'm currently working on.\nMake sure to bring me what you can find.

Just finished analyzing the last batch of samples from the zone's heart. The radiation levels in those artefacts are off the charts. We may need to adjust our equipment before going any deeper. $speaker out.

$speaker here. The electromagnetic fields near $location have been fluctuating wildly. This could be the precursor to another anomaly surge. I'll keep an eye on things, but I dont like what Im seeing.
Ive noticed unusual readings on my scanner. Im stationed at $map, but every time I check my equipment, the readings go haywire. I cant be sure whats going on yet, but its definitely anomalous.

One of my sensors detected a strange pulse coming from $location. It could be an unrecorded anomaly or something worse. I'm setting up more monitors to track the source. Stay away until I can confirm what's going on.

This is $speaker. Weve detected some strange energy readings near $map. It doesnt look like anything weve encountered before. Well need a full team to investigate, but we might be walking into something dangerous.

$speaker here. Ive been trying to stabilize the psi-emission field near $location, but it seems like the fluctuations are getting worse. We might need to evacuate the area for safety. Keep your heads on a swivel.

Heading to $map for some fieldwork. The anomalous activity in this region has been growing exponentially over the past few days. Im curious to see if the theories hold up, but I fear we may be dealing with something beyond our understanding.
Ive set up a few tracking devices near $location, but the data is corrupted. Its like the anomalies are actively interfering with our technology. Somethings very wrong here.

As of now, all of our samples from $map are useless. The sudden surge of radiation wiped out all data. Somethings not right with this place. Im retreating for now, but Ill need some help to get back in.

Have you noticed the increased activity of electrical anomalies in the area? I've been monitoring $location for the past few hours, and the voltage surges are getting stronger. This could be the start of something we cant predict.
The situation at $location is escalating. Weve encountered a new type of gas anomaly, and the air quality is deteriorating. We might need to relocate if this doesnt stabilize soon.

Sending this out as a warning: Ive just detected high levels of gravitational disturbances around $map. If youre heading that way, prepare for some heavy anomalies. Stay safe and avoid prolonged exposure.
Its official. The psi-zone around $location is expanding. The energy readings have tripled in the last 24 hours. Im sending a distress signal for reinforcements. If youre in the area, stay out of it.

$speaker here. Ive been working on a new research protocol at $map, and something unexpected just happened. I found a pocket of stability in the anomalies here, but its unlike anything weve studied before. Its both fascinating and terrifying.

Heading to $location to check on some new data I received. The unusual readings suggest some form of unknown matter is interacting with the anomalies. It could be a breakthrough or our doom. Keep your distance for now.

There's something off about the electrical activity around $map. My equipment keeps malfunctioning, and Ive found traces of something that doesnt belong here. Im requesting backup, but stay out of the area for now.
After reviewing the data from my last trip to $location, Ive concluded that the anomalies here are becoming increasingly unpredictable. We need to rethink our safety protocols before this gets worse.

Attention all personnel: the flux density at $location is off the charts. I suggest you avoid this region until further notice. We're sending a team to investigate, but the readings are already dangerously high.

Strange energy patterns detected near $map. Somethings causing unusual distortion in the fabric of space here. If anyone has the tools to help, meet me at $location. This could lead to something big, or it could kill us all.

There's a strange light anomaly developing around $location. I dont know how its forming, but the patterns suggest its evolving. Im going to need help to study it, but well need protective gear. Dont approach unless youre prepared.

$speaker here. Im at $location, and Ive discovered traces of a new type of energy flow. The frequency is unlike anything weve studied before. This could be the breakthrough weve been waiting for, or it could tear everything apart.

Somethings up with the anomaly clusters at $map. The patterns of fluctuation are highly irregular, and Im seeing an increase in unknown compounds in the air. This could be a new kind of phenomenon forming.

I've found several readings near $location that suggest a strong electromagnetic pulse is building. This might trigger a large-scale anomaly event. I need to gather more data before confirming, but I urge everyone to be cautious.
This is $speaker... My group has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago $location. Requesting assistance immediately!
Help! we got jumped by $target $location. Two of my science group are suffering from serious injury, we can't afford more casualties!
This is $leader speaking. I received a report from our group $location.\nApparently they have been attacked by $target. They need immediate assistance!
One of our scientists went missing $location.\nThe last message I received from him was about spotting $target moving his way... Is there anyone nearby who can check out his location?
$speaker reporting in. A few minutes ago, I saw $target approaching our square. They are in big numbers, that seems really bad...\nWe are $location. Send some backup to our location.
What's going on? We lost contact with the group $location.\nSomeone saw $target roaming the place, I need more info about the situation there.
This is $speaker, weve encountered a large group of Bloodsuckers near $location. They are closing in fast. I need immediate support or we wont make it.
My team and I barely escaped from a pack of pseudodogs near $location. We lost some equipment, and some of our members are injured. Any help would be appreciated.
$speaker reporting. Weve been attacked by a Chimera at $location. It tore through our perimeter defenses. Requesting extraction for the injured.
Im here at $location, and theres something strange moving through the ruins. Its a horde of Flesh mutants. Anyone whos close, please assist.
Were trapped! A group of snorks attacked our team near $location. Theyve got us surrounded. If anyone can hear this, please come quickly.
$speaker here. Weve got a massive Anomalous Swarm near $location. The mutants keep pouring in. Its a slaughterhouse here, and we need extraction now!
Warning! A mutated Boar has appeared near $location. Its much larger than usual and extremely aggressive. Do not approach without heavy weaponry.
My group encountered an unusual mutant near $location, something that looks like a hybrid between a controller and a snork. We need help before it gets worse.
$speaker here. The team was ambushed by a pack of dogs at $location. We lost some supplies, and two of our men are down. Can anyone assist?
Were under attack by a large pack of Mutant Rats at $location. Theyre overwhelming us. Requesting immediate reinforcement.
This is $leader. A massive electro anomaly appeared at $location, followed by a huge group of controllers. We need immediate support to evacuate our team.
Can anyone hear me? My team has been attacked by a Chimera at $location. The beast is massive, and we've lost contact with two members. Please help.
Were pinned down! A massive wave of snorks is attacking us at $location. We need backup, or we wont make it out alive.
Weve been attacked by a pair of blind dogs at $location. Theyre much faster than the ones weve encountered before. This is bad, we need reinforcements!
$speaker speaking. Were facing a wave of mutated rats at $location. Theyre coming in waves, and weve already lost a few men. We need help now!
Ive just encountered a pack of wild Bloodsuckers near $location. Theyre heavily territorial. We need more men to help clear them out.
Theres a new type of mutant near $location, one that appears to be an enhanced version of a snork. Its very hostile. We need immediate backup.
My group has been caught by a horde of Pseudogiant mutants at $location. These things are massive and incredibly dangerous. We need help, fast!
Im receiving disturbing reports. A flock of mutated crows, almost the size of a Chimera, is closing in on $location. Stay away if you can!
$speaker here. Weve got a major problem. A mutated pack of boars just tore through our research station at $location. The damage is severe, and we need assistance now.
Im at $location, and weve just encountered a mutated group of Stalkersliterally walking corpses, feeding on anything in sight. This is unlike anything weve seen before. Stay out of the area.
The situation here is escalating. My team is facing an onslaught of mutant Flesh near $location. We need urgent help or well be overrun.
Were being attacked by a mixture of Controllers and Bloodsuckers near $location. The pressure is overwhelming. We need heavy fire support right now!
$speaker reporting in. A mutant herd of wild boars just attacked us at $location. Their behavior is erratic, and theyre much more aggressive than usual. We need help immediately!
Somethings wrong! Weve encountered a new type of hybrid mutant at $location, combining elements of both Pseudodogs and Chimera. Its too strong to fight alone. We need backup!
This is $speaker. Requesting assistance immediately!\nMy group been attacked by $target a few minutes ago. We took position $location, hurry up!
Help us! we got attacked by $target in $map. Three researchers are suffering from serious injuries, we can't hold it any longer!
We have spotted $target approaching our location $location.\n$leader, is there any group nearby who can provide assassination?
A few minutes ago, my group engaged $target $location.\nThey fell back after killing two of them. One of the scientists got a serious injury.
$leader speaking. It seems that $target are spreading $location, they might be preparing for something. All groups near the place should leave at once.
One of my group spotted $target heading our way. We took position $location. If they try something nasty, they will pay for it. $speaker out.
I got a report from unknown source about $target preparing for an ambush in $map. All groups at the location must take extreme caution.
We opened fire on $target after ignoring our clear warnings.\nLooks like more of them are heading this way, so we'll fall back and take position $location for now. $speaker out.
I've received information about possible raid in $map. Seems like $target are looking for trouble. Stay safe.
This is $speaker, weve been ambushed by $target near $location. Two of my researchers are down, and we need immediate help. We're not far from the main road, hurry!
Warning! $target has been spotted approaching our base at $location. Weve set up defenses, but we could use some backup just in case things go south.
Weve encountered $target at $location. They seem to be preparing for something big. All nearby groups need to stay on alert and be ready to respond at a moments notice.
$leader reporting. We just engaged $target near $location. Theyre not backing down easily. Weve sustained some casualties, and our ammo is running low. Assistance is critical.
Were under siege! $target has launched an assault on our position at $location. Weve fortified the area, but I fear we wont last much longer. Anyone nearby, please come to our aid!
Our patrol encountered $target near $location. They had us outnumbered, but we managed to retreat. We need a safe extraction as soon as possible. There's no telling when they'll attack again.

$speaker here. Weve had an encounter with $target near $location. After a brief firefight, we were forced to retreat. Casualties include two researchers and our lead guard. We need immediate assistance.
Urgent! We just received word that $target is planning a large-scale raid at $location. We must evacuate immediately and regroup with nearby allies.
We've identified $target in the area around $location. They are organizing into smaller groups, likely to infiltrate our defenses. All units should prepare for possible combat.
Attention! $target has been spotted just outside $location. Theyve got sniper positions set up, and theyre not making their intentions clear. We need to get eyes on them before they strike.
$speaker reporting. We just found out that $target is massing forces near $location. The tension is palpable. All units, stay sharp and ready to move out.
This is $leader. $target has already surrounded our position near $location. Were holding for now, but if we cant get reinforcements soon, we may be overwhelmed.
Weve been dealing with constant harassment from $target at $location. Its unclear whether theyre planning a full-scale attack or just probing our defenses. Either way, we need backup.
Were under attack! $target has pushed into $location. Theyve breached our perimeter, and weve lost two men in the process. Requesting immediate support.
$speaker here. Weve received word of a possible ambush planned by $target near $location. Were setting up a countermeasure, but well need support to pull it off.
$speaker here. Were witnessing an unprecedented mobilization of $target forces at $location. The situations deteriorating fastreinforcements are critical.
Alert: $target has initiated a diversionary tactic at $location. Their feints suggest a full-scale assault is imminent. Stand by for further instructions.
$speaker reporting. Our sensors detected a covert assembly of $target units near $location. They appear to be coordinating with precision. Requesting aerial surveillance immediately.
Commander $leader here. Our perimeter at $location has been breached by $target operatives. Were reinforcing the position, but every minute counts.
$speaker here. Intelligence indicates that $target is deploying advanced tactics at $location. Our defenses need urgent recalibration.
Heads up! $target forces have been spotted converging on $location. If youre in the area, fortify your positions and await further orders.
$speaker checking in. We've intercepted communications hinting that $target plans to set up a forward base at $location. All units, prepare for rapid response.
Attention all units: $target is massing at $location with unknown reinforcements. We suspect a strategic maneuver is underwayproceed with extreme caution.
$leader here. Were witnessing heavy artillery movements from $target near $location. Our best chance is a coordinated counterattack. Prepare for immediate engagement.
$speaker to all squads: $target has launched a series of hit-and-run attacks at $location. Casualties are mounting; urgent support is needed.
Urgent update: $target has initiated an electronic warfare campaign near $location. Our communications are at risk. $speaker out.
$speaker reporting in from $location. $targets ambush tactics have caught us off guard. Were holding the line but require immediate reinforcement.
Command, this is $leader. $target has deployed specialized units at $location. Weve engaged, but the enemys firepower is overwhelming. Backup needed ASAP.
$speaker here. Our recon teams confirm that $target is restructuring its frontline near $location. Prepare for potential urban combat in a matter of hours.
Alert from $leader: Weve encountered heavy resistance from $target at $location. A fierce firefight is underwaycoordinate your support immediately.
$speaker here. Reports indicate that $target is engaging in guerrilla tactics around $location. Our outposts have been compromised; immediate countermeasures are required.
Command update: $target has infiltrated the supply lines near $location. $speaker suggests an all-out blockade to prevent further breaches.
$leader here. A coordinated strike by $target at $location has resulted in heavy casualties. Were on the defensive and require immediate tactical support.
$speaker reporting. Surveillance confirms that $target is setting traps around $location. All available units, prepare to counter their unconventional tactics.
Emergency! $target has been spotted massing near $location with apparent reinforcements. $leader orders an immediate evacuation and regroupingthis could be the start of a major offensive.
This is $speaker. We met $target $location. One of them is suffering from a bad injury.\nI marked the location of our base for them. Make sure to provide them with medical assistance.
We got assistance from $target in $map.\n They have extra medical supplies. You can allow them to get into our base.
$target were asking for extra ammo. I met them $location. Looks like they're preparing for a hunting trip.
I saw $target roaming $location. They are searching for artefacts.\nOne of them, called $speaker, was asking us for extra Bear detectors. $leader, what do you think?
I was talking to $target we met $location. Their commander, $speaker, mentioned an unusual number of mutants heading this way.\nMy group took position and they agreed to provide necessary assistance.
We found dead bodies of $target here in $map, everything is messy... Seems like they got killed by unusual mutants.\nI'm about to reach my destination $location. $speaker out.
We came by $target on our way to the anomaly field. They're preparing for a raid on mutants spotted $location.\nWe'll join them for now, the research will be continued later.
$speaker here. We met $target $location. They were heavily wounded but still managed to provide us with some much-needed supplies. Theyre heading back to base now.
We encountered $target while scouting $location. They had some valuable intel on mutant movements nearby. Well be setting up a joint operation soon.
$target has offered to help us with scanning the anomaly field at $location. Their tech is advanced, and their commander seems knowledgeable. We agreed to join forces.
I came across $target near $location. They had some interesting artifacts to trade. We exchanged some supplies, and theyre moving to another research site now.
$speaker here. We found $target at $location. They were caught in a mutant attack but managed to escape with only minor injuries. Were helping them set up camp for the night.
While navigating the area around $location, we met $target. Theyre gearing up for a major expedition. Weve agreed to join them to investigate the strange reports in the area.
Weve teamed up with $target at $location to track a group of mutants. Theyve been having problems with the local fauna. Well help clear out the area before continuing our research.
$speaker here. $target is on their way to $location. Weve provided them with some supplies and theyre heading out to study some anomalies that are acting up in the area.
I just spoke with $target at $location. Theyre preparing for a long expedition into the Heart of the Zone. Weve agreed to exchange some research notes and collaborate on the project.
$target requested assistance for a research operation near $location. Theyve encountered some hostile mutants but are still determined to proceed. Were setting up a defensive perimeter for them.
I ran into $target at $location. Theyre looking for a specific type of anomaly. Weve offered them guidance and supplies to help them in their search.
$speaker here. We were attacked by mutants near $location, but $target helped us fight them off. Theyre heading out now, and well be resuming our research shortly.
We met $target at $location after hearing strange reports from nearby zones. They provided us with valuable information about anomaly activity. Were investigating further together.
$target has been monitoring anomalous activity in $location for a while. Theyve gathered some interesting data, and were heading out together to validate the findings.
We met $target on our way to $location. Theyve been hunting mutants in the area, and weve agreed to team up. Theyll handle the combat, and well provide support with research tools.
At $location, we encountered $target who offered us some rare supplies. Theyve been tracking mutant movements, and weve agreed to help them in exchange for the items.
$speaker here. $target has been trying to map the anomaly field near $location. Weve provided them with some equipment and helped analyze the area. Theyre moving out now.
We found $target at $location preparing for a joint mission to neutralize mutant nests. Weve joined forces, and everyone is getting ready for the operation.
$target made contact at $location. Theyre planning a deep dive into a dangerous anomaly field. Weve offered them protective gear and shared some research data to assist in their mission.
While searching the area around $location, we came across $target. They provided us with vital information on the anomalies. Were working together now to complete our investigation.
$speaker here. We just helped $target in $location after their group was attacked by mutants. Theyve asked for medical supplies and weve given them some assistance.
I encountered $target at $location while hunting for artifacts. They mentioned encountering some unusual mutant behavior nearby. Weve decided to stick together for safety and research purposes.
We met $target at $location. They had a close call with some mutants and asked for assistance. Weve agreed to help clear the area and will resume our research once it's safe.

$speaker here. We encountered $target at $location. They seem to be working on some sort of project to track anomalies in the area. Theyve offered to share their findings if we help with their research.
We just received a call from $target near $location. Theyve been investigating anomalies and have run into some mutant resistance. Theyve requested backup, and were moving in to assist them.
Weve been contacted by $target at $location. Theyre preparing for an expedition to study a dangerous anomaly field. Weve agreed to join forces and help each other out.
$speaker here. We ran into $target near $location. They were looking for a rare artifact and mentioned an increase in mutant activity nearby. Weve agreed to join them in their search.
At $location, we met $target. Theyre researching an anomaly with unusual properties. Weve decided to work together and exchange information to ensure our safety in the process.
We met $target near $location. They mentioned strange activity in the area. Weve decided to investigate together, combining our efforts to analyze the anomalies more efficiently.
We encountered $target while moving through $location. They were in trouble with mutants and needed help. Weve agreed to assist them in exchange for some useful research data.
$speaker here. We met $target near $location. Theyve offered some valuable insight into the mutant migration patterns. Well continue our joint research in the area.
While traveling near $location, we came across $target. Theyve been working on a theory about mutant behavior and shared some of their findings with us. Were collaborating on this project now.
$target contacted us near $location. Theyve made a breakthrough in their research on anomalies and asked for assistance in exploring a dangerous site. Weve agreed to help them out.
$clr_1Alkash Programmer\n$clr_2I need access to the internet. Is there any in the Bar, or perhaps over at Sidorovich's place?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I have to say, that guard in 100 Rads is such a nice fella. I wish those Duty pricks treated me like that.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Deals on sausage and bread have been real shitty as of late.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You guys heard that some transport in the Zone still works? Such a thing can be found in the Truck Cemetery, and it doesn't even need any gasoline! What a miracle.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Ha-ha-ha, the military have got themselves a real shit show right now. They were on some kind of raid and their helicopter got shot at... got ordered to return to base immediately.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Man, again Yantar is full of zombies. Careful there, people!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I keep hearing people mentioning someone called Strelok... Strelok this, Strelok that, Strelok whatever... what's the big deal, huh?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Don't head into any basements, they're full of mutants! Go around the top!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Get to cover, now. There's a helicopter around the old church.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Saw a group of shady guys, presumably Freedom. They're heading toward the Bar.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Saw a group of shady guys, presumably Duty. They're heading toward the Army Warehouses.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The military's pinned down in Agroprom, in the central complex!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Wish I had a house for four million! And how many artefacts am I going to have to collect for that?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Bored... I feel like putting holes in somebody.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Join the Monolith in order to avoid your collective and inevitable fates!

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Yesterday I met an old friend of mine that had been missing. He didn't even recognise me, instead he immediately opened fire! Had to take him out... People, be careful around psy-emissions. Shooting former brothers of yours is not a simple task. At all.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2There was heavy fog in Yantar yesterday, made zombies impossible to spot from a distance.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Garik, get me out of Jupiter. I'm on the road right now, will be at Yanov Station in a second.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I hear Sakharov's got some new detectors!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2A group of five people are moving toward the Barrier, in all likelihood, Monolith. Take measures.

$clr_1Unknown source:\n$clr_2Just saw a big chimera who put a group of stalkers on a spectacular circus show. So you want to wander around, think twice. Turning around and leaving is better than lying here with an opened ass, like what just happened to these poor bastards.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Haha, loser. Why'd you leave your farm? And we've already cashed in.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Two-Three-Seven, we're heading back. Regroup.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Tired... I'm tired of everything... Creatures... Damn stalkers, damn anomalies!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2If any other stalker tries to enter the Agroprom, I'm gonna get Duty to lock him up in the arena cages.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Zhurov, we're out of free hands. We need you and a few other guys to prepare a burial for a couple of bodies. They'll be sent to the south as Cargo 200 in a couple of days.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Fuck this weather. It goes from clear, to rain, to a fucking blowout in just a couple of hours!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Together we shall protect the Monolith!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The mutants have increased in number, leaving us with no fucking breathing room. What is Duty even up to?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Know, infidels, that we are strong and you are weak. Run, and we will catch you. Hide, and we will find you.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2What fucker snatched all the loot from my stash? The one in the Wild Territory. I know you're reading this... Prepare your sorry ass.

$clr_1Unknown source:\n$clr_2Peregrine Falcon, watching a shootout. A group of stalkers are fighting a large mutant... can't make out... I'm going to withdraw. Yes, switch the channel to a different frequency, this one is bugged...
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2What's the point, to be dragged somewhere. Uh, there'd better be a bar in the Cordon.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We'll track the crashed helicopter in the Swamps while no-one's there.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Who the hell trashed my vodka stash?... For whoever did this, wish you'd have choked on it, scumbag!

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The command of the peacekeeping contingent for the isolation of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone is announcing recruitment into the ranks of the military stalkers: pork, horilka, endless ammunition, and a free burial are all guaranteed.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Any smartass brave enough to enter our territory will be given hell.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Anyone seen flying black smoke in the Wild Territory? Fuck me... Is it some kind of new poltergeist?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'm pinned down by a bunch of looters, help me out!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Lukash, we've dealt with the mercs. Heading back as we speak.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Lukash, Duty's over at the farmstead again. Why?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Army Warehouses. Apparently, there's not a chunk left of the pilots. Someone totally fucked that helicopter.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I wiped this zone and why did I just come here? Money. Yes, we have fattened with our blood and sweat the cocksuckers in the government, that earn while doing fucking shit, and we are here, obliged to crawl for pathetic crumbs.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Guys, there are some real strange things going on in the Zone. Ever heard stories about top secret experiments?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Bros, any info on the next blowout?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2The Swamps are restless today. You can get stuck in the mud, and there are lots of creatures around. They are coming straight from the ground, goddammit.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We're seeing a wave of mutants coming from the northern gorge.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We're seeing a wave of mutants coming from the east, presumably from the Darkscape.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We're seeing a wave of mutants coming from the north-west. See the attached coordinates.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I just spotted a couple of helicopters heading north. Sending coordinates. We'll remain hidden - I don't know what their instructions are.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2A bunch of helicopters just passed by in the Swamps. What the hell are they up to here? I've heard nothing about any planned sweeps or operations in these areas, and my sources are reliable. Something sketchy's going on... Keep your eyes peeled, boys.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2People! Be careful in the village by the Army Warehouses - a Burnt Fuzz has grown on the pillars!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Anyone been to the Red Forest? I was planning on heading there, seems like there's some good loot to be found.

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2People, I'm looking through my binoculars - seems like a new party of soldiers has arrived! I suggest staying out of sight for a couple of days. They're combing the area, but the Zone's gonna chew 'em up anyway.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'm in the Swamps, it hurts me... The skin is peeling off, my hair is falling out... What the hell is wrong with me?!

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Some people do not learn anything and don't want to, have they seen too many American films or are they blinded by greed? You tell them about the anomalies, they tell you about the loot - they don't want to think about anything, 'cept for dosh, until their guts get scattered on the branches.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Trust no-one but the Monolith and your fellow brothers. No-one.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2How many hounds are going to keep running around Rostok? When is Duty gonna deal with them already? Man, fuck this. I'm going to find someone who actually keeps their word.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Handing out an exoskeleton for free! And now that I've got your attention - I offer to sell a Wrenched artefact, price negotiable.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Is it safe to pass through the Garbage?!

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Came to the Zone and thought I'd come across new sights to see and lots of mutants to hunt... and what do I get? Guard duty all day long at a stupid checkpoint with jack shit to do!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Seems like the military aren't sending any choppers to the area around Rostok after their last one got shot down.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We've accessed the southern tunnel of the facility, heading downwards into the underground. The Red Forest is visible from the windows. It's quiet here.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Got attacked by a pseudodog, barely made it out!
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2Deck yourselves out, eggheads. Brothers, who took care of you at first, who gave you the vodka, eh? Those stubborn scientists? Or uncle Sid? Bring those artefacts to me!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Anyone heard about some new guy at the mercenary base in Pripyat? Seems like he's got some unique equipment you can order.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You heard about one of the sentries shooting himself? I'm having second feelings about joining the patrol.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I overheard some military discussions. Seems like they're planning an op in Yantar.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Death to non-believers!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I feel like sleeping
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Stalkers, Sakharov is paying decent money for loot!... And is looking for someone to send to Lab X-16. I'm not going there, too risky. Full of psy-emissions... and zombies.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2A pack of dogs is coming at us, sending coordinates
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2You shitheads want a taste of a heat-seeking missile? Who taught you to fire an RPG?
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Damn, who emptied my stash?

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Time for a commercial! You wanna be a real lad in the Zone? Get some dirt on your boot, earning plenty of loot? Live on the cushion? Join the bandits! We've got the one right perspective on the Zone.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Need to leave the Zone, pronto.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Some dude in the Garbage got hold of a pretty rare gizmo.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Sold some mutant parts to Sidorovich, and it seems like I got ripped off, that old fart... People, best you trade with Barman instead.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I'm leaving the Zone shortly, I'm done with it, I can't stand it any longer.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Ha, how many blockheads have rushed to the North in recent times.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Hemul, head to the Bar. Got some work for you!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Rumour has it that there's a controller dwelling inside X-16, and maybe not even one. Several experienced stalkers ventured there yesterday and haven't returned since.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Who are those bozos near the farm in merc gear? I ain't even thinking of goin' near there!

$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Damn rifle jamming on me again, and this is happening right after I took it to the technician from Duty in Rostok! What else could I have expected from an alcoholic? If your gear needs repairing, he's the type to stay away from.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Agh, there's a broken tank somewhere in the Red Forest, somewhere in a thicket. They say there's still a PKM left with a few rounds, but I can't look around for it by myself.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2Did my pockets grow or something? Seems like it...
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2I heard that Kremlin sends their own people into the Zone. It'll be interesting to watch them.
$clr_1Arnie\n$clr_2Fighting at midnight tonight. Don't miss it.
$clr_1Ashot\n$clr_2Attention: I am now at Yanov Station. Don't go looking for me in the Warehouses, fellas. I offer you wonderful products at the lowest prices.
$clr_1Barman\n$clr_2If anyone stumbles upon any documents containing information about the area around the Radar and the Scorcher, let me know.
$clr_1Barman\n$clr_2I'm going to explain this one more time for the boneheaded. There are no programmers in the back room of the Bar that are responsible for any messages you receive on your PDAs.
$clr_1Barman\n$clr_2Are you looking for a drink, a good firearm, a lot of money, and a conversation with reliable partners? Come to the 100 Rads Bar!
$clr_1Swamp Doctor\n$clr_2Egh, Strelok... how I need you right now. I don't even know who else to turn to with my problems.
$clr_1Bolt\n$clr_2I ain't feeling good... Had some canned food, apparently from a warehouse. I looked at the expiration date, and I've screwed up bad.
$clr_1Beard\n$clr_2There's work for anyone willing to get their hands dirty. Come to the Skadovsk.

$clr_1Voronin\n$clr_2If I find out that you take bribes from stalkers passing through the Bar, I'm going to print and sign death warrants for each and every individual responsible before I put it in their coffins.
$clr_1Hawaiian\n$clr_2Hola, ese! Got some work for anyone wandering around Jupiter - come visit the Yanov Station!
$clr_1Hermann\n$clr_2A reminder to all stalkers that it is necessary to subscribe to the newsletter regarding any emissions in the Zone. The information is always accurate and up-to-date.
$clr_1Groza\n$clr_2Prophet, I'm heading back to base. Got tons of artefacts!
$clr_1Gromov\n$clr_2I need tools, come to me if you find anything suitable.
$clr_1Gromov\n$clr_2Guys, where did Zulu go? Nobody saw him?
$clr_1Deserter\n$clr_2Selling army goods! I have a lot of stuff, from unique weapons to ammo as well as armour. Everyone who knows where I am, come up. Whoever doesn't know will never learn.
$clr_1Digger\n$clr_2Need 5-6 stalkers for a raid on the catacombs. As soon as I find my PDA, we'll be on the move.
$clr_1Digger\n$clr_2Gathering people for a raid on the catacombs.
$clr_1Digger\n$clr_2We're in need of two more stalkers for a raid in the catacombs.
$clr_1Zhurov\n$clr_2Enough with the harassment at the perimeter already. We'll be covering the entirety of your village with mortar fire if this doesn't cease.
$clr_1Ivan Pisser\n$clr_2Heard some news: someone wants to get through to the Scorcher once again.
$clr_1Snitch\n$clr_2If you need information, go to the Bar.
$clr_1Snitch\n$clr_2Got a little job for an agile newbie, paying well.
$clr_1Kitsenko\n$clr_2Psss, where can I get a little smoke?
$clr_1Kuznetsov\n$clr_2Combat battalion, knock back some good vodka, raid in 3 minutes! Get the squad ready and move out!
$clr_1Kuznetsov\n$clr_2This morning, five privates were missing from the drill... presumably deserters. I will be grateful for anyone who finds these degenerates.
$clr_1Kurgan\n$clr_2I can modify the firmware in the PDA, look for me in the Bar.
$clr_1Leon\n$clr_2That's enough, quit the spamming.
$clr_1Loki\n$clr_2Hey, Duty, how are you doing without Jupiter? Good thing your founder's little backstory got revealed.
$clr_1Baldy\n$clr_2The bandits showed up again in the Dark Valley, not good. We'll eradicate them.
$clr_1Makar\n$clr_2If only I could leave this mess, buy a flat in the city, and get some work in a studio.
$clr_1Maslyak\n$clr_2I heard it again from the speakers at the checkpoint. Someone's laughing louder and louder, laughing more aggressively, like a maniac.
$clr_1Maslyak\n$clr_2I can't do this any more. Every day, the blood in my veins chills.

$clr_1Lukash\n$clr_2Free stalkers! Our men at the Army Warehouses welcome you at any time. Here, you will find true friends and comrades, good attitudes, and much more! The Zone is our home: reflect on whether you see yourself outside the Zone and help us deal with Duty once and for all.
$clr_1Butcher\n$clr_2I always have a job for a good hunter. Come to the flea market.
$clr_1Father Peter\n$clr_2Let us pray, brethren, for the peace of the soul of Yuri Semetsky! Amen!
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2Third squad, the raid to catch monsters for the arena has not been cancelled! Come on, get out of the Bar! Do you want to be like those anarchist weirdos?!
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2Everyone! The delivery of ammunition has to be conducted at the specified hours! Do I have to spend the night here?!!
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2There is work for the veterans, we pay a considerable sum.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2There's work for free stalkers, adequate payments.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2I'm offering some jobs. You can find me at the bar of the duty base. First come first serve.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2I purchase artefacts for research, come visit the Duty outpost at Rostok. If there's no money, I'll trade for something else.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2Everyone on the parade grounds on the double. Whoever misses it will be discharged from Duty immediately.
$clr_1Petrenko\n$clr_2We're having temporary difficulties with maintaining the private channel. If you need something, write to me personally.
$clr_1Gunpowder\n$clr_2Sanya, are you seeing this too? What's this dumb fuck doing near the bushes? It's been three freaking days! Can I bust his ass already?
$clr_1Gatekeeper\n$clr_2Once again for those "particularly gifted": do not go to the bridge in the DL, our snipers will calm you down instantly. Limansk is under the Syndicate's control.
$clr_1Limpid\n$clr_2Guys, if you find any toolkit, bring it to me! I got basically nothing.
$clr_1Limpid\n$clr_2Anyone who's out hunting... you grab some PDAs for me, we can deal.
$clr_1Rogovets\n$clr_2Here we go again, the vodka ran out again, that's it. How can I treat the nerves of the guys without it?
$clr_1Romka\n$clr_2I require a stalker, who's a specialist in code locks and with experience in raids in the North of the Zone.
$clr_1Peregrine\n$clr_2Die, scum.
$clr_1Sakharov\n$clr_2We require parts of rare mutants for further research. We pay well for every good sample. Those who are interested, come to the mobile bunker in Yantar.
$clr_1Sakharov\n$clr_2General, could you send another five of your men? At the agreed price.
$clr_1Sakharov\n$clr_2Dear stalkers! Our research requires a large number of new artefacts, as many as you can bring. More than a decent payment guaranteed.
$clr_1Senka\n$clr_2Oh, I'd love me a cold beer right now... Anyone knows where to get some?
$clr_1Sergey\n$clr_2To whoever has tools for basic, fine, and calibration work: bring them to me.
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2There's always work, both for the rookies, and for the veterans. Payment as usual, heh.
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2Rookies, come to me for work - you can gain experience, earn some money and purchase ammunition.
$clr_1Sidorovich\n$clr_2The life of an entrepreneur in the Zone is as dangerous as a stalker's. I'll reward everyone who ensures the safety of my business.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2If you want some brand-new, foreign weapon, come to me.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2We've got some good pot. Come and get some, let's chillax for a bit!
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2If you feel like going on a raid, you can stock up at my place. Also got some dirty work, anyone who does it will get a rare artefact.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2I buy PDAs containing any valuable information, bring everything to me, more money has never hurt anyone.
$clr_1Skinflint\n$clr_2I got hold of some toilet paper. Those who are tired of burdocks, come quickly, stocks are limited.
$clr_1Sultan\n$clr_2Brothers, when you find Sleeper you can put him down for good... but grab his PDA and bring it to me.
$clr_1Owl\n$clr_2Buying PDAs with any valuable information. Bring everything to me, and I'll give as good as one gets.
Cardan:\n$clr_2Ehhhh... Hello everyone. Just woke up, I'm waiting for a drink.

$clr_1Biggie\n$clr_2Anyone else hear that? There's something playing in the Meadow near the factory. At midnight. So creepy, and yet, so horrifyingly familiar. But I can't remember where exactly I've heard it.
$clr_1Fanatic\n$clr_2To anyone who has not yet been in the village - don't miss the unique opportunity of learning the necessary survival skills from me.
$clr_1Fanatic\n$clr_2People, has anyone seen Wolf?
$clr_1Fanatic\n$clr_2Need help in sweeping mutants' lairs, contact me.
$clr_1Hakim\n$clr_2Sanya, I'm heading back to base with Snake.
$clr_1Hog\n$clr_2I need some more tools for my work. Any mercenaries who aren't out doing any contracts, please help me out. You won't regret the payment.
$clr_1Hog\n$clr_2Best stay away from the Wild Territory. You won't find anything worthwhile there.
$clr_1Hog\n$clr_2Soon, I'll be replenishing my rock collection.
$clr_1Trunk\n$clr_2We need stalkers with raiding experience deep into the Zone. Payment is appropriate. If anyone's interested, contact me and we'll discuss the details.
$clr_1Chechnya\n$clr_2Hunting is cool, I gotta say.
$clr_1Six\n$clr_2Lukash, Duty's at the farmstead again. Why?
$clr_1Nimble\n$clr_2Stalkers! I accept all kinds of PDAs with any valuable information, bring everything to me. The money won't hurt
$clr_1Yar\n$clr_2Hey, Ashot, how's Yanov? Must be cosy, you lousy spoon-fed fighter.
$clr_1Yarik Athlete\n$clr_2There's a sucker in the Dark Valley wandering around with a cool shooter. If someone offs him, I'll buy it.
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2We shall cleanse the world from sin!
$clr_1Anonymous\n$clr_2One day the Zone shall purify this sinful world. Join us to live in a peaceful paradise, or perish with the rest.
$clr_1Vagrant\n$clr_2Hey, found something strange in the Rusted Factory. Looks like an artifact, but my detector ain't picking it up. Anyone else want to check it out with me?
$clr_1Rogue\n$clr_2Some stalkers are always looking for quick profit. Dont make the same mistake. Ive got a lead on a stash in the Swamps. Dont ask questions, just come ready.
$clr_1Bandit\n$clr_2Gather round, fellow thieves. Big job coming up. Whoevers willing to get their hands dirty, meet me at the Old Gas Station. You know where it is.
$clr_1Barman\n$clr_2Nothing like a cold drink after a long day in the Zone, right? Come on by, I'll pour you oneonly if you've got something to trade, of course.
$clr_1Trader\n$clr_2Tired of eating canned meat? Ive got fresh supplies from the Cordon. If you're lucky, there might even be some bread. Come quick before its gone.
$clr_1Fisher\n$clr_2You ever seen an anomaly that looks like a fish hook? Found one in the Marshes. Anyone who knows what it is, come find me at the docks. Might be worth something.
$clr_1Shaman\n$clr_2Brothers, the Zone speaks in riddles. I have found the old scriptures of our ancestors. Bring me artifacts, I will offer you knowledge beyond the realm of man.
$clr_1Spetsnaz\n$clr_2Stay away from the Iron Forest. Somethings there that doesnt belong. We lost contact with our squad out there, and I aint going back without backup.
$clr_1Nomad\n$clr_2I was passing through the Red Forest when I heard something strange. A voice calling from the trees, but no one was there. Anyone care to check it out with me?

$clr_1Vulture\n$clr_2Ive been getting reports about mutants acting strange near the Old Farm. Some stalkers say its nothing, but Ive got a bad feeling about this one. Anyone whos been there recently, report in.
$clr_1Wanderer\n$clr_2I've been hearing rumors about a secret stash hidden in the Agroprom. If you've got the guts, meet me at the entrance. We can split the loot if we find it.
$clr_1Hunter\n$clr_2Ive set up a trap in the Garbage. Lets see if we can catch some fresh meat. If anyone is in the area, join me for a quick hunt. We can sell the hides after.
$clr_1Maverick\n$clr_2Ever seen an artifact that hums? Found one in the Wild Territory, but I dont know how to extract it. I could use some backup if anyones feeling brave.
$clr_1Rebel\n$clr_2I've been thinking about that abandoned military base near the Dead City. There's something there I just can't put my finger on. Anyone else up for investigating?
$clr_1Gunslinger\n$clr_2Anyone seen a small pack of mutants near the Rostok? We need to clear them out before they start picking off stalkers. If you're armed and willing, meet me at the north exit.
$clr_1Specter\n$clr_2Ive been getting strange readings on my detector around the Bar. Its as if something is interfering with it. If anyone is near, come check it out with me.

$clr_1Echo\n$clr_2Ive been in and out of the Chernobyl NPP recently. The air is thick with anomalies. If anyone wants to risk it, I can lead a small expedition inside. But you better be prepared for the worst.
$clr_1Stalker\n$clr_2I'm putting together a small crew for a deep dive into the Dark Valley. If anyone has any intel or gear to share, nows the time. Well be exploring uncharted territory.

$clr_1Colonel\n$clr_2The situation in the Wild Territory is deteriorating. Mutants are becoming more aggressive. If anyone has spare ammo or supplies, deliver them to our camp before things get worse.
$clr_1Gunsmith\n$clr_2Ive just finished crafting some new guns. If anyones interested in getting their hands on the latest tech, come to my shop in the Cordon. I promise you wont regret it.
$clr_1Witch\n$clr_2Theres something unsettling about the old church in the Swamps. Ive heard whispers that shouldnt be there. If anyone has courage, come with me to investigate.

$clr_1Eagle\n$clr_2Its time to pay a visit to the Red Forest. Ive been gathering some intel on the strange lights that appear there. If anyone wants to join me, you better be prepared for whatevers out there.
$clr_1Marauder\n$clr_2They say theres a hidden stash in the Agroprom. Not much, but Ill take it. Meet me by the entrance if you want in. Dont bring anyone who cant keep quiet.
$clr_1Vigilante\n$clr_2I found an old map in the Cordon. Looks like there's an underground lab near the Rostok. Im going in to check it out. Anyone with some firepower, meet me there.
$clr_1Mongoose\n$clr_2We got a serious problem with the mutants in the Dark Valley. Theyve been getting bolder and more organized. If youre not scared, come help me wipe them out.
$clr_1Tanker\n$clr_2Ive got a supply of medical kits ready. If anyone's heading out to the Zone, come pick up what you need. You never know whatll happen out there.
$clr_1Scout\n$clr_2Theres something big moving in the Swamps. Ive been hearing strange noises. If anyone wants to investigate, Ill meet you by the old shack.
$clr_1Grim\n$clr_2The reports of strange creatures in the Wild Territory are true. If anyone has a death wish, come join me. Well hunt them down, or theyll hunt us.
$clr_1Specter\n$clr_2Ive been out at the Agroprom and found something I dont like. Theres more of those bloodsuckers than ever. If anyones up for a fight, join me in clearing them out.
$clr_1Phoenix\n$clr_2Anyone seen the massive storm in the Red Forest? Something's brewing in the air. Im heading there for answers, but I need backup. Anyone willing to risk it?
$clr_1Stranger\n$clr_2Ive been hearing whispers about the Dead City. Some say theres a treasure buried under the ruins. If anyones interested in exploring, Ill meet you at the entrance.
$clr_1Tactician\n$clr_2Im planning an assault on a bandit hideout near the Cordon. If anyone wants to join in, well split the loot. But youll need to be smart about it.
$clr_1Survivor\n$clr_2The mutants near the Bar are getting more aggressive. Ive seen packs of them, and theyre hunting in groups. We need to thin their numbers before they come for the rest of us.
$clr_1Feral\n$clr_2Theres a hideout in the Garbage thats been taken over by a new pack of wild dogs. If anyone has some free time, meet me there and well clear it out.
$clr_1Rogue\n$clr_2Ive got a job lined up. Some of the mercs need help raiding a stash in the Swamps. If you're up for it, meet me at the old train station and bring your weapons.
$clr_1Hawk\n$clr_2Im heading to the Yanov area. The place is crawling with mutants, but theres something else. A strange artifact. If anyone wants to investigate with me, Ill be at the station.
$clr_1Maverick\n$clr_2Anyone looking to make some easy cash? Ive got some information on a stash in the Red Forest. We need to get in and out fast, so bring only whats necessary.
$clr_1Recon\n$clr_2Ive heard strange transmissions coming from the old military outpost. Im heading there to check it out. If anyones interested, I could use some extra hands.
$clr_1Vanguard\n$clr_2Ive got a contract for anyone willing to go into the heart of the Zone. The pays good, but the risk is high. If you think you can handle it, lets talk.
$clr_1Wanderer\n$clr_2Theres a stash in the Dark Valley. Not much, but its better than nothing. Im heading there in the morning. If you want in, meet me by the old farmhouse.
$clr_1Coyote\n$clr_2Ive got word that the bandits are planning something big. Theyre moving into the Cordon, but Ill be ready for them. Anyone who wants to join, I could use the backup.
$clr_1Mole\n$clr_2Ive been digging through the underground tunnels again. Found some new artifacts, and some old friends. If anyone wants to trade or team up, Im always down.
$clr_1Bounty\n$clr_2The Wild Territory is crawling with mutants. I'm looking for a group of well-armed stalkers to clear out the area. You get paid, but youll have to fight.
$clr_1Merc\n$clr_2Theres a cache in the Swamps. Old military gear. Were talking weapons and ammo, so if you need supplies, this is the place to be. Ill be there soon.
